1. The Promotion.The LFH Exclusive Deal Monthly Data Add-On promotion (“ Promotion”) is a time-limited promotion by YTL Communications Sdn Bhd (“ YTLC”).
2. Eligibility. Subscribers who are registered under any of the Learn From Home Programme initiative by YTL Foundation is eligible to participate in this Promotion (“Eligible Subscribers”).
3. Applicable Terms & Conditions. Subject only to the variations as expressly set out herein (“Promo T&Cs”), all other terms and conditions incorporated in the Prepaid Service Terms and Conditions and Yes 4G LTE Prepaid Plan Terms and Conditions available at www.yes.my/tnc shall remain valid and applicable to this Promotion (collectively referred as “ General Applicable Terms and Conditions”). In the event of any inconsistency between the General Applicable Terms and Conditions and these Promo T&Cs, these Promo T&Cs shall prevail to the extent of any such inconsistency. Words in capital not defined herein shall have the same meaning ascribed to in the General Applicable Terms and Conditions.
4. Promotion Period. The Promotion will commence on 25 July 2020, 12:00 a.m. and continue until further notice (“Promotion Period”).
5. The Promotion.
5.1 The service offerings under the LFH Exclusive Deal Monthly 20GB RM20 (“ LFH Data Add-On”) is stated below:
Data Add-On Plan Name Price 4G LTE Data Capacity Data Add-On Validity Period
LFH Exclusive Deal Monthly 20GB RM 20 RM20 20GB 30 days from the subscription date
5.2 An Eligible Subscriber may purchase the LFH Data Add-On only via any of the following channels namely:-
(a)YES Store;
(b)YES Dealer;
(c) MyYes4G App;
(d) Express Pay; and
(e) My Account.
5.3 If an Eligible Subscriber purchases multiple LFH Data Add-On, the Eligible Subscriber’s Account Validity Period will be extended accordingly based on the last LFH Data Add-On successful purchase date. For example, if an Eligible Subscriber’s Account Validity Period ends on 30 April 2020, and on 25 April 2020 he/she purchases a LFH Data Add-On and again on 28 April 2020, the Eligible Subscribers purchases another Prepaid Data Add-On, in such instance, his/her Account Validity Period will be extended to 27 May 2020 based on the LFH Add-On purchased by him on 28 April 2020.
5.4 In determining the quota usage priority, the following shall apply:-
5.4.1 if an Eligible Subscriber purchases multiple LFH Data Add-On, quota will be drawn from the LFH Data Add-On which expires first based on first in first out policy; and
5.4.2 if an Eligible Subscriber purchases an LFH Data Add-On, together with any other prepaid data add-on offered for purchase by YTLC under any of the applicable Prepaid Service Plan, quota will be drawn from the prepaid data add-on which expires first based on first in first out policy. For the avoidance of doubt, multiple purchase of prepaid data-add on will not extend the Account Validity Period.
6. Unused Data. At the expiry of the Data Add-On Validity Period, any balance data in the LFH Data Add-On which remains unutilised shall be automatically forfeited.
7. Limitation of Liability. YTLC shall not be liable for any loss or damage (including without limitation loss of use, loss of income, profits or goodwill, direct or indirect, incidental, consequential, exemplary, punitive or special damages of any party including third parties) howsoever arising whether in contract, tort, negligence or otherwise, in connection with this Promotion.
8. LawsThis Promotion shall in all respect be governed by the laws of Malaysia.
9. Modifications. YTLC reserves the right to, at any time, add to, delete, vary or amend the terms and conditions herein or change or modify any aspect of the Promotion, in whole or in part at any time and from time to time and at its sole discretion without notice and without liability to the Eligible Subscribers or any other party. Without prejudice to the aforesaid, YTLC reserves the right to cancel, terminate or suspend the Promotion at any time before or during the Promotion Period with notice but without any liability or compensation whatsoever.

Last updated:25 July 2019

1. The Promotion. The Samsung Galaxy A10 with Yes Postpaid 48 & 78 Plan Bundle Promotion ("the Promotion") is a time-limited offer launched by YTL Communications Sdn Bhd ("YTLC").
2. Applicable Terms & Conditions: Subject only to the variations as expressly set out in these Promotion Terms and Conditions herein (“Promo T&Cs”), all other terms and conditions incorporated in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions and the Postpaid Service Plans Terms & Conditions available at www.yes.my/tnc shall be applicable and be binding upon You (collectively referred to as the “Postpaid Terms and Conditions”). In the event of any inconsistency between the Postpaid Terms and Conditions and these Promo T&Cs, these Promo T&Cs shall prevail to the extent of any such inconsistency.
3. Promotion Period. The Promotion will commence on 25th July 2019 and shall continue until further notice ("Promotion Period").
4. The Promotion Bundle.
4.1 Subject to Clause 4.2 below, each Subscriber may subscribe to any one of the bundled plan listed below under the Promotion:-
(a) Yes LTE 48 with one (1) unit of Samsung Galaxy A10 (“Yes 48 LTE Bundle”); or
(b) Yes LTE 78 with one (1) unit of Samsung Galaxy A10 (“Yes 78 LTE Bundle”). (collectively referred to as “Promotion Bundle”).
4.2 Subscriber subscribing to the:-
(a) Yes 48 LTE Bundle shall be subject to a contract period of twenty four (24) months from the date of subscription; or (b)
(b) Yes 78 LTE Bundle shall be subject to a contract period of twelve (12) months from the date of subscription.
5. Service Offerings & Commitment Fee
5.1The service offerings and Commitment Fee under the Promotion Bundle are as follows:-
(a) Each Subscriber subscribing to the Yes 48 LTE Bundle will enjoy:-
(i) Data Capacity Allocation of 15GB 4G LTE data; and (ii) free unlimited On-Net Services for a Commitment Fee of RM 48 only.
(b)Each Subscriber subscribing to the Yes 78 LTE Bundle will enjoy:-
(i) Data Capacity Allocation of 30GB 4G LTE data;
(ii) free unlimited On-Net Services; and
(iii) free Off-Net Services of up to 200 voice call minutes only during the Contract Period for a Commitment Fee of RM78 only.
For the avoidance of doubt and clarity, (a) during the Contract Period, Charges will be imposed on Off-Net Services of SMS and (b)at the expiration of the Contract Period, Charges will be imposed on Subscriber’s use of all Off-Net Services in accordance with the voice calls and SMS rates as more particularly stated in our website at https://www.yes.my/.
6. Payment Upon Registration.
6.1 In addition to the Commitment Fee, Subscriber shall also pay the following on the date of registration date of the Promotion Bundle:-
(a) a non-refundable activation fee of RM100 only; and
(b) RM 198 as upfront payment (“Upfront Payment”). The Upfront Payment will be returned to such Subscriber as a rebate on the Subscriber’s Bill for twelve (12) Billing Cycles commencing on the 1st Billing Cycle in the following manner:-
(a) the sum of RM 17 per month commencing from the 1st Billing Cycle until the 11th Billing Cycle; and
(b) the sum of RM 11 per month on the 12th Billing Cycle.

6.2 If the Subscriber is a non-Malaysian, in addition to the sums mentioned in Clause 6.1 of these Promo T&Cs, such Subscriber shall pay a deposit of RM200 which will be refunded to the Subscriber, free of interest, 45 days of the termination of the Promotion Bundle in accordance with the Postpaid Terms and Conditions subject always to any such deduction which may be due to Us.
7. Addition/Removal of Service Plan. We reserve the right to add or remove any one or all of the plans within the Promotion Bundle at any time during the Promotion Period.
8. Not Exchangeable for Cash. For the avoidance of doubt, a Subscriber having subscribed to the Promotion Bundle will not be entitled to exchange the same for cash or any other product and/or service, including any other Postpaid Service Plan offered by Us, during the Contract Period.
9. Early Termination Charges:If a Subscriber terminates the Promotion Bundle subscribed at any time before the expiry of the Contract Period or if the Service account is terminated by Us as a result of Subscriber’s breach of the Postpaid Terms and Conditions and/or these Promo T&Cs, the Early Termination Charges as more particularly stated in the Postpaid Terms and Conditions shall apply accordingly.
10. Warranty. Each Samsung Galaxy A10 provided under the Promotion shall be subject to its respective manufacturer's warranty.
11. Exclusion of Liability on Use of Samsung Galaxy A10.We shall not be liable for any loss, damage and/or or injury suffered by You or any person claiming through You through Your use of the Samsung Galaxy A10.
12. Right to Change.We reserve the right to change, modify and/or amend these Promo T&Cs from time to time during the Promotion Period. Any change, modification and/or amendment to these Promo T&Cs will be deemed to be effective upon a notice being placed on Our official website or sent digitally to all affected Subscribers.
13. Words in Capital.All words in capital, unless otherwise defined herein, shall have the same meaning ascribed in the Postpaid Terms and Conditions.

Campaigns

Dated: 5th February 2022

  1. The Free Fire Plan.
    The YES FT5G Free Fire SIM Pack Plan (“Free Fire Plan”) is a time-limited plan launched by YTL Communications Sdn Bhd (Company No.200701035605 (793634-V)) (“YTLC”) in collaboration with Garena Online Private Limited (Company No. 200908142H)(“Garena”).
  2. Eligibility.
    This Free Fire Plan is open to all Malaysians and non-Malaysians residing in Malaysia aged 12 years and above with a compatible 5G smartphone (“Eligible Subscribers”). (Please visit http://www.yes.my/supported-devices to identify smartphones that support the YES 5G-enabled SIM Card.) Where applicable, it is for the subscriber to obtain parental consent.
  3. Applicable Terms & Conditions:
    Subject only to the variations as expressly set out herein (“Free Fire Plan T&Cs”), all other terms and conditions incorporated in the Prepaid Service Terms and Conditions, Yes 4G LTE Prepaid Plan Terms and Conditions, Prepaid Kasi Up LTE SIM Plan Terms and Conditions, Prepaid Data Add-On Terms and Conditions, Kasi Up Unlimited and Kasi Up Turbo 5GB Prepaid LTE Data Add-On Promotion Terms and Conditions available at www.yes.my/tnc (collectively referred as “General Applicable Terms and Conditions”) shall remain valid and applicable to this Free Fire Plan. In the event of any inconsistency between the General Applicable Terms and Conditions and these Free Fire Plan T&Cs, these Free Fire Plan T&Cs shall prevail to the extent of any such inconsistency. Words in capital not defined herein shall have the same meaning ascribed to in the General Applicable Terms and Conditions.
  4. Free Fire Plan Period.
    This Free Fire Plan will be available from 12th February 2022, 12:00 a.m. or its official launch date as stated, and shall continue until 31st March 2022, 11:59 p.m. (“Campaign Period”).
  5. Application for Free Fire Plan SIM Pack.
    5.1 The Free Fire Plan is only available for application and subscription on the YES Online Store from 12 February 2022.

    5.2 Pre-order registration of the Free Fire Plan for Eligible Subscribers will be given a unique link during the Garena Free Fire Online Tournament from 5 February 2022 onwards. Upon its official launch date, all pre-orders will be converted into orders and delivered to the registered Eligible Subscriber, subject to Clause 5.3 below.

    5.3 All pre-orders and registrations will be verified for eligibility and thereafter an email notification will be sent to inform the applicant of the successful application or otherwise. The Free Fire Plan SIM pack will be delivered to the successful applicant at the address provided in the application form. It is the applicant’s responsibility to ensure that it has a compatible 5G smartphone.

    5.4 Each Free Fire Plan SIM pack consists of one (1) 5G-enabled SIM Card and a YES Mobile Number.
  6. The Free Fire Item Code & Redemption
    6.1. Subject to Clause 6.2 below, this Free Fire Plan comes with one (1) Free Fire Item Code on a first-come-first-served basis while stocks last.

    6.2. Each Eligible Subscriber is entitled to redeem one (1) Free Fire Item Code only. Duplicate or multiple redemptions per National Registration Identification Card (NRIC) or Passport is not allowed. In the event that YTLC discovers duplicate or multiple redemptions by an Eligible Subscriber, YTLC will reserves the right to cancel the Item Code without any notice or liability to the Eligible Subscriber.

    6.3. This Free Fire Item Code can only be used in the Garena Free Fire – Illuminate application or Garena Free Fire MAX application (“Garena Free Fire”) and the Eligible Subscriber will randomly receive only one of the Legendary Gun Skin Box, Parachute Skin, or Costume Skin Bundle. It cannot be exchanged or refunded for cash.

    6.4. The Free Fire Item Code will be sent only after the activation of the Free Fire Plan SIM Card. The notification for the Free Fire Item Code will be sent via a push notification on the MyYes App within or after 24 hours of the SIM Card activation. Eligible Subscribers must ensure that they have downloaded the MyYes app, and enabled the permission for push notifications to be sent through the MyYes App to receive the Free Fire Item Code.

    6.5. The Free Fire Item Code is valid until 5 July 2022 (“Item Code Expiry Date”). The Free Fire Item Code must be redeemed before the Item Code Expiry Date or it will be forfeited after the Item Code Expiry Date.

    6.6. Each Eligible Subscriber is also required to comply with Garena’s Free Fire terms and conditions available at https://content.garena.com/legal/tos/tos_en.html. It is the Eligible Subscriber’s obligation to adhere to the Garena Free Fire terms and conditions, including any requisite parental consent. For any inquiries regarding any invalid or used Free Fire Item Code, please contact the support centre for Garena Free Fire.

    6.7 Upon successful activation of SIM Card, Eligible Subscriber will receive One (1) Free Fire Item Code per National Registration Identification Card (NRIC) or Passport within or after 24 hours of the SIM Card activation date.
  7. The Free Fire Plan and Charges.
    The particulars of the Free Fire Plan are as below:-
    Plan Name YES FT5G Free Fire Plan
    Price FREE
    Internet Data 10GB 4G LTE Data (with hotspot)
    Account Validity Period 30 days
    (from the date of activation of the SIM Card)
    Service Validity Period 30 days
    (from the date of activation of the SIM Card)
    On-Net Services of domestic voice calls Unlimited
    Off-Net Services of domestic voice calls RM 0.09 per minute
    On-Net Services of domestic SMS Unlimited
    Off-Net Services of domestic SMS RM 0.09 per SMS
    Special Offer (i) Unlimited 5G service* until 31st March 2022
    (with hotspot uncapped)
    (ii) Free internet when using Free Fire application**
    * Within 5G coverage areas only
    ** The internet quota will not be used when you access to Garena Free Fire application. Whitelisting of mobile data utilised for Garena Free Fire Applications without deduction of mobile data consumption are based on a best effort basis. There may be instances that whitelisting may not be possible and mobile data consumption may be captured. This may be due to technical or other errors or issues such as changes or updates to the Garena Free Fire Application’s IP Addresses or any configuration or other technical requirements that have not been notified to YES to enable the said whitelisting. This extra free service of free internet for use of the Garena Free Fire application, is not guaranteed and it is subject to change in such instances. YES will not be liable for any refund or reimbursement of mobile data particularly where it cannot be determined at our end for whitelisting.

    7.1. There are no charges for the initial order and registration of the Free Fire Plan during the Campaign Period.

    7.2. Upon receipt of the SIM Card, the Eligible Subscriber is required to perform a one-time activation of the SIM Card within a period of thirty (30) days from the date of receipt of the SIM Card, failing which the SIM Card can no longer be activated and no replacement SIM Card will be provided.

    7.3. The initial Account Validity Period for the Free Fire Plan is for a period of 30 days from the date of activation of the SIM Card (“Initial Activation Period”). Eligible Subscribers will have to purchase any of the available Yes Prepaid reload or data add-ons on the website or via the MyYes app for continued Account Validity Period after the initial 30 days.

    7.4. Where the Free Fire Plan continues to have an active account validity, Eligible Subscribers will be able to use the Garena Free Fire game application without any mobile data consumption deducted until further notice and subject to any changes of the Free Fire Plan terms.

    7.5. The unlimited On-Net Services are exclusive for Your use in Malaysia only and applicable for communications between person-to-person personal use and not commercial use. Therefore, conference calling, re-supply, call centre usage, telemarketing, bulk messaging, application-to-person communication, continuously call forwarding, auto-dialling, machine-to-machine communication (including by using Your SIM Card in any other devices), Cellular Trunking Units (CTUs), or any other activities are considered non-standard usage and is therefore prohibited.

    7.6 YES 5G Network Coverage

    7.6.1. The Free Fire Plan may enjoy the service offerings under the 5G network until 31st March 2022; thereafter, the service offerings will be on a 4G network. During the 5G availability period, It is also eligible for purchase of the FT5G Data Add-On (as specified in Clause 6 of the YES First To 5G Campaign Terms and Conditions), or the Kasi Up Turbo 5GB Prepaid LTE Data Add-On (as specified in the Kasi Up Unlimited and Kasi Up Turbo 5GB Prepaid LTE Data Add-On Promotion Terms and Conditions).

    7.6.2 Please take note that certain areas may not be within 5G network coverage. Where there are no 5G network coverage, the Subscriber can enjoy uninterrupted 4G connectivity on our YES network, subject to a limit of 10 GB of 4G LTE Data during the Initial Activation Period.

    7.6.3. The 5G internet speed on the Free Fire Plan fully depends on the 5G network coverage in such area.

    7.7. Charges & SST

    7.7.1 Save as expressly provided herein, there will be no charges imposed on Eligible Subscriber use of domestic On-Net Services.( i.e. from YES to YES numbers. Please note that not all 018 numbers are YES numbers). However, the following charges will be imposed on Eligible Subscriber’s use of domestic Off-Net Services (non-YES numbers):-
    Type of Off Net Services Rates (RM) Charging Block
    (in seconds)
    Voice Calls RM 0.09 / minute 30
    SMS RM 0.09/SMS -

    7.7.2 Charges will be imposed on Eligible Subscriber’s use of all IDD Service in accordance with the voice calls and SMS rates published at https://www.yes.my/roaming.

    7.7.3 For clarity, charges will apply for voice calls to special and toll free numbers, including but not limited to those numbers listed below:-
    Destination Prefix Rates (RM) Charging Block (in seconds)
    Freephone 1800 FREE 30
    Toll Free 1300 0.09/min 30
    TM Customer Careline 100 2.00/call Flat Rate/Per Call
    General Emergency Service 999 / 112 FREE 30
    TM Directory Enquiry 103 2.00/call Flat Rate/Per Call
    Electricity Fault Reporting 15454 0.15/min 30
    Pengurusan Air Selangor 15300 0.15/min 30
    Syarikat Air Melaka 15800 0.15/min 30
    Talian Nur 15999 FREE 30
    Time Announcement 1051 0.10/min 30

    7.7.4. All charges shown on the website and the MyYes App, are exclusive of any sales and service taxes under the Sales Tax Act 2018 and/or the Service Tax Act 2018 (collectively as “SST”) unless otherwise stipulated.
  8. Limitation of Liability.
    YTLC shall not be liable for any loss or damage (including without limitation loss of use, loss of income, profits or goodwill, direct or indirect, incidental, consequential, exemplary, punitive or special damages of any party including third parties) howsoever arising whether in contract, tort, negligence or otherwise, in connection with this Programme.
  9. Laws.
    This Free Fire Plan shall in all respect be governed by the laws of Malaysia.
  10. Modifications.
    YTLC reserves the right to, at any time, add to, delete, vary or amend the terms and conditions herein or change or modify any aspect of this Programme, in whole or in part at any time and from time to time and at its sole discretion without notice and without liability to the Eligible Subscribers or any other party. Without prejudice to the aforesaid, YTLC reserves the right to cancel, terminate or suspend this Programme at any time before or during the Programme Period with notice but without any liability or compensation whatsoever.

Dated: 10th January 2022

  1. The Programme.
    The YES FT5G Discover SIM Pack Programme (“Programme”) is a time-limited programme launched by YTL Communications Sdn Bhd (Company No.200701035605 (793634-V)) (“YTLC”).
  2. Eligibility.
    The Programme is open to all Malaysians and non-Malaysians residing in Malaysia aged 12 years and above with 5G smartphone (“Eligible Subscribers”). (Please visit www.yes.my/supported-devices to determine which of the smartphones can support the 5G-enabled SIM Card.)
  3. Applicable Terms & Conditions:
    Subject only to the variations as expressly set out herein (“Programme T&Cs”), all other terms and conditions incorporated in the Prepaid Service Terms and Conditions, Yes 4G LTE Prepaid Plan Terms and Conditions, Prepaid Kasi Up LTE SIM Plan Terms and Conditions, Prepaid Data Add-On Terms and Conditions, Kasi Up Unlimited and Kasi Up Turbo 5GB Prepaid LTE Data Add-On Promotion Terms and Conditions and YES First To 5G Campaign Terms and Conditions available at www.yes.my/tnc (collectively referred as “General Applicable Terms and Conditions”) shall remain valid and applicable to this Programme. In the event of any inconsistency between the General Applicable Terms and Conditions and these Programme T&Cs, these Programme T&Cs shall prevail to the extent of any such inconsistency. Words in capital not defined herein shall have the same meaning ascribed to in the General Applicable Terms and Conditions.
  4. Programme Period.
    This Programme will commence on 10th January 2022, 12:00 a.m. and continue until 14th February 2022, 11:59 p.m. (“Programme Period”).
  5. Application for YES FT5G Discover SIM Pack.
    5.1 Application for the YES FT5G Discover SIM Pack may be made via any of the following channels only namely:-
    (a) MyYes app; and
    (b) www.yes.my

    5.2 Upon receipt of an application, YTLC will verify if the eligibility criteria in Clause 2 has been met and thereafter an email notification will be sent to inform the applicant if his/her application is successful or otherwise. If the application is successful, the YES FT5G Discover SIM Pack will be delivered to the successful applicant at the address provided in the application form.

    5.3 Each YES FT5G Discover SIM Pack consists of one (1) 5G-enabled SIM Card and a YES Mobile Number.
  6. The Programme.
    6.1 The Service offering under the YES FT5G Discover SIM Pack are as stated below:-
    Plan Name YES FT5G Discover Plan
    Price FREE
    Internet Data 10GB 4G LTE Data (with hotspot)
    Account Validity Period 30 days
    (from the date of activation of the SIM Card)
    Service Validity Period 30 days
    (from the date of activation of the SIM Card)
    On-Net Services of domestic voice calls Unlimited
    Off-Net Services of domestic voice calls RM 0.09 per minute
    On-Net Services of domestic SMS Unlimited
    Off-Net Services of domestic SMS RM 0.09 per SMS
    Special Offer Unlimited 5G service* until 31st March 2022
    (with hotspot uncapped)
    * Within 5G coverage areas only

    6.2 There will be no charges for the YES FT5G Discover SIM Pack during the Programme Period.

    6.3 Each Eligible Subscriber is entitled to register one (1) YES FT5G Discover SIM Pack only provided that the Eligible Subscriber does not have, in aggregate, more than five (5) prepaid service accounts with YES.

    6.4 Upon receipt of the SIM Card, the Eligible Subscriber is required to perform a one-time activation of the SIM Card within a period of thirty (30) days from the date of receipt of the SIM Card, failing which the SIM Card can no longer be activated and no replacement SIM Card will be provided.

    6.5 A Subscriber of the YES FT5G Discover SIM Pack may enjoy the service offerings under the 5G network until 31st March 2022; thereafter, the service offerings will be on a 4G network. Such Subscriber may also purchase the FT5G Data Add-On as specified in Clause 6 of the YES First To 5G Campaign Terms and Conditions or the Kasi Up Turbo 5GB Prepaid LTE Data Add-On as specified in the Kasi Up Unlimited and Kasi Up Turbo 5GB Prepaid LTE Data Add-On Promotion Terms and Conditions.

    6.6 Please take note that certain areas may not be within 5G network coverage. In such instance, a Subscriber of the YES FT5G Discover SIM Pack will continue to enjoy uninterrupted 4G connectivity on our YES network.

    6.7 The 5G internet speed on the YES FT5G Discover SIM Pack fully depends on the 5G network coverage in such area.

    6.8 The 5G-enabled SIM Card can only be used on certain types of smartphones. As such, please visit www.yes.my/supported-devices to determine which of the smartphones can support the 5G-enabled SIM Card.

    6.9 The unlimited On-Net Services are exclusive for Your use in Malaysia only and applicable for communications between person-to-person personal use and not commercial use. Therefore, conference calling, re-supply, call centre usage, telemarketing, bulk messaging, application-to-person communication, continuously call forwarding, auto-dialling, machine-to-machine communication (including by using Your SIM Card in any other devices), Cellular Trunking Units (CTUs), or any other activities are considered non-standard usage and is therefore prohibited.

    6.10 Charges & SST

    6.10.1 Save as expressly provided herein, there will be no charges imposed on Eligible Subscriber use of domestic On-Net Services. However, the following charges will be imposed on Eligible Subscriber’s use of domestic Off-Net Services:-

    Type of Off Net Services Rates (RM) Charging Block
    (in seconds)
    Voice Calls RM 0.09 / minute 30
    SMS RM 0.09/SMS -

    6.10.2 Charges will be imposed on Eligible Subscriber’s use of all IDD Service in accordance with the voice calls and SMS rates published @ https://www.yes.my/roaming.

    6.10.3 For clarity, charges will apply for voice calls to special and toll free numbers, including but not limited to those numbers listed below:-

    Destination Prefix Rates (RM) Charging Block (in seconds)
    Freephone 1800 FREE 30
    Toll Free 1300 0.09/min 30
    TM Customer Careline 100 2.00/call Flat Rate/Per Call
    General Emergency Service 999 / 112 FREE 30
    TM Directory Enquiry 103 2.00/call Flat Rate/Per Call

    Syarikat Air Melaka 15800 0.15/min 30
