This Promotion including the Contest shall in all respects be governed by the laws of Malaysia and by participating in the Promotion, participants submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Malaysia.
10. Modifications.
Yes reserves the right to at any time, add to, delete, vary or amend the terms and conditions herein or change or modify any aspect of this Promotion and/or the Contest, in whole or in part at any time and from time to time and at its sole discretion without notice and without liability to the participants or any other party. Without prejudice to the aforesaid, Yes reserves the right to cancel, terminate or suspend this Promotion and/or the Contest at any time before or during the Promotion Period with due notice but without any liability or compensation whatsoever. In the event of such cancellation, termination or suspension of this Promotion and/or the Contest, Yes may at its sole and absolute discretion choose not to award the Free Yes Reload, the prizes in respect of the Contest or choose not to select any winner under the Contest.
11. Disruption of Contest.
Without prejudice to Clause 10 above, if for any reason this Promotion and/or the Contest is not capable of running as planned or is disrupted for reasons due to and including without limitation network failure, infection by computer virus, bugs, tampering, unauthorized intervention, fraud, technical failures or any other causes beyond the control of Yes or any party responsible for the running of any aspect of this Contest which corrupts or affects the administration or proper conduct of this Contest, Yes reserves all rights in Clause 10 above and further reserves the right at its sole and absolute discretion to disqualify any individual or party who tampers or cheat with the processes or mechanics of this Promotion and/or the Contest and Yes may take any action (including legal action) against such individual or party. Yes shall not be responsible for technical errors in telecommunications networks, internet access or otherwise preventing participation in this Promotion and/or entry to the Contest.
12. Disclosure Rights.
By participating in the Promotion and/or the Contest, all participants hereby grant to Yes express permission as well as a non-exclusive, royalty-free, worldwide license to publish, print, reproduce, disseminate or share their respective entry, likeness and identity (excluding any sensitive personal information as defined by the Personal Data Protection Act 2010) for editorial, advertising, promotional, marketing or other purposes, without further compensation, for an unlimited period of time, in any of Yes' publications, in any form or any media, whether for public consumption or otherwise, unless prohibited by law.
13. Disqualification and/or Rejection of Entries.
Yes reserves the right to disqualify any participant and/or winner at its sole and absolute discretion on the grounds of non-compliance with any of the Terms herein. For the avoidance of doubt, the foregoing is not meant to limit or curtail the rights of Yes, who may also reject any participation without having to assign any reasons whatsoever. Participants accept that a decision to disqualify and/or reject a participation and/or winner shall be final and not subject to appeal. In the event of a disqualification after the prize has been awarded, Yes reserves the right to demand for the return of the prize or payment of its value from the ineligible or disqualified winner.
14. Judging Criteria and Judging Process.
Yes reserves the sole and absolute discretion to determine the winners of the Contest, which will be determined in accordance with the winning process mentioned above. The judges' decision shall be final and no appeals or disputes will be entertained.
15. General Indemnification.
Participants shall indemnify Yes against all and any costs, expenses, damages, liability or injury (whether physical in nature or against the reputation of any party) incurred by Yes, arising out of or relating to the participant's participation of the Promotion and/or the Contest and or participant's acceptance, use or misuse of prizes, including but not limited to any of the participant's acts, omissions, statements, publications whatsoever as may be in breach of any law or legal rights, as the case may be.
16. Third Party's Rights and Indemnification.
By participating in this Promotion and/or the Contest, the participant warrants that all personal details, answers, responses and/or entries to this Promotion are the participant's own information are true and/or accurate. Participants agree to indemnify and keep indemnified Yes against all claims, losses, damages and/or expenses whatsoever arising from any infringement or violation of any third party's rights in relation to the submission of entries under this Promotion.
17. Survivability of Terms.
Any delay, waiver, non-enforcement, modification, amendment, withdrawal or substitution of any term or condition contained herein shall not affect the operation of the other terms or conditions so affected by such a waiver, non-enforcement, modification, amendment, withdrawal or substitution and which shall remain in full force and effect.
18. Non-compliance.
Failure to comply with these Terms will result in disqualification of the relevant participant.
19. Facebook Promotion Policy.
This Promotion and/or the Contest is in no way sponsored, endorsed or administered by, or associated with Facebook. Each participant acknowledges that the information and contents provided by the respective participant for this Contest are to Yes and not to Facebook and by entering this Contest the participants hereby expressly release Facebook from any responsibilities or liabilities in connection with this Contest. Last updated: 19th January 2017

1. The Contest. "Yes Car-Oke" contest ("Contest") is an online contest organised by YTL Communications Sdn Bhd (" YTLC"). There is no entry fee and no purchase necessary to enter this Contest.
2. Eligibility. This Contest is open to all Malaysians aged 18 and above as at 20th January 2017 (ie. the contest start date) EXCEPT for employees of YTLC (including its affiliated and related companies), sponsors, advertising/promotional agencies, dealers, retailers, suppliers of YTLC (including their affiliated and related companies), and their respective immediate family members*.
*Immediate family members mean any of the following: spouse, ex-spouse, de-facto spouse, child or step-child (whether natural or by adoption), parent, step-parent, grandparent, step-grandparent, uncle, aunt, niece, nephew, brother, sister, step-brother, step-sister or first cousin.
3. Terms and Conditions. Each participant agrees that he/she has read and understood all the terms and conditions herein (" Terms") and by his or her participation in this Contest, each participant agrees to be bound by the Terms.
4. Contest Period.This Contest runs from 20th January 2017 to 31st January 2017, 11.59pm (" Contest Period"). Entries will be accepted online starting on 20th January 2017. Any online entries received after 31st January 2017, 11.59pm will be disqualified.
5. How to participate.
(a) To participate in this Contest and stand a chance of winning the cash prizes offered, each participant is required to do the following:

(i) "Like" the Yes4G Facebook page at www.facebook.com/Yes4G.
(ii) In your car, get your music on your device ready.
(iii) Go to Facebook app on your mobile, and tap on “Live” icon.
(iv) Change your privacy settings to “Public”.
(v) Type #YesCarOke and #AmazingThingsHappenWhenYouSayYes on the “Live” description section.
(vi) Start your music and tap “Go Live” at Facebook and start singing along with the music for a minimum of 30 seconds in your car.
(vii) Go to www.yes.my/yescaroke to fill in the Contest form and follow the instructions at the website for steps to copy the Facebook Live video URL and submit the form on the same page accordingly.

(b) Multiple entries from the same participant are accepted. However, a participant is allowed to win only one Cash Prize throughout the Contest Period.
6. Winner selection process.
(a) Throughout the Contest Period, twenty (22) winners will be selected each day (“Daily Winners”) among all the participants who have submitted their entries to the Contest in accordance Clause 6 from 12.00am to 11.59pm for the respective day. The Daily Winners will be selected by YTLC’s panel of judges based on their creativity and entertainment value.
(b) At the end of the Contest Period, the best entry submission among the Daily Winners will be selected to be the Grand Prize Winner as well.
(c) If there are less than 22 participants on any one day during the Contest Period, all the qualified participants for that day will be selected to be the Daily Winners of that day.
(d) Each of the Daily Winners will be required to sign, and return to YTLC, a "winner's declaration form" as prescribed by YTLC in order to receive the cash prize. Any Daily Winner who refuse or fails to submit the declaration form as required shall be disqualified to receive the prize.
7. Contest Prizes: Subject to Clause 6 (d) above, the Daily Winners as selected in accordance with Clause 6 above will each receive a cash prize of RM188 only if the Daily Winner is an Active Yes Subscriber or RM88 only if the Daily Winner is not an Active Yes Subscriber., The Grand Prize Winner as selected in accordance with Clause 6 (b) above will further receive a cash prize of RM3,888 only if the Grand Prize Winner is an Active Yes Subscriber or RM888 only if the Grand Prize Winner is not an Active Yes Subscriber.

"Active Yes Subscribers" are Prepaid or Postpaid subscribers with active Yes accounts for thirty (30) days or more as of 20th January 2017.
8. Announcement and Notification of Winners. The names of the Daily Winners and the Grand Prize Winner will be announced at www.facebook.com/Yes4G and www.yes.my/yescaroke within three (3) weeks from the closing date of the Contest Period. YTLC reserves the right to select an alternative winner at any time if a winner is disqualified or where YTLC has reasonable ground(s) for believing that the initially selected winner has contravened any of the terms of this Contest. The same selection process and criteria as applied for this Contest will similarly apply for the selection of an alternative winner. The final winners of this Contest will be notified by YTLC through Facebook message and/or phone calls by YTLC with regards to the mode of payment to be made for the cash prize.
9. Exclusions: All contest prizes are given and accepted entirely at the risk of the relevant contest winners. Any and all prize-related expenses, including tax liabilities (if any) in relation to this Contest, prize and/or use or enjoyment of the same, shall be the sole responsibility of winner. YTLC shall not be held liable for (a) any delay in performing or partial/total failure to perform any of its obligations to the winners under this Contest if such delay or failure is caused by circumstances beyond the reasonable control of YTLC, its affiliates, authorized dealers/distributors, agents or suppliers; and (b) any losses, damage to property, injury, or death resulting from or related to participant's participation or inability to participate in this Contest, or the use, misuse or inability to use the prize or any portion thereof.
10. Unconditional Agreement. Acceptance of the prize constitutes the winner's unconditional agreement and permission to YTLC and its agencies to use the winner's name, video footage, voices, photograph and/or likeness for purposes of advertising, editorial, promotional, marketing, trade and/or other purposes without further compensation and notice, unless prohibited by law. YTLC fully reserves its rights to such forms of publicity and publication.
11. Laws: This Contest shall in all respects be governed by the laws of Malaysia and by entering this Contest, participants shall submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Malaysia.
12. Modifications: YTLC reserves the right to add, delete, vary or amend the terms and conditions herein or change or modify any aspect of this Contest, in whole or in part at any time and from time to time and at its sole discretion without notice and without liability to the Contest participants or any other party. Without prejudice to the aforesaid, YTLC reserves the right to cancel, terminate or suspend this Contest at any time before or during the Contest Period with due notice but without any liability or compensation whatsoever. In the event of such cancellation, termination or suspension of this Contest, YTLC may at its sole and absolute discretion choose not to award the prizes in respect of this Contest or choose not to select any winner.
13. Disruption of Contest. Without prejudice to Clause 12 above, if for any reason this Contest is not capable of running as planned or is disrupted for reasons due to and including without limitation network failure, infection by computer virus, bugs, tampering, unauthorized intervention, fraud, technical failures or any other causes beyond the control of YTLC or any party responsible for the running of any aspect of this Contest which corrupts or affects the administration or proper conduct of this Contest, YTLC reserves all rights in Clause 12 above and further reserves the right at its sole and absolute discretion to disqualify any individual or party who tampers or cheat with the processes of this Contest and/or its mechanics and YTLC may take any action (including legal action) against such individual or party. YTLC shall not accept any responsibility for entries not received for whatever reason. YTLC shall not be responsible for technical errors in telecommunications networks, internet access or otherwise preventing entry to this Contest.
14. Disclosure Rights: By entering this Contest, each participant grants to YTLC express permission as well as a non-exclusive, royalty-free, worldwide license to publish, print, reproduce, disseminate or share such participant’s entry, name, video footage, voice, photograph and/or likeness and identity (excluding any sensitive personal information as defined by the Personal Data Protection Act 2010) for editorial, advertising, promotional, marketing or other purposes, without further compensation, for an unlimited period of time, in any of YTLC's publications, in any form or any media, whether for public consumption or otherwise, unless prohibited by law. Each participant further confirms that he/she has read and agreed to the terms in the YTL Group Privacy Policy available at http://www.ytl.com/privacypolicy.asp, and consents to the processing of the participant’s personal data by YTLC for the purposes stated in the YTL Group Privacy Policy, including for this Contest.
15. Disqualification and/or Rejection of Entries: YTLC reserves the right to disqualify any winner at its sole and absolute discretion on the grounds of non-compliance with any of the Terms herein. For the avoidance of doubt, the foregoing is not meant to limit or curtail the rights of YTLC, who may also reject an entry without having to assign any reasons whatsoever. Each participant accepts that a decision to disqualify and/or reject a winner shall be final and not subject to appeal. In the event of a disqualification after the prize has been awarded, YTLC reserves the right to demand for the return of the prize or payment of its value from the ineligible or disqualified participants.
16. Judging Criteria and Judging Process: YTLC reserves the sole and absolute discretion to determine the winners of this Contest, which will be determined in accordance with the winning process mentioned above. The judges' decision shall be final and no appeals or disputes will be entertained. Subject to YTLC's rights to replace a winner as provided herein, results once announced are deemed to be final and binding.
17. General Indemnification: Each participant shall indemnify YTLC against all and any demands, claims, costs, expenses, damages, liability or injury (whether physical in nature or against the reputation of any party) incurred by YTLC, arising out of or relating to the participant's participation in this Contest and/or participant's acceptance, use or misuse of prizes, including but not limited to the participant's acts, omissions, statements, publications whatsoever as may be in breach of any law or legal rights, as the case may be.
18. Third Party's Rights and Indemnification. By participating in this Contest, each participant warrants that (a) all personal details are the participant's own information, (b) all answers, responses and/or entries submitted in this Contest are true, accurate and original to the participant and that no other party has any rights to such information/materials. Each participant agrees to indemnify and keep indemnified YTLC against all claims, losses, damages and/or expenses whatsoever arising from any infringement or violation of any third party's rights in relation to the submission of any entry in this Contest.
19. Survivability of Terms: Any delay, waiver, non-enforcement, modification, amendment, withdrawal or substitution of any term or condition contained herein shall not affect the operation of the other terms or conditions so affected by such a waiver, non-enforcement, modification, amendment, withdrawal or substitution and which shall remain in full force and effect.
20. Non-compliance: Failure to comply with these Terms will result in disqualification of the relevant participant.
21. Facebook Promotion Policy: This Contest is in no way sponsored, endorsed or administered by, or associated with Facebook. Each participant acknowledges that the information and contents provided by the respective participant for this Contest are to YTLC and not to Facebook and by entering this Contest each participant hereby expressly release Facebook from any responsibilities or liabilities in connection with this Contest. Please refer to Facebook Data Use Policy and Statement of Rights and Responsibilities at https://www.facebook.com/page_guidelines.php.

Last updated: 4th January 2017

1. The Contest. "Find The Amazing Yes Chun Lian" contest (" Contest") is an online contest organised by YTL Communications Sdn Bhd (" YTLC"). There is no entry fee and no purchase necessary to enter this Contest.
2. Eligibility. This Contest is open to all Malaysians aged 18 and above as at 6th January 2017 (ie. the contest start date) EXCEPT for employees of YTLC (including its affiliated and related companies), sponsors, advertising/promotional agencies, and other related agencies, dealers, retailers, suppliers of YTLC (including its affiliated and related companies), and their respective immediate family members*.
*Immediate family members mean any of the following: spouse, ex-spouse, de-facto spouse, child or step-child (whether natural or by adoption), parent, step-parent, grandparent, step-grandparent, uncle, aunt, niece, nephew, brother, sister, step-brother, step-sister or first cousin.
3. Terms and Conditions. Each participant agrees that he/she has read and understood all the terms and conditions herein ("Terms") and by his or her participation in this Contest, each participant agrees to be bound by the Terms.
4. Contest Period. This Contest runs from 6th January 2017, 12pm to 27th January 2017, 11.59pm (" Contest Period"). Entries will be accepted online starting on 6th January 2017. Any online entries received after 27th January 2017, 11.59pm will be disqualified.
5. How to participate.
(a) To participate in this Contest and stand a chance of winning the cash prizes offered, each participant is required to do the following:

(i) "Like" the Yes4G Facebook page at www.facebook.com/Yes4G.
(ii) Watch Yes 4G’s Chinese New Year 360 video at (video link).
(iii) Find the 14 Chinese characters that are hidden within the video.
(iv) Click on the link to lead to Yes.my microsite to fill up the contest form with all the 14 Chinese characters in the correct sequence to form the "Chun Lian", and submit.
(v) Contest ends on 27th January at 11.59pm.

(b) Multiple entries from the same participant are accepted. However, a participant is allowed to win only one Cash Prize throughout the Contest Period.
6. Winner selection process.

(a) After the Contest Period, all the participants who have submitted the correct answers via the Yes.my microsite for the 14 characters in the correct sequence will be selected ("Selected Participants").

(b) There will be ten (10) consolation prizes and only one (1) Grand prize winner. On the 28th January 2017 at 7pm based on the correct submissions only, YTLC will draw eleven (11) names from the Selected Participants.
A call will be made to each of these Selected Participants whose names have been drawn to answer questions and give the correct answers. If the call is not answered or a wrong answer is given, a new name will be drawn from the remaining Selected Participants to answer the questions on the 28th January 2017 itself. The first participant to give all correct answers will be the winner of the grand cash prize as set out in clause 7 below.

(c) Each of the winners will be required sign, and return to YTLC, a "winner's declaration form" as prescribed by YTLC in order to receive the cash prize.
7. Contest Prizes: Subject to Clause 6 (c) above, the eleven (11) winners as selected in accordance with Clause 6 above will receive cash prizes as follows: (i) One (1) winner will receive the grand cash prize of RM8,888 only if the winner is an Active Yes Subscriber as defined below or RM3,888 only if the winner is a not an Active Yes Subscriber, and (ii) the remaining ten (10) winners will each receive a cash prize of RM288 only if the winner is an Active Yes Subscriber or RM 88 only if the winner is not an Active Yes Subscriber.
"Active Yes Subscribers" are Prepaid or Postpaid subscribers with active Yes accounts for thirty (30) days or more as of 28th January 2017. Active Yes Subscribers are eligible to win a higher cash prize amount under this Contest compared to participants who are non-Yes subscribers or Yes subscribers who are not Active Yes Subscribers.
8. Announcement and Notification of Winners. A video of Jack Lim and his family giving the correct sequence of the 14 characters to form the "Chun Lian" will be uploaded on Yes 4G Facebook page on 28th January at 10 a.m. The results of this Contest will be announced on Yes 4G's Facebook page on the 28th January 2017, 7 p.m. The name of the winners will be announced at www.facebook.com/Yes4G. YTLC reserves the right to select an alternative winner at any time if a winner is disqualified or where YTLC has reasonable ground(s) for believing that the initially selected winner has contravened any of the terms of this Contest. The same selection process and criteria as applied for this Contest will similarly apply for the selection of an alternative winner. Final winners of this Contest will be notified by YTLC with regards to the mode of payment to be made for the cash prize.
9. Exclusions: All contest prizes are given and accepted entirely at the risk of the relevant contest winners. Any and all prize-related expenses, including tax liabilities (if any) in relation to this Contest, prize and/or use or enjoyment of the same, shall be the sole responsibility of winner. YTLC shall not be held liable for (i) any delay in performing or partial/total failure to perform any of its obligations to the winners under this Contest if such delay or failure is caused by circumstances beyond the reasonable control of YTLC, its affiliates, authorized dealers/distributors, agents or suppliers, including without limitation delays, changes, disruptions, cancellations, diversions or substitutions howsoever caused including without limitation as a result of war, terrorist action or threatened terrorist action, strikes, hostilities, civil commotions, accidents, fire, flood or natural catastrophes or (ii) from any loss, damage to property, injury, or death resulting from or related to participant's participation or inability to participate in this Contest, or the use, misuse or inability to use the prize or any portion thereof.
10. Unconditional Agreement. Acceptance of the prize constitutes the winner's unconditional agreement and permission to YTLC and its agencies to use the winner's name, video footage, voices, photograph and/or likeness for purposes of advertising, editorial, promotional, marketing, trade and/or other purposes without further compensation and notice, unless prohibited by law. YTLC fully reserves its rights to such forms of publicity and publication.
11. Laws: This Contest shall in all respects be governed by the laws of Malaysia and by entering this Contest, participants submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Malaysia.
12. Modifications: YTLC reserves the right to add, delete, vary or amend the terms and conditions herein or change or modify any aspect of this Contest, in whole or in part at any time and from time to time and at its sole discretion without notice and without liability to the Contest participants or any other party. Without prejudice to the aforesaid, YTLC reserves the right to cancel, terminate or suspend this Contest at any time before or during the Contest Period with due notice but without any liability or compensation whatsoever. In the event of such cancellation, termination or suspension of this Contest, YTLC may at its sole and absolute discretion choose not to award the prizes in respect of this Contest or choose not to select any winner.
13. Disruption of Contest. Without prejudice to Clause 12 above, if for any reason this Contest is not capable of running as planned or is disrupted for reasons due to and including without limitation network failure, infection by computer virus, bugs, tampering, unauthorized intervention, fraud, technical failures or any other causes beyond the control of YTLC or any party responsible for the running of any aspect of this Contest which corrupts or affects the administration or proper conduct of this Contest, YTLC reserves all rights in Clause 12 above and further reserves the right at its sole and absolute discretion to disqualify any individual or party who tampers or cheat with the processes of this Contest and/or its mechanics and YTLC may take any action (including legal action) against such individual or party. YTLC shall not accept any responsibility for entries not received for whatever reason. YTLC shall not be responsible for technical errors in telecommunications networks, internet access or otherwise preventing entry to this Contest.
14. Disclosure Rights: By entering this Contest, all participants hereby grant to YTLC express permission as well as a non-exclusive, royalty-free, worldwide license to publish, print, reproduce, disseminate or share their respective entry, likeness and identity (excluding any sensitive personal information as defined by the Personal Data Protection Act 2010) for editorial, advertising, promotional, marketing or other purposes, without further compensation, for an unlimited period of time, in any of YTLC's publications, in any form or any media, whether for public consumption or otherwise, unless prohibited by law.
15. Disqualification and/or Rejection of Entries: YTLC reserves the right to disqualify any winner at its sole and absolute discretion on the grounds of non-compliance with any of the Terms herein. For the avoidance of doubt, the foregoing is not meant to limit or curtail the rights of YTLC, who may also reject an Entry without having to assign any reasons whatsoever. Participants accept that a decision to disqualify and/or reject a winner shall be final and not subject to appeal. In the event of a disqualification after the prize has been awarded, YTLC reserves the right to demand for the return of the prize or payment of its value from the ineligible or disqualified participants.
16. Judging Criteria and Judging Process: YTLC reserves the sole and absolute discretion to determine the winners of this Contest, which will be determined in accordance with the winning process mentioned above. The judges' decision shall be final and no appeals or disputes will be entertained. Subject to YTLC's rights to replace a winner as provided herein, results once announced are deemed to be final and binding.
17. General Indemnification: Participants shall indemnify YTLC against all and any demands, claims, costs, expenses, damages, liability or injury (whether physical in nature or against the reputation of any party) incurred by YTLC, arising out of or relating to the participant's participation in this Contest and or participant's acceptance, use or misuse of prizes, including but not limited to any of the participant's acts, omissions, statements, publications whatsoever as may be in breach of any law or legal rights, as the case may be.
18. Third Party's Rights and Indemnification. By participating in this Contest, the participant warrants that all personal details, answers, responses and/or entries submitted in this Contest are the participant's own information are true and/or accurate. Participants agree to indemnify and keep indemnified YTLC against all claims, losses, damages and/or expenses whatsoever arising from any infringement or violation of any third party's rights in relation to the submission of any Entry in this Contest.

Last updated: 14 November 2016

1. The Contest. "Find the Yes Man" contest (" Contest") is an online contest organised by YTL Communications Sdn Bhd (" YTLC").
2. Eligibility. This Contest is open to all Malaysians aged 18 and above as at 14 November 2016 (ie. the contest start date) EXCEPT for employees of YTLC (including its affiliated and related companies), sponsors, advertising/promotional agencies, and other related agencies, dealers, retailers, suppliers of YTLC (including its affiliated and related companies), and their respective immediate family members*.

*Immediate family members mean any of the following: spouse, ex-spouse, de-facto spouse, child or step-child (whether natural or by adoption), parent, step-parent, grandparent, step-grandparent, uncle, aunt, niece, nephew, brother, sister, step-brother, step-sister or first cousin.
3. Terms and Conditions. Each participant agrees that he/she has read and understood all the terms and conditions herein ("Terms") and by his or her participation in this Contest, each participant agrees to be bound by the Terms.
4. Contest Period. This Contest runs from 14 November 2016, 12pm to 11 December 2016, 11.59pm (" Contest Period").
5. How to participate.
(a) To participate in this Contest and stand a chance of winning the cash prizes offered, each participant is required to do the following:

(i) "LIKE" Yes 4G's Facebook page.
(ii) Look out for daily clue(s) on the Yes Man's whereabouts on Yes 4G Facebook page.
(iii) Decipher the clues and look for the Yes Man; asking the exact words "Are you the Yes Man?"
(iv) The first person to identify the Yes Man and asking the exact words will be the winner of the Daily Cash Prize (as specified in Clause 7 below) for that particular day.

(b) YTLC has the right to determine, in its sole and absolute discretion, the timing and duration of the Yes Man's daily appearance during the Contest Period.

(c) A participant is allowed to win only one Daily Cash Prize throughout the Contest Period notwithstanding that the participant may participate in this Contest on other days during the Contest Period. If there is no winner for this Contest on any particular day, the winner for the next day stand to gain double of the allocated Daily Cash Prize for the next day (ie. RM2, 000 (RM1, 000 x 2) if he/she is a Yes subscriber or RM1, 000 (RM500 x 2) if he/she is not a Yes subscriber, as the case may be.

(d) Notwithstanding Clause 5(c) above, a winner of the Daily Cash Prize is entitled to participate in this Contest on the last day of the Contest Period and stand a chance to win the Grand Cash Prize (as specified in Clause 7 below).
6. Winner selection process.

(a) For each day during the Contest Period, only one (1) winner will be selected based on the criteria set out herein to win the cash prizes.

(b) The first person to approach and ask the Yes Man the exact words "Are you the Yes Man?" wins.

(c) If, at any one time, more than one participant identifies the Yes Man and asks the exact words "Are you the Yes Man?" at the same time, YTLC shall have the sole discretion to select the winner under such circumstance.

(d) The winner of the cash prize must hashtag (#yes4G #findtheyesman), tag (@Yes 4G), post and share the winning photo on his/ her own Facebook page.

(e) The winner must also sign, and return to YTLC, a "winner's declaration form" as prescribed by YTLC to receive the cash prize.
7. Contest Prizes: During the Contest Period, cash prizes of up to RM50,000 will be given away to the winners as follows:
Contest Date(s) Daily Cash Prize
14 November 2016 - 27 November 2016 One (1) RM500 Daily Cash Prize Provided That if the winner is also an Active Yes Subscriber, the Daily Cash Prize will be doubled up to RM1,000
28 November 2016 - 10 December 2016 One (1) RM1,000 Daily Cash Prize Provided That if the winner is also an Active Yes Subscriber, the Daily Cash Prize will be doubled up to RM2,000
11 December 2016 One (1) RM5,000 Grand Cash Prize Provided That if the winner is also an Active Yes Subscriber, the Grand Cash Prize will be doubled up to RM10,000
The above cash prizes will be presented to the daily winners subject to the following:

(a) Upon verification of the daily winner's particulars and confirmation whether such winner is an Active Yes Subscriber or not.
For the purpose of this Contest, an "Active Yes Subscriber" is defined as follows;
• a postpaid Yes subscriber whose account is active and is not barred/ suspended; or
• a prepaid Yes subscriber, whose account is active and is within the reload validity period; or
• a postpaid or prepaid 1 Bestari Net ID holder;

(b) Fulfilment of all the Terms contained herein.
8. Announcement and Notification of Winners. The daily result of this Contest will be announced on Yes 4G's Facebook page within the same day. If a winner is selected, the name of the winner will be announced at www.facebook.com/Yes4G. YTLC reserves the right to select an alternative winner at any time if a winner is disqualified or where YTLC has reasonable ground(s) for believing that the initial winner has contravened any of the terms of this Contest. The same selection process and criteria as applied for this Contest will similarly apply for the selection of any alternative winner.
9. Exclusions: All contest prizes are given and accepted entirely at the risk of the relevant contest winners. Acceptance of the prize shall constitute a release and discharge of YTLC by the winner from any and all liability, claims, demands, causes of action, and/or damages, whether known or unknown, which the winner may have, of any nature whatsoever, arising out of or relating to: (i) this Contest, (ii) personal injury and/or property damage, theft or loss suffered by the winner as a result of the use and/or enjoyment of the prize, and/or (iii) any tax liabilities in relation to this Contest, prize and/or use or enjoyment of the same. YTLC shall not be held liable for (i) any delay in performing or partial/total failure to perform any of its obligations to the winners under this Contest if such delay or failure is caused by circumstances beyond the reasonable control of YTLC, its affiliates, authorized dealers/distributors, agents, suppliers of the prize(s), including without limitation delays, changes, disruptions, cancellations, diversions or substitutions howsoever caused including without limitation as a result of war, terrorist action or threatened terrorist action, strikes, hostilities, civil commotions, accidents, fire, flood or natural catastrophes or (ii) from any loss, damage to property, injury, or death resulting from or related to participant's entrance to or inability to participate in this Contest, or the use, misuse or inability to use the prize or any portion thereof.

Acceptance of the prize constitutes the winner's unconditional agreement and permission to YTLC and its agencies to use the winner's name, video footage, voices, photograph and/or likeness for purposes of advertising, editorial, promotional, marketing, trade and/or other purposes without further compensation and notice, unless prohibited by law. YTLC fully reserves its rights to such forms of publicity and publication.
