Last updated: 11 Jun 2018

1. The Contest. The “30 Hari 30 Telefon” contest is a time-limited contest (“Contest”) organized by YTL Communications Sdn Bhd (“Yes”).
2. Eligibility. The Contest is open to all Malaysians and any person residing in Malaysia who signs up to a new Yes Postpaid bundled Service Plan and/or a new Yes Prepaid Service Plan with a Yes Reload activation during the Contest Period (as defined below) EXCEPT for employees of Yes (including its affiliated and related companies), sponsors, advertising/promotional agencies, and other related agencies, dealers, retailers, suppliers and their immediate family members (collectively, the “Eligible Participants” and each, an “Eligible Participant”). If you are below 18 years of age, you are required to obtain your parent’s/guardian’s consent before participating in the Contest.
3. Terms and Conditions, Interpretation and Definitions.
3.1 By participating in the Contest, each Eligible Participant agrees that he/she has read and understood all the terms and conditions herein (“Terms”) and agrees to be bound by these Terms.
3.2 Subject only to the variations as expressly set out herein, all other terms and conditions contained in the relevant Service Plan and the Yes Reload Terms & Conditions (available at www.yes.my/tnc) shall remain and be applicable to the new service registrations under the Contest. In the event of any inconsistency between the relevant Service Plan and/or the Yes Reload Terms & Conditions and the Terms herein, the Terms herein shall prevail to the extent of any such inconsistency. Notwithstanding any perceived similarities, the terms specified herein do not apply to any new service registrations made outside the Contest Period.
3.3 All capitalized words and expressions herein shall, unless otherwise provided, bear the same meanings as defined in the relevant Service Plan and Yes Reload Terms & Conditions, as applicable.
4. Contest Period. The Contest starts from 8 Jun 2018, 12:00:00 a.m. and ends on 7 July 2018; 11:59:59 p.m. both dates inclusive (" Contest Period").
5. The Contest.
By taking part in the Contest, Eligible Participants stand to win a prize in accordance with the Contest mechanics stipulated in this Clause 5.
5.1 How to participate.
Eligible Participants are required to:
(i) purchase any one of the Yes Service Plans listed in Clause 5.3 below; and
(ii) “LIKE” Yes 4G’s Facebook page;
5.2 Daily Contest Prize.
One (1) 4G LTE smartphone (“prize”) will be given away daily during the Contest Period to the Eligible Participant selected in accordance with Clause 5.4 below as the winner of the day. Each Eligible Participant is only entitled to win one prize throughout the Contest Period.
5.3 Contest Entries.
Each sign up of the following new service registration within Contest Period will entitle the Eligible Participants to earn a fixed amount of contest entries as set out in the table below to increase their chances of winning a daily Contest prize:
a) Yes Postpaid bundled Service Plan
Service Plans Bundled Device Number of Contest Entries
8 Jun 2018 - 1 Jul 2018 2 Jul 2018 - 7 Jul 2018
Postpaid Plan 48 Huddle XS 4G LTE
Or
Zoom 4G LTE
Or
Any 3rd party device sold by Yes and Yes dealers 		7 14
Postpaid Plan 68 10 20
Postpaid Plan 88 15 30
Postpaid Plan 98 20 40
Postpaid Plan 128 30 60
Postpaid Plan 168 40 80
FIZ 2 Service Plans 20 40
Yes Speedzy 2 Service Plans 20 40
Yes 4G Home 2 Service Plans 20 40

b) Yes Prepaid Service Plan with Yes Reload activation
Service Plans Activated Yes Reload Denomination* Number of Contest Entries
8 Jun 2018 - 1 Jul 2018 2 Jul 2018 - 7 Jul 2018
Yes 4G LTE Prepaid Plan RM10 1 2
RM30 3 6
RM50 5 10
* Yes Reloads must be activated on the same date that the Eligible Participant registers his/her Yes 4G LTE Prepaid Plan in order to be entitled to the contest entries.
5.4 Winner Selection Process.
5.4.1 For each day during the Contest Period, the Eligible Participant with the 777th contest entry of the day under the Contest will be selected to be the potential daily winner of the Contest. He/she will be contacted by Yes to answer three (3) simple questions. If he/she is contactable and is able to answer all questions correctly, he/she will be announced the winner of the daily prize. If the Eligible Participant with the 777th contest entry is not available or contactable, or if contactable but is not able to answer all questions correctly, Yes will select the next Eligible Participant with the subsequent serial contest entry as the next potential daily winner of the Contest in accordance with the selection process as stated herein.
5.4.2 Yes will use its best endeavours to contact the selected potential daily winner within three (3) days from the date of his/her successful registration of new Service Plan and activation of the Yes Reload (if applicable). Three (3)simple questions will be asked in the English language or Bahasa Malaysia. If the selected potential winner is unable to communicate with Yes' representative or unable to answer the question correctly, Yes reserves the right to select the next potential daily winner in accordance with the selection process in Clause 5.4.1. Yes has the right, but not the obligation, to communicate or ask the question in any other language at its sole discretion.
5.5 Conditions for Receiving the Contest Prize.
5.5.1 In order for the winner to remain qualified for the Contest prize, the Yes Prepaid Service Account or Yes Postpaid Service Account of the winner must, at the time of the collection of the Contest prize, remain active i.e not barred, suspended or terminated.
5.5.2 The respective winner will be required to sign, and return to Yes, a “winner's declaration form” as prescribed by Yes in order to receive the Contest prize. Any winner who refuse or fails to submit the declaration form as required shall be disqualified to receive the Contest prize.
5.5.3 If the winner is disqualified under sub-clause 5.5.1 or 5.5.2, the Contest prize shall be withdrawn.
5.6 Announcement of Winners.The daily winner of the Contest will be announced on Yes 4G Facebook page and on www.yes.my (4) days after each day during the Contest Period, for example: the winner for 8 June 2018 will be announced on 12 June 2018, winner for 9 June 2018 will be announced on 13 June 2018, and so on and so forth.
5.7 Contest Prize. The Contest prizes offered under the Contest are 4G LTE smartphones and shall be given subject to the following conditions:
(a) The type, make, specifications and brand of 4G LTE smartphones shall be at Yes’ sole and absolute.
(b) Any additional accessory or items shown in any supplier’s and/or manufacturer’s communication, marketing or advertising materials are not included.
(c) No change (including a change of brand, or change in product color or product specification or value), or conversion of prize for cash will be permitted.
(d) The Contest prize provided under the Contest is subject to the relevant manufacturer’s warranty and the winner agrees to refer any problems or issues with the Contest prize directly to the manufacturer of the Contest prize.
The Contest prize that is available to be won on each day will be announced on Yes 4G Facebook page daily at 9am during the Contest Period. Yes reserves the absolute right to substitute the Contest prizes with any other item(s) of similar value at its sole discretion.
5.8 Collection of Contest Prizes.
5.8.1 Each winners will need to collect the Contest prize from a Yes Store selected by him/her within thirty (30) days from the date he/she is announced as the winner (“Collection Period”).
5.8.2 The Contest prize will be forfeited if the Contest prize is not collected by winner after the Collection Period has lapsed.
5.8.3 Yes reserves the right to deal with any Contest prize, which uncollected by the winner under Clause 5.8.2 as it deems fit.
6. Exclusions.
6.1 All Contest prizes are given and accepted entirely at the winners’ risk. Acceptance of the Contest prize shall constitute a release and discharge of Yes by the winner from any and all liability, claims, demands, causes of action, and/or damages, whether known or unknown, which the winner may have, of any nature whatsoever, arising out of or relating to: (a) the Contest, (b) personal injury and/or property damage, theft or loss suffered by the winner as a result of the use and/or enjoyment of the Contest prize, and/or (c) any tax liabilities in relation to the Contest prize and/or use or enjoyment of the same and such tax liabilities, if any shall be the sole responsibility of the winner.
6.2 Yes shall not be held liable for (a) any delay in performing or partial/total failure to perform any of its obligations to the participants of the Contest or the winners under the Contest if such delay or failure is caused by circumstances beyond the reasonable control of Yes, its affiliates, authorized dealers/distributors, agents, suppliers of the Contest prize(s) and (b) any losses, damage to property, injury, or death resulting from or related to participant's participation to or inability to participate in the Contest, or the use, misuse or inability to use the Contest prize or any portion thereof.
7. Unconditional Agreement. Acceptance of the Contest prize constitutes the winner’s unconditional agreement and permission to Yes and its agencies to use the winner’s name, video footage, voices, photograph and/or likeness for purposes of advertising, editorial, promotional, marketing, trade and/or other purposes without further compensation and notice, unless prohibited by law. Yes fully reserves its rights to such forms of publicity and publication.
8. Laws. The Contest shall in all respects be governed by the laws of Malaysia and by participating in the Contest, participants submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Malaysia.
9. Modifications. Yes reserves the right to at any time, add to, delete, vary or amend the terms and conditions herein or change or modify any aspect of the Contest, in whole or in part at any time and from time to time and at its sole discretion without notice and without liability to the participants or any other party. Without prejudice to the aforesaid, Yes reserves the right to cancel, terminate or suspend the Contest at any time before or during the Contest Period with or without notice, and without any liability or compensation whatsoever. In the event of such cancellation, termination or suspension of the Contest Yes may at its sole and absolute discretion choose not to award the Contest prizes in respect of the Contest or choose not to select any winner under the Contest.
10. Disruption of Contest. Without prejudice to Clause 9 above, if for any reason the Contest is not capable of running as planned or is disrupted for reasons due to and including without limitation network failure, infection by computer virus, bugs, tampering, unauthorized intervention, fraud, technical failures or any other causes beyond the control of Yes or any party responsible for the running of any aspect of the Contest which corrupts or affects the administration or proper conduct of the Contest, Yes reserves all rights in Clause 9 above and further reserves the right at its sole and absolute discretion to disqualify any individual or party who tampers or cheat with the processes or mechanics of the Contest and Yes may take any action (including legal action) against such individual or party. Yes shall not be responsible for technical errors in telecommunications networks, internet access or otherwise preventing participation in the Contest.
11. Disclosure Rights. By participating in the Contest, all participants hereby grant to Yes express permission as well as a non-exclusive, royalty-free, worldwide license to publish, print, reproduce, disseminate or share their respective entry, likeness and identity (excluding any sensitive personal information as defined by the Personal Data Protection Act 2010) for editorial, advertising, promotional, marketing or other purposes, without further compensation, for an unlimited period of time, in any of Yes’ publications, in any form or any media, whether for public consumption or otherwise, unless prohibited by law.
12. Disqualification and/or Rejection of Entries. Yes reserves the right to disqualify any participant and/or winner at its sole and absolute discretion on the grounds of non-compliance with any of the Terms herein. For the avoidance of doubt, the foregoing is not meant to limit or curtail the rights of Yes, who may also reject any participation without having to assign any reasons whatsoever. Participants accept that a decision to disqualify and/or reject a participation and/or winner shall be final and not subject to appeal. In the event of a disqualification after the Contest prize has been awarded, Yes reserves the right to demand for the return of the Contest prize or payment of its value from the ineligible or disqualified winner.
13. Judging Criteria and Judging Process. Yes reserves the sole and absolute discretion to determine the winners of the Contest, which will be determined in accordance with the winning process mentioned above. The judges’ decision shall be final and no appeals or disputes will be entertained.
14. General Indemnification. Participants shall indemnify Yes against all and any costs, expenses, damages, liability or injury (whether physical in nature or against the reputation of any party) incurred by Yes, arising out of or relating to the participant’s participation of the Contest and or participant’s acceptance, use or misuse of prizes, including but not limited to any of the participant’s acts, omissions, statements, publications whatsoever as may be in breach of any law or legal rights, as the case may be.
15. Third Party’s Rights and Indemnification. By participating in the Contest, the participant warrants that all personal details, answers, responses and/or entries to the Contest are the participant’s own information are true and/or accurate. Participants agree to indemnify and keep indemnified Yes against all claims, losses, damages and/or expenses what so ever arising from any infringement or violation of any third party’s rights in relation to the submission of entries under the Contest.
16. Survivability of Terms. Any delay, waiver, non-enforcement, modification, amendment, withdrawal or substitution of any term or condition contained herein shall not affect the operation of the other terms or conditions so affected by such a waiver, non-enforcement, modification, amendment, withdrawal or substitution and which shall remain in full force and effect.
17. Non-compliance. Failure to comply with these Terms will result in disqualification of the relevant participant.
18. Facebook Promotion Policy. The Contest is in no way sponsored, endorsed or administered by, or associated with Facebook. Each participant acknowledges that the information and contents provided by the respective participant for the Contest are to Yes and not to Facebook and by entering the Contest the participants hereby expressly release Facebook from any responsibilities or liabilities in connection with the Contest. Please refer to Facebook Data Use Policy and Statement of Rights and Responsibilities at https://www.facebook.com/page_guidelines.php.

Last updated: 7 May 2019

1.

This contest is open to all Malaysian citizens who are of 15 years of age or above. Participants can submit an unlimited amount of entries, but each participant will only be entitled to win one contest prize if the Participant is chosen.

 此竞赛公开予所有年满15岁的马来西亚公民参与，参赛者可不限制数量的呈交参赛作品，唯每名参赛者只能赢取一个奖项。

2.

This contest is organised by China Press (“Organiser”) and sponsored by YTL Communications (YES) (“Sponsor”).

此竞赛主办单位为中国报，YTL Communications（YES）是赞助单位。

3.

Participation of this contest is fully voluntary. By participating in this contest (whether in full or in part), you are deemed to have read, understood and accepted the terms and conditions of the contest.

您有权选择是否参加本次竞赛。您参加本次竞赛的部分或全部內容，即视为您已完全理解並接受本次竞赛的所有竞赛条件与规则和条件全部內容。

4.

Participants shall ensure that the submitted works are original, complete, captions are unambiguous and do not contain any protected copyright. Participants are not allowed to use any unauthorised photos in joining this contest, and should ensure that the entries do not infringe any third parties’ copyrights. By participating in this contest, you are deemed to have understood and complied with all contest criteria for the contest including these terms and conditions. The Organiser will only accept the works that fulfil the mentioned contest criteria. All legal liabilities arising from violation of the terms and conditions shall be borne by the participants. The organiser does not assume any liability or responsibility for any infringement by the Participant. The Participant agrees to indemnify the Organiser and Sponsor in the event of any claims infringement of any intellectual property rights for the Participant’s submitted works, including any violation, unauthorised access and any breach of the terms and conditions of this contest.

您应保证对所呈交的参赛作品拥有独立、完整、明确、无争议的版权，不可以任何方式使用属於他人的照片作为自己部分或全部参赛作品，还应保证参赛作品不侵犯第三方的包括版权、肖像权、名誉权、隐私权等在內的任何权益。参加本次比赛，视为您认同本规则，主办单位仅接受遵守这些参赛规则的作品。凡因违反上述规则而导致的相关纠纷，一切法律责任均由参赛者本人承担。主办单位不对此承担任何责任。

5.

The works that submitted must not violate any Malaysian laws. The content must not involve any nudity, controversial, sexual or any explicit content that may cause controversy in terms of religion or race, contain pornography, violence, or address any political issues or be used as any controversial propaganda of sorts. Any content which violates any Malaysian laws or the restrictions as highlighted, the Organiser reserves the right to disqualify the violating participants without any notice whatsoever. Determination of the nature and content of the works are at the sole discretion of the Organiser.

参赛作品内容不能触犯马来西亚法令，其中不能涉及裸露或将任何可能抵触宗教、种族、色情、暴力、社会敏感议题或任何诽谤形式的内容。如参赛作品内容抵触以上所提到的，主办单位有权在没有通知参赛者的情况下，取消参赛资格。

6.

Any submitted works that violates any terms and condition or contest criteria shall disqualify the Participant who will not be entitled to any prizes. The Organiser reserves the rights to recall any prizes awarded, including reclaiming any cash, merchandises, medals, certificates or any other granted rights. The details will be announced on the official website and such suitable media as determined by the Organiser or Sponsor.

不遵守大赛规则的作品不可获奖。如此类作品被选中，亦不可免除其获奖后被取消资格。主办单位有权收回奖金、奖品、奖牌、证书及其他被授予的权益，並在其官方网站及其他媒体上公佈此举。

7.

Upon submitting your works, you are deemed to have given the Organiser and Sponsor the non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free licence for any reproduction of your works including your copyright and moral rights thereof. Participants agree that by submitting the works, the Organiser and Sponsor are authorised to use, reproduce, disseminate, share and print, in accordance to the needs of the Organiser and Sponsor, the submitted works for free, whether for purposes of advertising, product and brand marketing, including for online media, print media, printed materials, photo exhibitions, retail stores, touring, digital content, outdoor media and other marketing activities. In view of the foregoing, the Organiser and Sponsor are authorised to use the content without notice or further consent or assignment by the Participants or winners. The Organiser and Sponsor have the right to assign and licence the foregoing rights, including copyright to their affiliates and strategic partners.

参赛者同意授权主办单位以及YTL Communications（YES）免费使用参赛作品于广告、产品和品牌营销，包括用于网络媒体、平面媒体、印刷材料、摄影展览、零售商店、巡演、数码內容、户外媒体及其他营销活动。鉴于前述，主办单位以及YTL Communications（YES）使用参赛者的参赛作品时，将不再另行通知参赛者或徵得参赛者同意。主办单位以及YTL Communications（YES）有权将前述权利转授权于其关联公司和战略合作伙伴。

8.

Participants shall ensure, affirm and acknowledge that the personal information provided is true, complete and accurate, including your Chinese and English name, NRIC, contact number, email address and mailing address. By participating in the contest, you also agree to the processing of your data by the Organiser and Sponsor in accordance to their respective privacy policies. The Organiser and Sponsor only collects and processes your personal information within the scope of the above purposes and applicable laws. The winners will receive a notice from the Organiser to verify the personal information after the announcement of the winners. The winner will be deemed to have automatically forfeited the prize if any personal information provided is incomplete or inaccurate, including for any reasons that the prize cannot be delivered to the winner. Organiser will not be liable in the event that any winners are deemed to have forfeited their prizes for any reasons thereof and the Organiser is entitled to select another winner for the said prize.

您同意並承认提供的个人信息真实，包括您的中英文姓名、身分证号码、联系电话、邮件地址和通讯地址，用于联系和发放奖品。主办单位仅在上述目的和适用法律允许的范围內收集、处理您的个人信息，请确保您提供的个人信息完整准确。宣佈获奖后，得奖者将接获主办单位通知，核实获奖者注册信息。由于获奖者个人信息不完整而造成奖品无法发放的，则视为获奖者自动放弃获奖权利，主办单位对此將不再补发奖品。

9.

The Organiser and Sponsor reserves the rights to replace or substitute with the prizes with any other prizes as deemed fit at their absolute discretion. All the prizes, including substitute prizes cannot be resold or exchanged for cash. The pictures of all the prizes are for reference only and any value of the prizes shall be determined by the Organiser or Sponsor. In the event of any issues with the quality, functionality or warranty of the prizes, the winner shall contact the manufacturer or distributor of the product directly for any exchange, replacement and repair in accordance to their manufacturing or distributor policies and warranties. The Organiser and Sponsor will not be responsible or liable for any warranty, quality or lifespan of the product which are given as prizes.

奖品不得转售或是折换现金，若奖品发生不可预见的情况，主办单位有权以等值奖品取代之，唯此替代奖品亦不可兑换现金。所有奖品的图片仅供参考。实物奖品可能有所不同。如出现质量问题，获奖者应直接联系奖品制造商或指定发放者，贯彻其退回、更换及维修规定。除非主办单位是奖品制造方，否则主办单位对前述质量问题不予承担任何责任。

10.

The decision of the judges selected for this contest are at the absolute discretion of the Organiser and Sponsor, and all winners chosen are final and absolute; any inquiry or complaint will not be entertained.

评审团之决定为最后决定，任何质询恕不受理。
11.

The Organiser reserves the rights to add, amend or cancel the contest criteria as well as terms and conditions for the contest, including cancellation of the entire contest at its absolute discretion without any prior notice. Participants are deemed to have accepted all changes, additions or modifications of the contest criteria as well as terms and conditions.

主办单位保留增删此竞赛规则的权力，无需另行通知。所有之改正，增加或者修改的规则，参赛者务必遵守。

12.

Any unreasonable request, including request for extension of time or replacement or change of works will not be accepted or entertained.

若有任何不实的索求，主办单位有权拒绝，对其要求也将不受理会。

13.

The Participant agrees that any acceptance of the prizes are entirely at the risk of the winners, and the winner shall solely be responsible for all prize-related expenses, including tax liabilities (if any) in relation to the contest, prize and/or use and enjoyment of the same.

参赛者同意并接受奖品所可能涵盖的任何风险，获奖者应全权负责所有与奖品相关的费用，包括与比赛竞赛相关的任何税务责任（如果有的话）、奖品和/或使用与享受相同的奖品。

14.

Organiser and Sponsor shall not be liable or held responsible for any delay in performance or partial/total failure to perform any of its obligations to the winners under this contest if the delay is caused by circumstances beyond the reasonable control of the Organiser, Sponsor, as well as their affiliates, authorised dealers/distributors, agents or suppliers, including any force majeure events. Organiser and Supplier shall not be liable for any compensation, loss, damage to property, injury or death resulting from or related to the Participant’s participation or inability to participate in this contest, or the use, misuse or inability to use the prizes or any reasons related to this contest.

任何可能发生的延迟情况或主办单位及赞助单位未能对此次竞赛的得奖者履行部分/完全任何义务，且此问题已超出主办单位及赞助单位所能控制的合理状况，以及附属公司、授权经销商/分销商，代理商或供应商，包括任何不可抗之因素，主办单位及赞助单位将不会对上述情况承担任何责任。主办单位和供应商不对因参赛者参加或无法参加本次比赛或使用，滥用或无法使用奖品或任何理由而导致或与之相关的任何赔偿，损失，财产损失，伤害或死亡负责与此比赛有关。主办单位及赞助单位将不会做出任何赔偿、亏损、财产损失、参赛者参与竞赛所造成的相关伤害或死亡、无法参加此次竞赛、或使用、滥用或无法使用奖品或与此次竞赛相关的任何因素。

15.

Entries will be rate according to the following criteria:

Theme - 30 points

Technique - 30 points

Creativity - 20 points

Expressiveness - 20 points

In order to avoid disputes, participants must participate in the competition according to the competitions’ criteria set by the organizer.

参赛作品将依据以下评分标准来评分：

主题性 - 30分

技术性 - 30分

创造力 - 20分

表现力 - 20分

为避免争议，参赛者须根据主办单位所发布的竞赛评分标准参与竞赛。

Last updated: 31 May 2020

1. The Promotion.The LFH Exclusive Deal Monthly Data Add-On promotion (“Promotion”) is a time-limited promotion by YTL Communications Sdn Bhd (“ YTLC”).
2. Eligibility. Subscribers who are registered under any of the Learn From Home Programme initiative by YTL Foundation is eligible to participate in this Promotion (“ Eligible Subscribers”).
3. Applicable Terms & Conditions. Subject only to the variations as expressly set out herein (“ Promo T&Cs”), all other terms and conditions incorporated in the Prepaid Service Terms and Conditions and Yes 4G LTE Prepaid Plan Terms and Conditions available at www.yes.my/tnc shall remain valid and applicable to this Promotion (collectively referred as “General Applicable Terms and Conditions”). In the event of any inconsistency between the General Applicable Terms and Conditions and these Promo T&Cs, these Promo T&Cs shall prevail to the extent of any such inconsistency. Words in capital not defined herein shall have the same meaning ascribed to in the General Applicable Terms and Conditions.
4. Promotion Period. The Promotion will commence on 31 May 2020, 06:00 a.m. and continue until further notice (“https://www.yes.my/tnc”).
5. The Promotion.
5.1 The service offerings under the LFH Exclusive Deal Monthly 20GB RM25 (“ LFH Data Add-On”) is stated below:
Data Add-On Plan Name Price 4G LTE Data Capacity Data Add-On Validity Period
LFH Exclusive Deal Monthly 20GB RM 25 RM25 20GB 30 days from the subscription date
5.2 An Eligible Subscriber may purchase the LFH Data Add-On only via MyYes4G App, Express Reload and/or My Account.
5.3 If an Eligible Subscriber purchases multiple LFH Data Add-On, the Eligible Subscriber’s Account Validity Period will be extended accordingly based on the last LFH Data Add-On successful purchase date. For example, if an Eligible Subscriber’s Account Validity Period ends on 30th April 2020, and on 25th April 2020 he/she purchases a LFH Data Add-On and again on 28th April 2020, the Eligible Subscribers purchases another Prepaid Data Add-On, in such instance, his/her Account Validity Period will be extended to 27th May 2020 based on the LFH Add-On purchased by him on 28th April 2020.
5.4 In determining the quota usage priority, the following shall apply:-
5.4.1 if an Eligible Subscriber purchases multiple LFH Data Add-On, quota will be drawn from the LFH Data Add-On which expires first based on first in first out policy; and
5.4.2 if an Eligible Subscriber purchases an LFH Data Add-On, together with any other prepaid data add-on offered for purchase by YTLC under any of the applicable Prepaid Service Plan, quota will be drawn from the prepaid data add-on which expires first based on first in first out policy. For the avoidance of doubt, multiple purchase of prepaid data-add on will not extend the Account Validity Period.
6. Unused Data. At the expiry of the Data Add-On Validity Period, any balance data in the LFH Data Add-On which remains unutilised shall be automatically forfeited.
7. Limitation of Liability. YTLC shall not be liable for any loss or damage (including without limitation loss of use, loss of income, profits or goodwill, direct or indirect, incidental, consequential, exemplary, punitive or special damages of any party including third parties) howsoever arising whether in contract, tort, negligence or otherwise, in connection with this Promotion.
8. LawsThis Promotion shall in all respect be governed by the laws of Malaysia.
9. Modifications. YTLC reserves the right to, at any time, add to, delete, vary or amend the terms and conditions herein or change or modify any aspect of the Promotion, in whole or in part at any time and from time to time and at its sole discretion without notice and without liability to the Eligible Subscribers or any other party. Without prejudice to the aforesaid, YTLC reserves the right to cancel, terminate or suspend the Promotion at any time before or during the Promotion Period with notice but without any liability or compensation whatsoever.

Last updated: 23rd May 2020

1. The Promotion.The LFH Exclusive Deal Monthly Data Add-On promotion (“Promotion”) is a time-limited promotion by YTL Communications Sdn Bhd (“ YTLC”).
2. Eligibility. Subscribers who are registered under any of the Learn From Home Programme initiative by YTL Foundation is eligible to participate in this Promotion (“ Eligible Subscribers”).
3. Terms and Conditions. Subject only to the variations as expressly set out herein (“Promo T&Cs”), all other terms and conditions incorporated in the Prepaid Service Terms and Conditions and Yes 4G LTE Prepaid Plan Terms and Conditions available at www.yes.my/tnc shall remain valid and applicable to this Promotion (collectively referred as “ General Applicable Terms and Conditions”). In the event of any inconsistency between the General Applicable Terms and Conditions and these Promo T&Cs, these Promo T&Cs shall prevail to the extent of any such inconsistency. Words in capital not defined herein shall have the same meaning ascribed to in the General Applicable Terms and Conditions.
4. Promotion Period. The Promotion will commence on 23rd May 2020, 06:00 a.m. and continue until further notice (“Promotion Period”).
5. The Promotion.
5.1 The service offerings under the LFH Exclusive Deal Monthly 10GB RM25 (“ LFH Data Add-On”) is stated below:
Data Add-On Plan Name Price 4G LTE Data Capacity Data Add-On Validity Period
LFH Exclusive Deal Monthly 10GB RM 25 RM25 10GB 30 days from the subscription date
5.2 An Eligible Subscriber may purchase the LFH Data Add-On only via MyYes4G App, Express Reload and/or My Account.
5.3 Any Eligible Subscriber who purchases the LFH Data Add-On during the Promotion Period will be eligible to receive an additional 10GB free (“Free Data”). For clarity, the Free Data provided to the Eligible Subscribers will not extend the existing Data Add-On Validity Period and/or Account Validity Period of the Eligible Subscribers’ Prepaid Service account. Further, the Free Data can neither be carried forward nor exchangeable for cash or any other products and/or services.
5.4 If an Eligible Subscriber purchases multiple LFH Data Add-On, the Eligible Subscriber’s Account Validity Period will be extended accordingly based on the last LFH Data Add-On successful purchase date. For example, if an Eligible Subscriber’s Account Validity Period ends on 30th April 2020, and on 25th April 2020 he/she purchases a LFH Data Add-On and again on 28th April 2020, the Eligible Subscribers purchases another Prepaid Data Add-On, in such instance, his/her Account Validity Period will be extended to 27th May 2020 based on the LFH Add-On purchased by him on 28th April 2020.
5.5 In determining the quota usage priority, the following shall apply:-
   5.5.1 if an Eligible Subscriber purchases multiple LFH Data Add-On, quota will be drawn from the LFH Data Add-On which expires first based on first in first out policy; and
   5.5.2 if an Eligible Subscriber purchases an LFH Data Add-On, together with any other prepaid data add-on offered for purchase by YTLC under any of the applicable Prepaid Service Plan, quota will be drawn from the prepaid data add-on which expires first based on first in first out policy. For the avoidance of doubt, multiple purchase of prepaid data-add on will not extend the Account Validity Period.
6. Unused Data. At the expiry of the Data Add-On Validity Period, any balance data in the LFH Data Add-On which remains unutilised shall be automatically forfeited.
7. Limitation of Liability. YTLC shall not be liable for any loss or damage (including without limitation loss of use, loss of income, profits or goodwill, direct or indirect, incidental, consequential, exemplary, punitive or special damages of any party including third parties) howsoever arising whether in contract, tort, negligence or otherwise, in connection with this Promotion.
8. LawsThis Promotion shall in all respect be governed by the laws of Malaysia.
9. Modifications. YTLC reserves the right to, at any time, add to, delete, vary or amend the terms and conditions herein or change or modify any aspect of the Promotion, in whole or in part at any time and from time to time and at its sole discretion without notice and without liability to the Eligible Subscribers or any other party. Without prejudice to the aforesaid, YTLC reserves the right to cancel, terminate or suspend the Promotion at any time before or during the Promotion Period with notice but without any liability or compensation whatsoever.

Last updated: 17th May 2020

1. The Campaign.The Data Raya Campaign (“ Campaign”) is a time-limited campaign by YTL Communications Sdn Bhd (“ YTLC”) to allow family members, relatives and friends to purchase and give Data Raya Add-On to Recipient (as defined below) during the Hari Raya Aidilfitri celebration.
2. Eligibility.
2.1 Any person (“ Sender”) may purchase Data Raya Add-On during the Data Raya Campaign Period as gifts to a Recipient for his/her use.
2.2 Except for YES subscribers of the Service Plans listed in Clause 2.3 of these Campaign T&Cs (as defined below), a recipient of the Data Raya Add-On shall be a YES Subscriber with a valid and active Postpaid or Prepaid Service account (“ Recipient”).
2.3 YES Subscribers of the following Service Plans shall not be eligible to receive the Data Raya Add-On:
(a) 1Bestarinet 2GB Teachers Data Plan;
(b) 1Bestarinet Service Plan;
(c) Fixed Wireless Internet Plan;
(d) FIZ 2 Service Plans;
(e) Yes Speedzy 2 Service Plans;
(f) Yes 4G Home 2 Service Plan;
(g) Konfem Unlimited 49/79/99 Postpaid Plan;
(h) Konfem Unlimited 79/99 Family Plan;
(i) Konfem Unlimited Supplementary Plan 30; and
(j) YTLC’s enterprise customers.
3. Applicable Terms & Conditions.
3.1 Subject only to the variations as expressly set out herein (“Campaign T&Cs”), all other terms and conditions incorporated in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions, Postpaid Service Plans Terms and Conditions, Postpaid Data Add-On Terms and Conditions, Prepaid Service Terms and Conditions, Yes 4G LTE Prepaid Plan Terms and Conditions, Prepaid Data Add-On Terms and Conditions, Buy 1 Free 1 Data Add-On Promotion Terms and Conditions and Konfem Unlimited SD EPIK, Konfem Unlimited HD EPIK and Konfem Turbo Prepaid LTE Data add-on Promotion Terms and Conditions available at https://www.yes.my/tnc shall remain valid and be applicable to this Campaign (hereinafter collectively referred to as the “ Data Add-On Terms and Conditions”). In the event of any inconsistency between the Data Add-On Terms and Conditions and these Campaign T&Cs, these Campaign T&Cs shall prevail to the extent of any such inconsistency.
3.2 All words in capital and expressions herein shall unless otherwise provided, bear the same meanings as defined in the relevant Data Add-On Terms and Conditions, as applicable.
• “Data Raya Add-On” means any of the Postpaid Data Raya Add-On plan or Prepaid Data Raya Add-On plan available at MyYes4G app and YESExpress Add-On channels.
• “Recipient” shall have the same meaning ascribed to in Clause 2.2.
• “ Sender” shall have the same meaning ascribed to in Clause 2.1.
4. Campaign Period.
This Campaign will commence on 17th May 2020, 12:00:00 a.m. and continue until 20th June 2020, 11:59 p.m. (“ Data Raya Campaign Period”).
5. Types of Data Raya Add-On
5.1 A Sender may purchase the following Data Raya Add-On for use by the Recipient:
(a) Postpaid Data Raya Add-On
Each Postpaid Data Raya Add-On has a validity period of thirty (30) days from the date of successful purchase by the Sender (“Postpaid Data Raya Validity Period”) for Recipient’s use. The Recipient may enjoy and use the allocated internet data in the Postpaid Data Raya Add-On throughout the Postpaid Data Raya Validity Period irrespective of the Recipient’s applicable Billing Cycle provided always that the Recipient’s Postpaid Service account is valid and active throughout the Data Raya Validity Period. For example, if a Recipient’s Billing Cycle ends on 25th May 2020 and he/she receives a Data Raya Add-On with a validity period of thirty (30) days on 23rd May 2020, provided always that the Recipient’s Postpaid Service account is valid and active throughout the Postpaid Data Raya Add-On Validity Period, he/she will continue to enjoy the internet data in such Postpaid Data Raya Add-On until 21st June 2020. Any internet data which remains unutilized after the Postpaid Data Raya Validity Period will expire automatically after 21st June 2020.
(b) Prepaid Data Raya Add-On
Each Prepaid Data Raya Add-On has a particular validity period from the date of successful purchase by the Sender (“ Prepaid Data Raya Validity Period”) for Recipient’s use within the said Prepaid Data Raya Validity Period. If a Recipient receives multiple Prepaid Data Raya Add-On, the Recipient’s Account Validity Period will be extended accordingly based on the last Prepaid Data Raya Add-On’s successful purchase date. For example, if a Recipient’s Account Validity Period ends on 30th April 2020, and on 25th April 2020 he/she receives a Prepaid Data Raya Add-On with a validity period of thirty (30) days and again on 28th April 2020, the Recipient receives another Prepaid Data Raya Add-On with a validity period of thirty (30) days, in such instance, his/her Account Validity Period will be extended to 27th May 2020 based on the Prepaid Data Raya Add-On received by him on 28th April 2020. For clarity and avoidance of doubt, if multiple Prepaid Data Raya Add-On is purchased, the order of priority in calculating the usage of internet data is from the earliest to the latest purchase of the Prepaid Data Raya Add-On.
6. Purchase of Data Raya Add-On.
6.1 To purchase a Data Raya Add-On, a Sender is required to:
(a) login to MyYes4G app (if the Sender is a YES Subscriber) or visit the YESExpress Add-On page available @ www.yes.my (applicable to both YES Subscriber and non-YES Subscriber);
(b) key in the Recipient’s YES mobile number or YES ID or Postpaid or Prepaid account number;
(c) select a Data Raya Add-On that the Sender would like to purchase and give as a gift to the Recipient;
(d) key in Sender’s name and contact number;
(e) click on the tab “Proceed” and pay through either credit or debit card or by way of online banking transaction.

6.2 A transaction successful page will pop up once the purchase of the Data Raya Add-On by the Sender is successful. The Sender is advised to refer to his/her credit or online banking statement transaction to view details on such purchase of Data Raya Add-On. Please take note that there will be no refund initiated by YTLC on any successful transaction.

6.3 Recipient will receive notification via SMS or e-mail on the Data Raya Add-On gifted to him/her. Recipient may check details on the Data Raya Add-On via the “Purchase History” tab on MyYes4G app or MyAccount.

6.4 There is no limitation on the number of Data Raya Add-On a Sender may purchase for use by one or more Recipients which means a Sender may make multiple purchases of the Data Raya Add-On provided always that the purchase is done by the Sender during the Data Raya Campaign Period.

6.5 It is the responsibility of the Sender to ensure accuracy of the information provided to YTLC in relation to the purchase of the Data Raya Add-On. YTLC assumes no responsibility and/or liability on any wrong or mistaken information provided by the Sender and YTLC shall not be liable for any loss, claim and/or expense incurred by the Sender or Recipient arising from any inaccuracies in the information provided by the Sender.
7. Limitation of Liability.
YTLC shall not be liable for any loss or damage (including without limitation loss of use, loss of income, profits or goodwill, direct or indirect, incidental, consequential, exemplary, punitive or special damages of any party including third parties) howsoever arising whether in contract, tort, negligence or otherwise, in connection with this Campaign.
8. Laws.
This Raya Campaign shall in all respects be governed by the laws of Malaysia.
9. Modifications.
YTLC reserves the right to, at any time, add to, delete, vary or amend the terms and conditions herein or change or modify any aspect of this Campaign, in whole or in part at any time and from time to time and at its sole discretion without notice and without liability to the Sender and/or Recipient or any other party. Without prejudice to the aforesaid, YTLC reserves the right to cancel, terminate or suspend this Campaign at any time before or during the Data Raya Campaign Period with notice but without any liability or compensation whatsoever.

Last updated: 1st May 2020

1. The Campaign.The Free 1GB LTE Data Campaign (“ Campaign”) is a time-limited campaign launched by YTL Communications Sdn Bhd (“ YTLC”) for a period of one (1) day only on 1st May 2020 commencing at 12:00 a.m. until 11:59 p.m. (“ Campaign Eligibility Period”). An Eligible Subscriber is entitled to redeem the Free 1GB LTE Data once only during the Campaign Eligibility Period.
2. Eligibility for Campaign.
2.1   Subject to Clause 2.2 herein, all active subscribers of the YES Postpaid and Prepaid Subscribers are entitled to participate in this Campaign (“ Eligible Subscriber”).
2.2   Subscribers of any of the 1Bestarinet service plan and Konfem Unlimited 99 Plan and enterprise customers are not entitled to participate in this Campaign.
3. Terms and Conditions for Redemption.
To redeem the free 1GB LTE Data, an Eligible Subscriber shall comply with the following terms and conditions:-
(a)   Redemption of the free 1GB LTE Data must be done by an Eligible Subscriber during the Campaign Eligibility Period via MyYes4G App or MyAccount /Selfcare or Express Reload. For clarity, the free 1GB LTE Data will not be automatically credited for the Eligible Subscriber’s use unless he/she redeems the free 1GB LTE Data in accordance with these Promo T&Cs. Once redeemed, the free 1GB LTE Data will be reflected in the Eligible Subscriber’s Service account.
(b)   The Eligible Subscriber is entitled to redeem the free 1GB LTE Data in accordance with Clause 3(a) herein provided always that his/her Service account is active at the time of redemption. For clarity, upon successful redemption of the free 1GB LTE Data, the Eligible Subscriber may use the free 1GB LTE Data during the Campaign Eligibility Period. After the end of the Campaign Eligibility Period, any remaining unutilized data from the free 1GB LTE Data will be automatically forfeited and will not be carried forward to the succeeding calendar days.
(c)   Except for any Service Plan with unlimited data, an Eligible Subscriber is entitled to use the free 1GB LTE Data for tethering and/or hotspot under any of the Postpaid or Prepaid Service Plan subscribed by him/her.
4. Applicable Terms & Conditions: Subject only to the variations as expressly set out herein (“Promo T&Cs”), all other terms and conditions incorporated in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions, Postpaid Service Plans Terms & Conditions, Yes 4G Broadband Bundle Plan, Fixed Wireless Internet Service, FIZ 2 Service Plans Terms and Conditions, Yes Speedzy 2 Service Plans Terms and Conditions, Yes 4G Home 2 Service Plans Terms and Conditions, Prepaid Service Terms and Conditions and the Yes 4G LTE Prepaid Plans Terms & Conditions found at www.yes.my/tnc shall remain valid and applicable to this Campaign (collectively referred as “ General Applicable Terms and Conditions”). In the event of any inconsistency between the General Applicable Terms and Conditions and these Promo T&Cs, these Promo T&Cs shall prevail to the extent of any such inconsistency. Words in capital not defined herein shall have the same meaning ascribed to in the General Applicable Terms and Conditions.
5. Modifications.
YTLC reserves the right to, at any time, add to, delete, vary or amend these Promo T&Cs or change or modify any aspect of this Campaign in whole or in part at any time and from time to time at its sole discretion without notice and without liability to the Eligible Subscribers or any other party. Without prejudice to the aforesaid, YTLC reserves the right to cancel, terminate or suspend this Campaign at any time before or during this Campaign Eligibility Period with notice but without any liability or compensation whatsoever.
6. These Promo T&Cs is subject to the laws of Malaysia.

Last updated:09 August 2019

 

YTL Communications Sdn Bhd (Company No. 793634-V) (hereinafter shall be referred to as “We”, “Us” or “Our”) is the organiser of Yes Fiesta Amazinglah event (“Event”). 

 

This Event is organised in locations across various states within Semenanjung Malaysia. For more details on the venue, date and time of the Event, please log on to   www.yes.my.

 

Our Yes subscribers  with valid Event entry ticket (“Ticket”) may attend to the Event, subject to the terms and conditions hereinafter appearing, including those terms and conditions printed on the Ticket (hereinafter shall be collectively referred to as the “Terms and Conditions”).

 

By accepting the Ticket, You acknowledge that You have read and understood these Terms and Conditions and agree to be bound by it. If You are under the age of 18, You must obtain your parents’ or legal guardians’ prior permission and consent before attending to the Event.
1. Each NRIC/Passport holder who is a Yes subscriber is entitled to one (1) Ticket only (hereinafter shall be referred to as the “Ticket Holder”, “You” or” Your”) and one (1) Ticket entitled one (1) Ticket Holder to enter into the venue of the Event (“Venue”).
2. You must produce a valid Ticket to gain entry into the Venue. We, our appointed agent and/or representative may request You to produce Your Ticket at any time during the Event for verification. Failure on Your part to produce Your Ticket when requested may result in You being denied access to the Venue or in You being removed from the Venue. Further, we reserve Our rights to deny any individual’s access to the Event in the event any of the particulars stated in the Ticket is inconsistent with the particulars stated in the NRIC of the Ticket Holder.
3. A Ticket does not afford You the right of transportation to and from the Venue, parking, merchandise or any food or beverages at the Venue.
4. The Ticket is not transferable and cannot be resold or offered for resale or used for any other commercial purposes including advertising and giveaways.
5. If the Event is rescheduled or cancelled for whatsoever reason, we will use reasonable endeavours to notify You as soon as reasonably practical thereof.
6. It is Your responsibility to (i) ensure that You collect the Ticket before the date of Event, (ii) keep Your Ticket safe prior and during the Event and (iii) check Your Ticket and to ascertain the date and time of the Event and if applicable, any rescheduled Event.
7. Appropriate standards of behaviour are expected of all Ticket Holders attending to the Event and if We and/or Our agent, representatives or employee believes that Your behaviour is dangerous or unacceptable, we will refuse Your entry into the Venue or You may be removed from the Venue.
8. In order to facilitate the security, safety and comfort of all individuals in the Venue, we reserve the right in our reasonable discretion to conduct security searches of persons, clothing, bags and all other items on entry and exit of a Venue, to confiscate items which may cause danger or disruption to the Event or to other persons or that are in breach of these Terms and Conditions and/or to refuse admission and/or to refund the Ticket face value if we have reasonable grounds to do so.
9. The following items are not permitted to be brought into the Venue:-
9.1 glass bottles or containers or other heavy and/or sharp objects which could potentially be used as projectiles (excluding sunglasses, binoculars and reading glasses);
9.2 any illegal drugs;
9.3 knives, weapons of any nature or fireworks;
9.4 digital, electronic or other recording or broadcast device;
9.5 any item that You intend to distribute, sell, offer, display for sale, marketing or promotional purposes; and 9.6 any dangerous items which may be construed as dangerous by Us or capable of causing public nuisance.
10. We may add, withdraw or substitute artistes and/or vary advertised programmes and Event scheduling at any time or from time to time without prior notice.
11. By attending the Event, You hereby grant Us with express consent and permission as well as a non-exclusive, royalty-free, worldwide license to publish, print, reproduce, disseminate or share Your image, voice, likeness and identity (excluding any sensitive personal information as defined by the Personal Data Protection Act 2010) for editorial, advertising, promotional, marketing or other purposes, without further compensation, for an unlimited period of time, in any of Our publications, in any form or any media, whether for public consumption or otherwise, unless prohibited by law.
12. We reserve the right to add, delete, vary or amend these Terms and Conditions herein or change or modify any aspect of the Event, in whole or in part at any time and from time to time at Our sole discretion. Without prejudice to the aforesaid, We reserve the right to cancel or amend the date, time or venue of the Event upon notice but without any liability or compensation whatsoever.
13. You voluntarily assume all risks and danger incidental to the Event whether occurring prior to, during or subsequent to the actual Event, including any death, personal injury, loss, damage, or liability. We and our agents, representatives or employees shall not be liable for any death, personal injury, loss and damage however caused whilst You are in the Venue.
14. Any delay, waiver, non-enforcement, modification, amendment, withdrawal or substitution of any of the Terms and Conditions contained herein shall not affect the operation of the other terms or conditions so affected by such a waiver, non-enforcement, modification, amendment, withdrawal or substitution and which shall remain in full force and effect.
15. These Terms and Conditions constitute the whole agreement between the Ticket Holder and Us in respect of the subject matter hereof, unless otherwise amended by Us in accordance with Clause 10 herein.
16. The Terms and Conditions herein is subject to the laws of Malaysia.

1. The Promotion. The Vivo Y85 with Yes Postpaid Plan Bundle ("the Promotion") is a time-limited offer launched by YTL Communications Sdn Bhd ("Yes").
2. Applicable Terms & Conditions: Subject only to the variations as expressly set out herein, all other terms and conditions contained in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions and the Postpaid Service Plans Terms & Conditions (available at www.yes.my/tnc) shall remain and be applicable to the Promotion. In the event of any inconsistency between the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions and Postpaid Service Plans Terms & Conditions and the Terms and Conditions herein, the Terms and Conditions herein shall prevail, to the extent of any inconsistency. Notwithstanding any perceived similarities, the terms and the Promotion offer specified herein do not apply to any Devices purchased, or any Postpaid Service Plan subscribed, outside of the Promotion Period.
3. Interpretations & Definitions: All capitalised words and expressions herein shall, unless otherwise provided, bear the same meanings as defined in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions and the Postpaid Service Plans Terms & Conditions.
4. Definitions: The following capitalised words or phrases shall have the meanings as assigned:
"Upfront Payment" means the reimbursable sum of money collected for any Device provided to the Yes Subscriber under the Promotion bundle at the time of registration.
5. Promotion Period. The Promotion is being offered from 24 July 2018 until further notice ("Promotion Period").
6. The Promotion Bundle.One (1) unit of Vivo Y85 ("Device") bundled with the subscription of Yes LTE 78. The bundled plan of Yes LTE 78 will be contracted with a 24 months contract period.
7. Service Offerings & Commitment Fee: : The terms of offer for the respective bundled Postpaid Service Plan subscribed under the Promotion is as follows:
• The Device of Vivo Y85 bundled with Yes LTE 78 will be provided with Data Capacity Allocation of 30GB 4G LTE Data, free unlimited On-Net services of voice call minutes and SMS at Commitment Fee of RM78.
8. Payment Upon Registration: Payments required upon registration of the respective bundled Postpaid Service Plans are:
 
8.1 In respect of the bundled plan for Yes LTE 78 with Vivo Y85, a non-refundable Device Price of RM398, Upfront Payment of RM323 and the relevant Commitment Fee (known as “Plan Advance Payment”) shall be paid by the Yes Subscriber upon registration. The Plan Advance Payment will be rebate to the Yes Subscriber’s account in the first month bill.
8.2 Additionally, if the Yes Subscriber is a non-Malaysian, a refundable deposit of RM200 will be collected which will be refunded free of interest 45 days after the expiry or termination of the Service account subject to any deduction which may be due from the Yes Subscriber to Yes.
9. Rebate: Provided that the Yes Subscriber's Service account is not suspended or terminated at the time of rebate and where relevant, the Upfront Payment paid by the Yes Subscriber under the Promotion will be rebate to the Yes Subscriber's account over the 24 months Contract Period in the amount as follows:
a) From 1st month to 23rd month – RM13 per month
b) On the 24th month – RM24;
10. Addition/Removal of Service Plan. Yes reserves the right to add other types of Postpaid Service Plan to and/or remove any of the Postpaid Service Plans as stated herein from the Promotion in accordance with Clause 15 below.
11. Not exchangeable for cash. For the avoidance of doubt, the Promotion items/services in the Promotion bundle are not exchangeable for cash or any other product and/or service including any other Postpaid Service Plan offered by Yes.
12. Early Termination Charges: If the Yes Subscriber terminates the Service subscribed under the Promotion before the expiry of the relevant Contract Period or if the Service account is terminated by Yes due to the Yes Subscriber's default, the Early Termination Charges as provided in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions shall apply.
13. Device Warranty. Each Device provided under the Promotion shall be subject to its respective manufacturer's warranty. The Yes Device shall be subject to the Yes Limited Warranty at www.yes.my/tnc.
14. Exclusion of liability for use of Vivo Y85. Yes shall not be liable for any loss, damages or injury for the Vivo Y85 or to the Yes Subscriber or to any person claiming through the Yes Subscriber arising from the use or inability to the Vivo Y85 or from any cause whatsoever.
15. Right to change. Yes reserves the right to change, modify and/or amend these terms at any time. A modification, change and/or amendment to these terms will be deemed to be effective upon a notice being placed upon Yes official website or sent digitally to all affected Yes Subscribers.

1. The Promotion. Samsung Galaxy Note8, Yes 4G LTE Prepaid Starter Pack and Yes Reload Cards Bundle ("the Promotion") is a time-limited offer launched by YTL Communications Sdn Bhd ("Yes").
2. Applicable Terms & Conditions: Subject only to the variations as expressly set out herein, all other terms and conditions contained in the Prepaid Service Terms and Conditions, Yes 4G LTE Prepaid Plan Terms & Conditions and Yes Reload Terms & Conditions (available at www.yes.my/tnc) shall remain and be applicable to the Promotion. In the event of any inconsistency between the Prepaid Service Terms and Conditions, Yes 4G LTE Prepaid Plan Terms & Conditions, Yes Reload Terms & Conditions and the Terms and Conditions herein, the Terms and Conditions herein shall prevail, to the extent of any inconsistency in relation to the subject matter herein. Not withstanding any perceived similarities, the terms and the Promotion offer specified herein do not apply to any Devices, Yes 4G LTE Prepaid Starter Pack or Yes Reload card purchased outside of the Promotion.
3. Interpretations & Definitions: All capitalised word and expression herein shall, unless otherwise provided, bear the same meaning as defined in the Prepaid Service Terms and Conditions, the Yes 4G LTE Prepaid Plan Terms & Conditions and/or the Yes Reload Terms & Conditions.
4. Promotion Period. The Promotion is offered from 21 September 2017 while stocks last or until further notice, whichever is earlier ("Promotion Period").
5. The Promotion Bundle. The Promotion bundle comprises the following:
(i) One (1) unit of Samsung Galaxy Note8 ("Device")with a retail value RM3,999.00;
(ii) One (1) Yes 4G LTE Prepaid Starter Pack with a retail value of RM10;
(iii)One (1) Yes Reload card with RM30 Yes Credits; and
(iv) Four (4) Yes Reload with RM30 Yes Credits each to be credited via Yes’ system subject to Clause 8 below.
Choice of colour for the Samsung Galaxy Note8 smartphone is subject to stock availability.
6. Payment Upon Purchase: Total payment required for the purchase of the Promotion bundle as described in Clause 5 above shall be RM 3,999.00 inclusive of GST which shall be paid by the Yes Subscriber upon purchase. The Promotion bundle is available for purchase at selective Yes Premium Store only. www.yes.my/support/store-locator.
7. Service Activation: Upon purchase of the Promotion bundle, the Yes Subscriber is required to immediately activate the Yes 4G LTE Prepaid Starter Pack provided under the Promotion bundle by registering the Yes 4G Prepaid Plan with the Yes authorized dealer. Self-registration or any other form of registration of the Yes 4G Prepaid Plan will not entitle the Yes Subscriber to the benefits herein.Upon the successful activation of the Yes 4G LTE Prepaid Starter Pack, the Yes Subscriber is required to immediately activate the RM30 Yes Reload card provided under the Promotion bundle (item 5(iii) above).
8. Provision of the Monthly Free RM30 Yes Credit: Upon the successful activation of the Yes 4G LTE Prepaid Starter Pack and the RM30 Yes Reload card mentioned in Clause 7 above, the monthly free RM30 Yes Credit mentioned in Clause 5 (iv) above will be credited via Yes’ system into the Yes Subscriber’s account on the second day of each month for the following four (4) consecutive months, until a total RM120 has been credited into the Yes Subscriber's account provided that the Service account of the Yes Subscriber is not terminated or suspended.
The following illustrates the crediting of the monthly free RM30 Yes Credit:-
Illustration 1:Activation of the free RM30 Yes Reload card on 21 Sept 2017, the four (4) monthly free RM30 Yes Credit will be credited by Yes' system automatically on:
• 2 Oct 2017;
• 2 Nov 2017;
• 2 Dec 2017; and
• 2 Jan 2018.
Illustration2: Activation of the free RM30 Yes Reload card on 31 Oct 2017, the four (4) monthly free RM30 Yes Credit will be credited by Yes' system automatically on:
• 2 Nov 2017;
• 2 Dec 2017;
• 2 Jan 2018; and
• 2 Feb 2018.
9. Not exchangeable for cash. The Promotion items/services in the Promotion bundle are not exchangeable for cash or any other product and/or service including any other Prepaid Service Plan offered by Yes.
10. Device Warranty. The Samsung Galaxy Note8 provided under the Promotion shall be subject to Samsung’s limited warranty at http://www.samsung.com/my/support/warranty
11. Exclusion of liability for use of Samsung Galaxy Note8. Yes shall not be liable for any loss, damages or injury for the Samsung Galaxy Note8 or to the Yes Subscriber or to any person claiming through the Yes Subscriber arising from the use or inability to use the Samsung Galaxy Note8 or from any cause whatsoever.
12. Right to change. Yes reserves the right to change, modify and/or amend these terms at any time. A modification, change and/or amendment to these terms will be deemed to be effective upon a notice being placed upon Yes' official website or sent digitally to the affected Yes Subscribers.

3. Interpretations & Definitions: All capitalised words and expressions herein shall, unless otherwise provided, bear the same meanings as defined in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions and the Postpaid Service Plans Terms & Conditions.
4. Definitions: The following capitalised words or phrases shall have the meanings as assigned:
"Upfront Payment" means the reimbursable sum of money collected for any Device provided to the Subscriber under the Promotion bundle at the time of registration.
5. Promotion Period. The Promotion is being offered from 5 September 2017 until further notice ("Promotion Period").
6. The Promotion Bundle. One (1) unit of Samsung Galaxy Note8 ("Device") bundled with the subscription of Yes LTE 88 or Yes LTE 128. The bundled plan of Yes LTE 88 or Yes LTE 128 will be contracted with a 24 months contract period. The Samsung Galaxy Note8 are available in maple gold, midnight black and orchid grey colour only and are subject to stock availability.
7. Service Offerings & Commitment Fee: The terms of offer for the respective bundled Postpaid Service Plans subscribed under the Promotion are as follows:
• The Device of Samsung Galaxy Note8 bundled with Yes LTE 88 will be provided with Data Capacity Allocation of 30GB 4G LTE Data, free unlimited On-Net services of voice call minutes and SMS at Commitment Fee of RM88.
• The Device of Samsung Galaxy Note8 bundled with Yes LTE 128 will be provided with Data Capacity Allocation of 50GB 4G LTE Data, free unlimited On-Net services of voice call minutes and SMS at Commitment Fee of RM128.
8. Payment Upon Registration: Payments required upon registration of the respective bundled Postpaid Service Plans are:
 
8.1) In respect of the bundled plan for Yes LTE 88, a non-refundable Device Price of RM2699, Upfront Payment of RM 800 shall be paid by the Yes Subscriber upon registration. The Activation Fee will be waived.
8.2) In respect of the bundled plan for Yes LTE 128, a non-refundable Device Price of RM1899, Upfront Payment of RM1600 shall be paid by the Yes Subscriber upon registration. The Activation Fee will be waived.
  Additionally, if the Yes Subscriber is a non-Malaysian, a refundable deposit of RM100 will be collected which will be refunded free of interest 45 days after the expiry or termination of the Service account subject to any deduction which may be due from the Yes Subscriber to Yes.
9. Rebate: Provided that the Yes Subscriber's Service account is not suspended or terminated at the time of rebate and where relevant, the Upfront Payment paid by the Yes Subscriber under the Promotion will be rebated to the Yes Subscriber's account over the 24 months Contract Period in the amount as follows:
  From 1st Month to 24th Month:
i) In relation to the bundled plan for Yes LTE 88 – RM 33.33 per month and,
ii) In relation to the bundled plan for Yes LTE 128 – RM 66.67 per month
10. The amount of charges and rebates stated in Clause 7, Clause 8 and Clause 9 respectively are exclusive of SST. Such SST, if relevant, shall be added to the charges and/or rebates and be paid accordingly.
11. Addition/Removal of Service Plan: Yes reserves the right to add other types of Postpaid Service Plan to and/or remove any of the Postpaid Service Plans as stated herein from the Promotion in accordance with Clause 16 below.
12. Not exchangeable for cash. For the avoidance of doubt, the Promotion items/services in the Promotion bundle are not exchangeable for cash or any other product and/or service including any other Postpaid Service Plan offered by Yes.
13. Early Termination Charges: If the Yes Subscriber terminates the Service subscribed under the Promotion before the expiry of the relevant Contract Period or if the Service account is terminated by Yes due to the Yes Subscriber's default, the Early Termination Charges as provided in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions shall apply.
14. Device Warranty. Each Device provided under the Promotion shall be subject to its respective manufacturer's warranty. The Yes Device shall be subject to the Yes Limited Warranty at www.yes.my/tnc.
15. Exclusion of liability for use of Samsung Galaxy Note8. Yes shall not be liable for any loss, damages or injury for the Samsung Galaxy Note8 or to the Yes Subscriber or to any person claiming through the Yes Subscriber arising from the use or inability to the Samsung Galaxy Note8 or from any cause whatsoever.
16. Right to change. Yes reserves the right to change, modify and/or amend these terms at any time. A modification, change and/or amendment to these terms will be deemed to be effective upon a notice being placed upon Yes official website or sent digitally to all affected Yes Subscribers.

a) Samsung Galaxy S8, from 1st Month to 24th Month:
i) In relation to the bundled plan for Yes LTE 88 – RM17.17 per month and,
ii) In relation to the bundled plan for Yes LTE 128 – RM29.13 per month
b) Samsung Galaxy S8+, from 1st Month to 24th Month:
i) In relation to the bundled plan for Yes LTE 88 – RM25.50 per month and,
ii) In relation to the bundled plan for Yes LTE 128 – RM32.17 per month

2. Applicable Terms & Conditions: Subject only to the variations as expressly set out herein, all other terms and conditions contained in the Prepaid Service Terms and Conditions, Yes 4G LTE Prepaid Plan Terms & Conditions and Yes Reload Terms & Conditions (available at www.yes.my/tnc) shall remain and be applicable to the Promotion. In the event of any inconsistency between the Prepaid Service Terms and Conditions, Yes 4G LTE Prepaid Plan Terms & Conditions, Yes Reload Terms & Conditions and the Terms and Conditions herein, the Terms and Conditions herein shall prevail, to the extent of any inconsistency in relation to the subject matter herein. Notwithstanding any perceived similarities, the terms and the Promotion offer specified herein do not apply to any Devices, Yes 4G LTE Prepaid Starter Pack or Yes Reload card purchased outside of the Promotion.
3. Interpretations & Definitions: All capitalised word and expression herein shall, unless otherwise provided, bear the same meaning as defined in the Prepaid Service Terms and Conditions, the Yes 4G LTE Prepaid Plan Terms & Conditions and/or the Yes Reload Terms & Conditions.
4. Definitions: The following capitalised words or phrases shall have the meanings as assigned:
"Device Price" means the special promotion price of RM199 (inclusive of GST) for the Yes Altitude smartphone provided to the Yes Subscriber under the Promotion, which payment shall be made by the Yes Subscriber to Yes at the time of the purchase.
5. Promotion Period. The Promotion is offered from 21 October 2016 while stocks last or until further notice, whichever is earlier ("Promotion Period").
6. The Promotion Bundle. There are two (2) types of Promotion bundle being offered as follows:
Type A: The Promotion bundle comprises of:-
i. One (1) unit of Yes Altitude smartphone ("Device");
ii. One (1) free Yes 4G LTE Prepaid Starter Pack; and
iii. One (1) RM100 Yes Reload Card.
Type B: The Promotion bundle comprises of:
i. One (1) unit of Yes Altitude smartphone ("Device");
ii. One (1) free Yes 4G LTE Prepaid Starter Pack; and
iii. Four (4) Yes Reload Cards in the combination of one (1) RM50 Yes Reload Card, one (1) RM30 Yes Reload Card and two (2) RM10 Yes Reload Cards.

All rights, benefits, terms and conditions of the Yes 4G Prepaid Starter Pack as stated at https://www.yes.my/4g-lte-prepaid shall apply. Subject to Cause 8 below, the rights, benefits, terms and conditions of the bundled Yes Reload Cards as stated at https://www.yes.my/tnc/products-services-tnc shall apply. The Yes Altitude smartphone is available in white, silver or gold colour only and is subject to stock availability.
7. Payment Upon Purchase: Total payment required for the purchase of the Promotion bundle shall be RM 299.00 which comprises of: (i) a non-refundable Device Price of RM199 (inclusive of GST) and (ii) RM100 for the Yes Reload Cards (inclusive of GST) as stated in Clause 6. The total payment shall be paid by the Yes Subscriber upon the purchase of the Promotion bundle which is made available only at selective Yes authorized dealers. Upon purchase of the Promotion bundle, the Yes Subscriber is required to immediately register his/her/its Yes 4G LTE Prepaid Plan by the activation of the Yes 4G LTE Prepaid Starter Pack provided to the Yes Subscriber under the Promotion bundle with the Yes authorized dealer. The Yes Subscriber will not be able to perform his/her/its own registration of the Yes 4G LTE Prepaid Plan by his/her/its own activation of the Yes 4G LTE Prepaid Starter Pack.
8. Activation of the Yes Reload Cards: Under the Type A Promotion Bundle, the RM100 Yes Reload Card provided under the Promotion bundle must be activated at the time of purchase of the Promotion bundle and registration of Yes 4G LTE Prepaid Plan. Upon its successful activation, the system will automatically use the RM100 Reload Card to purchase a Prepaid LTE Data Add-On 30. The balance RM70 value of Yes Credits after the purchase of the Prepaid LTE Data Add-On 30 shall remain in the Yes Subscriber's Yes account.

Under the Type B Promotion Bundle, either the RM30 Yes Reload Card or the RM50 Yes Reload Card, as will be identified in the respective Promotion bundle pack, must be activated at the time of purchase of the Promotion bundle and registration of Yes 4G LTE Prepaid Plan. Upon the successful activation thereof, the system shall automatically use the activated Reload Card to purchase a Prepaid LTE Data Add-On 30. If the RM50 Yes Reload Card had been activated and used to purchase the said Prepaid LTE Data Add-On 30, the balance RM20 value of Yes Credits shall remain in the Yes Subscriber's Yes account. The other three (3) Reload Cards which are not activated for the purpose of purchasing the Prepaid LTE Data Add-On 30 aforementioned may be activated at the point of the purchase of the Promotion bundle or later provided that activation of the respective Reload Card must be made before its expiry date as stated on the Yes Reload Card.

The purchase of the said Prepaid LTE Data Add-On 30 will grant 4GB of 4G LTE data to the Yes Subscriber's account. The use of the Prepaid LTE Data Add-On 30 shall be subject to the Prepaid Data Add-On Terms and Conditions at https://www.yes.my/tnc/products-services-tnc.
9. Not exchangeable for cash. The Promotion items/services in the Promotion bundle are not exchangeable for cash or any other product and/or service including any other Prepaid Service Plan offered by Yes.
10. Device Warranty. The Yes Altitude smartphone provided under the Promotion shall be subject to the Yes Limited Warranty at https://www.yes.my/tnc/general-tnc.
11. Exclusion of liability for use of Yes Altitude smartphone. Yes shall not be liable for any loss, damages or injury for the Yes Altitude smartphone or to the Yes Subscriber or to any person claiming through the Yes Subscriber arising from the use or inability to use the Yes Altitude smartphone or from any cause whatsoever.
12. Right to change. Yes reserves the right to change, modify and/or amend these terms at any time. A modification, change and/or amendment to these terms will be deemed to be effective upon a notice being placed upon Yes official website or sent digitally to all affected Yes Subscribers.

Last updated: 03rd September 2016

"Device Price" means the sum of money collected for any Device provided to the Subscriber under the Promotion bundle at the time of registration.

1. The Promotion. The Samsung Galaxy Note7 with Postpaid Service Plans bundle ("the Promotion") is a time-limited offer launched by YTL Communications Sdn Bhd ("Yes").
2. Applicable Terms & Conditions: Subject only to the variations as expressly set out herein, all other terms and conditions contained in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions and the Postpaid Service Plans Terms & Conditions (available at www.yes.my/tnc) shall remain and be applicable to the Promotion. In the event of any inconsistency between the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions and Postpaid Service Plans Terms & Conditions and the Terms and Conditions herein, the Terms and Conditions herein shall prevail, to the extent of any inconsistency. Notwithstanding any perceived similarities, the terms and the Promotion offer specified herein do not apply to any Devices purchased, or any Postpaid Service Plan subscribed, outside of the Promotion Period.
3. Interpretations & Definitions: All capitalised words and expressions herein shall, unless otherwise provided, bear the same meanings as defined in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions and the Postpaid Service Plans Terms & Conditions.
4. Definitions: The following capitalised words or phrases shall have the meanings as assigned:
"Upfront Payment" means the reimbursable sum of money collected for any Device provided to the Subscriber under the Promotion bundle at the time of registration.
5. Promotion Period. The Promotion is being offered from 8th August 2016 until further notice ("Promotion Period").
6. The Promotion Bundle. One (1) unit of Samsung Galaxy Note7("Device") bundled with the subscription of Yes 4G LTE Postpaid 88 or Yes 4G LTE Postpaid 128. The bundled plan of Yes 4G LTE Postpaid 88 or Yes 4G LTE Postpaid 128 will be contracted with a 24 months contract period. The Samsung Galaxy Note7 is available in Gold Platinum, Silver Titanium and Black Onyx colour only and is subject to stock availability.
7. Service Offerings & Commitment Fee: The terms of offer for the respective bundled Postpaid Service Plans subscribed under the Promotion are as follows:
• The Device of Samsung Galaxy Note7 bundled with Yes 4G LTE Postpaid 88 will be provided with Data Capacity Allocation of 16GB 4G LTE Data and 8GB 4G Broadband Data, free unlimited On-Net services of voice call minutes and SMS at Commitment Fee of RM88.

• The Device of Samsung Galaxy Note7 bundled with Yes 4G LTE Postpaid 128 will be provided with Data Capacity Allocation of 24GB 4G LTE Data and 14GB 4G Broadband Data, free unlimited On-Net services of voice call minutes and SMS at Commitment Fee of RM128.
8. Payment Upon Registration: Payments required upon registration of the respective bundled Postpaid Service Plans are:

8.1 In respect of the bundled plan for Yes 4G LTE Postpaid 88, a non-refundable Device Price of RM1,885.84 and Upfront Payment of RM498.11 shall be paid by the Yes Subscriber upon registration. The Plan Advance Payment and Activation Fee will be waived.

8.2 In respect of the bundled plan for Yes 4G LTE Postpaid 128, a non-refundable Device Price of RM1,508.49 and Upfront Payment of RM724.53 shall be paid by the Yes Subscriber upon registration. The Plan Advance Payment and Activation Fee will be waived.

8.3 Additionally, if the Yes Subscriber is a non-Malaysian, a refundable deposit of RM100 will be collected which will be refunded free of interest 45 days after the expiry or termination of the Service account subject to any deduction which may be due from the Yes Subscriber to Yes.
9. Rebate: Provided that the Yes Subscriber's Service account is not suspended or terminated at the time of rebate and where relevant, the Upfront Payment paid by the Yes Subscriber under the Promotion will be rebated to the Yes Subscriber's account over the 24 months Contract Period in the amount as follows:

a) From 1st Month to 24th Month:
i) In relation to the bundled plan for Yes 4G LTE Postpaid 88 - RM20.75 per month and,
ii) In relation to the bundled plan for Yes 4G LTE Postpaid 128 - RM30.19 per month
10. The amount of charges and rebates stated in Clause 7, Clause 8 and Clause 9 respectively are exclusive of GST. Such GST, if relevant, shall be added to the charges and/or rebates and be paid accordingly.
11. Addition/Removal of Service Plan: Yes reserves the right to add other types of Postpaid Service Plan to and/or remove any of the Postpaid Service Plans as stated herein from the Promotion in accordance with Clause 16 below.
12. Not exchangeable for cash. For the avoidance of doubt, the Promotion items/services in the Promotion bundle are not exchangeable for cash or any other product and/or service including any other Postpaid Service Plan offered by Yes.
13. Early Termination Charges: If the Yes Subscriber terminates the Service subscribed under the Promotion before the expiry of the relevant Contract Period or if the Service account is terminated by Yes due to the Yes Subscriber's default, the Early Termination Charges as provided in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions shall apply.
14. Device Warranty. Each Device provided under the Promotion shall be subject to its respective manufacturer's warranty. The Yes Device shall be subject to the Yes Limited Warranty at www.yes.my/tnc
15. Exclusion of liability for use of Samsung Galaxy Note7. Yes shall not be liable for any loss, damages or injury for the Samsung Galaxy Note7 or to the Yes Subscriber or to any person claiming through the Yes Subscriber arising from the use or inability to the Samsung Galaxy Note7 or from any cause whatsoever.
