1. The Promotion. The Yes Altitude with Postpaid Service Plans bundle ("the Promotion") is a time-limited offer launched by YTL Communications Sdn Bhd ("Yes").
2. Applicable Terms & Conditions: Subject only to the variations as expressly set out herein, all other terms and conditions contained in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions and the Postpaid Service Plans Terms & Conditions (available at www.yes.my/tnc) shall remain and be applicable to the Promotion. In the event of any inconsistency between the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions and Postpaid Service Plans Terms & Conditions and the Terms and Conditions herein, the Terms and Conditions herein shall prevail, to the extent of any inconsistency. Notwithstanding any perceived similarities, the terms and the Promotion offer specified herein do not apply to any Devices purchased, or any Postpaid Service Plan subscribed, outside of the Promotion Period.
3. Interpretations & Definitions: All capitalised words and expressions herein shall, unless otherwise provided, bear the same meanings as defined in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions and the Postpaid Service Plans Terms & Conditions.
4. Definitions: The following capitalised words or phrases shall have the meanings as assigned:
"Upfront Payment" means the reimbursable sum of money collected for any Device provided to the Subscriber under the Promotion bundle at the time of registration.
5. Promotion Period. The Promotion is being offered from 30th June 2016 until further notice ("Promotion Period").
6. The Promotion Bundle. One (1) unit of Yes Altitude ("Device") bundled with the subscription of Yes 4G LTE Postpaid 48, Yes 4G LTE Postpaid 68, Yes 4G LTE Postpaid 78 or Yes 4G LTE Postpaid 88. The bundled plan of Yes 4G LTE Postpaid 48, Yes 4G LTE Postpaid 68 and Yes 4G LTE Postpaid 78 will be contracted with a 12 months contract period, and the bundled plan of Yes 4G LTE Postpaid 88 will be contracted with a 11 months contract period. The Yes Altitude is available in white, silver or gold colour only and is subject to stock availability.
7. Service Offerings & Commitment Fee: The terms of offer for the respective bundled Postpaid Service Plans subscribed under the Promotion are as follows:
• The Device of Yes Altitude bundled with Yes 4G LTE Postpaid 48 will be provided with Data Capacity Allocation of 6GB 4G LTE Data and 4GB 4G Broadband Data, free unlimited On-Net services of voice call minutes and SMS at Commitment Fee of RM48.

• The Device of Yes Altitude bundled with Yes 4G LTE Postpaid 68 will be provided with Data Capacity Allocation of 12GB 4G LTE Data and 4GB 4G Broadband Data, free unlimited On-Net services of voice call minutes and SMS at Commitment Fee of RM68.

• The Device of Yes Altitude bundled with Yes 4G LTE Postpaid 78 will be provided with Data Capacity Allocation of 16GB 4G LTE Data and 4GB 4G Broadband Data, free unlimited On-Net services of voice call minutes and SMS at Commitment Fee of RM78.

• The Device of Yes Altitude bundled with Yes 4G LTE Postpaid 88 will be provided with Data Capacity Allocation of 16GB 4G LTE Data and 8GB 4G Broadband Data, free unlimited On-Net services of voice call minutes and SMS at Commitment Fee of RM88.
8. Payment Upon Registration: Payments required upon registration of the respective bundled Postpaid Service Plans are:

8.1 In respect of the bundled plan for Yes 4G LTE Postpaid 48, a non-refundable Device Price of RM199 and Activation fee of RM100 shall be paid by the Yes Subscriber upon registration. The Plan Advance Payment and Upfront Payment will be waived.

8.2 In respect of the bundled plan for Yes 4G LTE Postpaid 68, a non-refundable Device Price of RM188 shall be paid by the Yes Subscriber upon registration. The Plan Advance Payment, Upfront Payment and Activation fee will be waived.

8.3 In respect of the bundled plan for Yes 4G LTE Postpaid 78, a non-refundable RM100 Activation Fee and the relevant Commitment Fee (known as "Plan Advance Payment") will be collected upon registration. The Plan Advance Payment will be rebated to the Yes Subscriber's account in the first month bill.

8.4 In respect of the bundled plan for Yes 4G LTE Postpaid 88, a non-refundable Activation fee of RM100 and Upfront Payment of RM198 shall be paid by the Yes Subscriber upon registration. The Device price and Plan Advance Payment will be waived.

8.5 Additionally, if the Yes Subscriber is a non-Malaysian, a refundable deposit of RM100 will be collected which will be refunded free of interest 45 days after the expiry or termination of the Service account subject to any deduction which may be due from the Yes Subscriber to Yes.
9. Rebate: Provided that the Yes Subscriber's Service account is not suspended or terminated at the time of rebate and where relevant, the Upfront Payment paid by the Yes Subscriber under the Promotion will be rebated to the Yes Subscriber's account over the 11 months Contract Period in the amount as follows:

a) From 1st month to 11th month:
In relation to the bundled plan for Yes 4G LTE Postpaid 88- RM18 per month
10. The amount of charges and rebates stated in Clause 7, Clause 8 and Clause 9 respectively are exclusive of GST. Such GST, if relevant, shall be added to the charges and/or rebates and be paid accordingly.
11. Addition/Removal of Service Plan: Yes reserves the right to add other types of Postpaid Service Plan to and/or remove any of the Postpaid Service Plans as stated herein from the Promotion in accordance with Clause 16 below.
12. Not exchangeable for cash. For the avoidance of doubt, the Promotion items/services in the Promotion bundle are not exchangeable for cash or any other product and/or service including any other Postpaid Service Plan offered by Yes.
13. Early Termination Charges: If the Yes Subscriber terminates the Service subscribed under the Promotion before the expiry of the relevant Contract Period or if the Service account is terminated by Yes due to the Yes Subscriber's default, the Early Termination Charges as provided in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions shall apply.
14. Device Warranty. Each Device provided under the Promotion shall be subject to its respective manufacturer's warranty. The Yes Device shall be subject to the Yes Limited Warranty at www.yes.my/tnc
15. Exclusion of liability for use of Yes Altitude. Yes shall not be liable for any loss, damages or injury for the Yes Altitude or to the Yes Subscriber or to any person claiming through the Yes Subscriber arising from the use or inability to the Yes Altitude or from any cause whatsoever.

Last updated : 28 August 2015

1. The Promotion. The Samsung Galaxy S6 with Huddle XS Super Postpaid Plan Bundle Promotion ("the Promotion") is a time-limited offer launched by YTL Communications Sdn Bhd ("Yes") for its Super Postpaid Plans.
2. Applicable Terms & Conditions: Subject only to the variations as expressly set out herein, all other terms and conditions contained in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions (available at www.yes.my/tnc) shall remain and be applicable to the respective Super Postpaid Plans subscribed under the Promotion. Notwithstanding any perceived similarities, the terms and the Promotion offer specified herein do not apply to any Yes devices purchased, or any Yes Service Plan subscribed, outside of the Promotion Period.
3. Interpretations & Definitions: All capitalised words and expressions herein shall, unless otherwise provided, bear the same meanings as defined in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions.
4. Definitions: The following capitalised words or phrases shall have the meanings as assigned:
"All Day Data" means data which is available for use at anytime of the day.
"Upfront Payment" means the reimbursable sum of money collected for any device provided to the Subscriber under the Promotion bundle at the time of registration.
"GST" means goods and services tax or similar value added tax imposed on the sale of goods or the provision of services under the Goods and Services Tax 2014.
"Off-Net" means the provisioning of services beyond Yes' network where access to a third party service provider's network will be required in order to provide the services.
"On-Net" means the provisioning of services within Yes' network and access to a third party service provider's network will not be required in order to provide the services.
"Plan Advance Payment" means the relevant Commitment Fee for the first month collected at the time of registration of the Service Plan.
5. Promotion Period. The Promotion is being offered from 16 th April 2015 until further notice ("Promotion Period").
6. The Promotion Bundle. One (1) unit of Samsung Galaxy S6 and one (1) unit of Huddle XS 4G Mobile Hotspot ("Yes Device") bundled with the subscription of any Super Postpaid Plan (128/158) for a Contract Period of 24 months. The Samsung Galaxy S6 is subject to stock availability and available in white or gold colour only.
7. Service Offerings & Commitment Fee: The terms of offer for the respective Super Postpaid Plans subscribed under the Promotion are as follows:

• Super 128 is provided with Data Capacity Allocation of 8GB All Day Data, free 2,000 On-Net voice call minutes and 2,000 On-Net SMS at Commitment Fee of RM 128.

• Super 158 is provided with Data Capacity Allocation of 10GB All Day Data, free 2,000 On-Net voice call minutes and 2,000 On-Net SMS at Commitment Fee of RM 158.

The free On-Net voice call minutes and free On-Net SMS provided in Clause 7 above are only applicable to subscribers who subscribed for the Promotion before 28 August 2015 and shall not be applicable to subscribers who subscribe to the Promotion from 28th August 2015 onwards.
8. Payment Upon Registration: Payments required upon registration of the respective Super Postpaid Plans are:

8.1 In respect of Super 128, a non-refundable Device Price of RM1,299 and Upfront Payment of RM800 shall be paid by the subscriber upon registration. The Yes Device price of RM 480.00, Plan Advance Payment, and Activation Fee will be waived.

8.2 In respect of Super 158, a non-refundable Device Price of RM799 and Upfront Payment of RM1240 shall be paid by the subscriber upon registration. The Yes Device price of RM 480.00, Plan Advance Payment, and Activation Fee will be waived.

8.3 In respect of Super 128, an Upfront Payment of RM800 shall be paid by the subscriber upon registration. The Yes Device price of RM 480.00, Device Price, Plan Advance Payment, and Activation Fee will be waived.

8.4 In respect of Super 158, an Upfront Payment of RM1240 shall be paid by the subscriber upon registration. The Yes Device price of RM 480.00, Device Price, Plan Advance Payment, and Activation Fee will be waived.

8.5 Additionally, if the subscriber is a non-Malaysian, a refundable deposit of RM 100 will be collected which will be refunded free of interest 45 days after the expiry or termination of the Service account subject to any deduction which may be due from the subscriber to Yes.
9. Rebate: Provided that the subscriber's Service account is not suspended or terminated at the time of rebate, and where relevant, the Upfront Payment paid by the subscriber under the Promotion will be rebated to the subscriber's account over the 24 months Contract Period in the respective amount as follows:

a) From 1st month to 23rd month:
i) Super 128 - RM 30 per month
ii) Super 158 - RM 50 per month

b) On the 24th month:
i) Super 128 - RM 110
i) Super 158 - RM 90

The amount of charges and rebates stated in Clause 7, Clause 8 and Clause 9 respectively are exclusive of GST. Such GST, if relevant, shall be added to the charges and/or rebates and be paid accordingly.
10. Addition/Removal of Service Plan: Yes reserves the right to add other types of Service Plan to and/or remove any of the Service Plan as stated herein from the Promotion in accordance with Clause 16 below.
11. Provision of Free On-Net services: In relation to the free voice calls and/or free SMS mentioned in Clause 7 herein, Yes may cease to provide the free On-Net voice call minutes and/or free On-Net SMS or modify or amend the provision thereof at any time at Yes's sole and absolute discretion by notice in accordance with Clause 16. Subject to the foregoing, the free On-Net voice call minutes and free On-Net SMS will be provided on a monthly basis in accordance with the relevant Billing Cycle of the subscriber's Service account and will only be valid for the duration of the Billing Cycle in which they are provided. Any unutilised free call minutes/SMS will lapse at the expiry of the relevant Billing Cycle.
12. Not exchangeable for cash. For the avoidance of doubt, the Promotion items/services in the Promotion bundle are not exchangeable for cash or any other product and/or service including any other Postpaid Service Plan offered by Yes.
13. Early Termination Charges: If the subscriber terminates the Service subscribed under the Promotion before the expiry of the Contract Period or if the Service account is terminated by Yes due to the subscriber's default, the Early Termination Charges as provided in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions shall apply.
14. Device Warranty. Each device provided under the Promotion shall be subject to its respective manufacturer's warranty. The Yes Device shall be subject to the Yes Limited Warranty at www.yes.my/tnc. The Samsung Galaxy S6 shall be subject to Samsung's limited Warranty at http://www.samsung.com/my/support/warranty/.
15. Exclusion of liability for use of Samsung Galaxy S6. Yes shall not be liable for any loss, damages or injury to the Samsung Galaxy S6 or to the subscriber or to any person claiming through the subscriber arising from the use or inability of use to the Samsung Galaxy S6 or from any cause whatsoever.
16. Amendments. We reserve the right to change, modify and/or amend the terms of the Promotion at any time, with notice to the affected parties. For the purposes of this provision, a modification, change and/or amendment to these terms will be deemed to be effective upon a notice being placed upon Yes official website. We may, in addition send corresponding notices digitally to the Yes ID accounts of all validly active registered subscribers affected by such change, modification and/or amendment.

2. Applicable Terms & Conditions: Subject only to the variations as expressly set out herein, all other terms and conditions contained in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions (available at www.yes.my/tnc) shall remain and be applicable to the Super Postpaid Plans subscribed under the Promotion. Notwithstanding any perceived similarities, the terms and the Promotion offer specified herein do not apply to any Yes devices purchased, or any Yes Service Plan subscribed, outside of the Promotion Period.
3. Interpretations & Definitions: All capitalised words and expressions herein shall, unless otherwise provided, bear the same meanings as defined in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions.
4. Definitions: The following capitalised words or phrases shall have the meanings as assigned:
"All Day Data" means data which is available for use at anytime of the day.
"Upfront Payment" means the reimbursable sum of money collected for any device provided to the Subscriber under the Promotion bundle at the time of registration.
"GST" means goods and services tax or similar value added tax imposed on the sale of goods or the provision of services under the Goods and Services Tax 2014.
"Off-Net" means the provisioning of services beyond Yes' network where access to a third party service provider's network will be required in order to provide the services.
"On-Net" means the provisioning of services within Yes' network and access to a third party service provider's network will not be required in order to provide the services.
"Plan Advance Payment" means the relevant Commitment Fee for the first month collected at the time of registration of the Service Plan.
5. Promotion Period. The Promotion is being offered from 16 th April 2015 until further notice ("Promotion Period").
6. The Promotion Bundle. One (1) unit of Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge and one (1) unit of Huddle XS 4G Mobile Hotspot ("Yes Device") bundled with the subscription of Super Postpaid Plan 158 for a Contract Period of 24 months. The Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge is subject to stock availability and available in white or gold colour only.

• Commitment Fee - RM 158
• Data Capacity Allocation - 10GB All Day Data
• Free On-Net voice call – 2,000 minutes/month
• Free On-Net SMS – 2,000 minutes/month

The free On-Net voice call minutes and free On-Net SMS provided in Clause 7 above are only applicable to subscribers who subscribed for the Promotion before 28 August 2015 and shall not be applicable to subscribers who subscribe to the Promotion from 28th August 2015 onwards.
8. Payment Upon Registration: Payments required upon registration of the Super Postpaid Plan 158 under the Promotion are:

• Device Price – RM999.00 (non-refundable)
• Upfront Payment – RM 1,531.00
• Yes Device price of RM 480.00 – waived
• Activation Fee – waived
• Deposit – RM100 (applicable to non-Malaysian subscribers only. Deposit refundable free of interest 45 days after the expiry or termination of the Service account subject to any deduction which may be due from the subscriber to Yes)
9. Rebate: Provided that the subscriber's Service account is not suspended or terminated at the time of rebate, the Upfront Payment paid by the subscriber under the Promotion will be rebated to the subscriber's account over the 24 months Contract Period in the amount as follows:

a. From 1st month to 23 rd month – RM 66 per month
b. On the 24th month - RM13

The amount of charges and rebates stated in Clause 7, Clause 8 and Clause 9 respectively are exclusive of GST. Such GST, if relevant, shall be added to the charges and/or rebates and be paid accordingly.
10. Addition/Removal of Service Plan: Yes reserves the right to add other types of Service Plan to and to remove any of the Service Plans from the Promotion in accordance with Clause 16 below.
11. Provision of Free On-Net services: : Yes may cease to provide the free On-Net voice call minutes and/or free On-Net SMS or modify or amend the provision thereof at any time at Yes's sole and absolute discretion by notice in accordance with Clause 15. Subject to the foregoing, the free On-Net voice call minutes and free On-Net SMS will be provided on a monthly basis in accordance with the relevant Billing Cycle of the subscriber's Service account and will only be valid for the duration of the Billing Cycle in which they are provided. Any unutilised free call minutes/SMS will lapse at the expiry of the relevant Billing Cycle.
12. Not exchangeable for cash. For the avoidance of doubt, the Promotion items/services in the Promotion bundle are not exchangeable for cash or any other product and/or service including any other Postpaid Service Plan offered by Yes.
13. Early Termination Charges: If the subscriber terminates the Service subscribed under the Promotion before the expiry of the Contract Period or if the Service account is terminated by Yes due to the subscriber's default, the Early Termination Charges as provided in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions shall apply.
14. Device Warranty. Each device provided under the Promotion shall be subject to its respective manufacturer's warranty. The Yes Device shall be subject to the Yes Limited Warranty at www.yes.my/tnc. The Samsung Galaxy S6 shall be subject to Samsung's limited Warranty at http://www.samsung.com/my/support/warranty/.
15. Exclusion of liability for use of Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge. Yes shall not be liable for any loss, damages or injury to the Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge or to the subscriber or to any person claiming through the subscriber arising from the use or inability of use to the Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge or from any cause whatsoever.
16. Amendments. We reserve the right to change, modify and/or amend the terms of the Promotion at any time, with notice to the affected parties. For the purposes of this provision, a modification, change and/or amendment to these terms will be deemed to be effective upon a notice being placed upon Yes official website. We may, in addition send corresponding notices digitally to the Yes ID accounts of all validly active registered subscribers affected by such change, modification and/or amendment.

Last updated : 28th August 2015

1. The Promotion. The Huawei Honor Tablet (WiFi) with Huddle XS Super Postpaid Plan Bundle Promotion ("the Promotion") is a time-limited offer launched by YTL Communications Sdn Bhd ("Yes") for its Super Postpaid Plans.
2. Applicable Terms & Conditions: Subject only to the variations as expressly set out herein, all other terms and conditions contained in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions (available at www.yes.my/tnc) shall remain and be applicable to the respective Super Postpaid Plans subscribed under the Promotion. Notwithstanding any perceived similarities, the terms and the Promotion offer specified herein do not apply to any Yes devices purchased, or any Yes Service Plan subscribed, outside of the Promotion Period.
3. Interpretations & Definitions: All capitalised words and expressions herein shall, unless otherwise provided, bear the same meanings as defined in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions.
4. Definitions: The following capitalised words or phrases shall have the meanings as assigned:
"All Day Data" means data which is available for use at any time of the day.
"GST" means goods and services tax or similar value added tax imposed on the sale of goods or the provision of services under the Goods and Services Tax 2014.
"Off-Net" means the provisioning of services beyond Yes' network where access to a third party service provider's network will be required in order to provide the services.
"On-Net" means the provisioning of services within Yes' network and access to a third party service provider's network will not be required in order to provide the services.
"Plan Advance Payment" means the relevant Commitment Fee for the first month collected at the time of registration of the Service Plan.
"Upfront Payment" means the reimbursable sum of money collected for any device which is provided to the Subscriber under the Promotion bundle at the time of registration.
5. Promotion Period. The Promotion is being offered from 31st July 2015 until further notice. ("Promotion Period").
6. The Promotion Bundle. One (1) unit of Huawei Honor Tablet (WiFi) and one (1) unit of Huddle XS 4G Mobile Hotspot ("Yes Device") bundled with the subscription of any Super Postpaid Plan (78/98) for a Contract Period of 24 months. The Huawei Honor Tablet (WiFi) is subject to stock availability and available in white colour only.
7. Service Offerings & Commitment Fee: The terms of offer for the respective Super Postpaid Plans subscribed under the Promotion are as follows:
 
• Super 78 is provided with Data Capacity Allocation of 7GB All Day Data, free 1,000 On-Net voice call minutes and 1,000 On-Net SMS at Commitment Fee of RM 78.
• Super 98 is provided with Data Capacity Allocation of 9GB All Day Data, free 2,000 On-Net voice call minutes and 2,000 On-Net SMS at Commitment Fee of RM 98.
The free On-Net voice call minutes and free On-Net SMS provided in Clause 7 above are only applicable to subscribers who subscribed for the Promotion before 28 August 2015 and shall not be applicable to subscribers who subscribe to the Promotion from 28th August 2015 onwards.
8. Payment Upon Registration: Payments required upon registration of the respective Super Postpaid Plans are:
 
8.1 In respect of Super 78, a non-refundable Device Price of RM99, Activation Fee of RM100 and Upfront Payment of RM200 shall be paid by the subscriber upon registration. The Yes Device price of RM 480 and Plan Advance Payment will be waived.
8.2 In respect of Super 98, an Activation Fee of RM100 and Upfront Payment of RM299 shall be paid by the subscriber upon registration. The Yes Device price of RM 480 and Plan Advance Payment Fee will be waived.
8.3 Additionally, if the subscriber is a non-Malaysian, a refundable deposit of RM 100 will be collected which will be refunded free of interest 45 days after the expiry or termination of the Service account subject to any deduction which may be due from the subscriber to Yes.
9. Rebate: Provided that the subscriber's Service account is not suspended or terminated at the time of rebate, the Upfront Payment paid by the subscriber under the Promotion will be rebated to the subscriber's account over the 24 months Contract Period in the respective amount as follows:
 
  a) From 1st month to 23rd month:
i) Super 78 - RM 8 per month
ii) Super 98 - RM 12 per month
  b) On the 24th month:
i) Super 78 - RM 16
ii) Super 98 - RM 23
10. The amount of charges and rebates stated in Clause 8 and Clause 9 respectively are exclusive of GST. Such GST, if relevant, shall be added to the charges and/or rebates and be paid accordingly.
11. Addition/Removal of Service Plan: Yes reserves the right to add other types of Service Plan to and/or remove any of the Service Plans as stated herein from the Promotion in accordance with Clause 17 below.
12. Provision of Free On-Net services: In relation to the free voice calls and/or free SMS mentioned in Clause 7 herein, Yes may cease to provide the free On-Net voice call minutes and/or free On-Net SMS or modify or amend the provision thereof at any time at Yes's sole and absolute discretion by notice in accordance with Clause 17. Subject to the foregoing, the free On-Net voice call minutes and free On-Net SMS will be provided on a monthly basis in accordance with the relevant Billing Cycle of the subscriber's Service account and will only be valid for the duration of the Billing Cycle in which they are provided. Any unutilised free call minutes/SMS will lapse at the expiry of the relevant Billing Cycle.
13. Not exchangeable for cash. For the avoidance of doubt, the Promotion items/services in the Promotion bundle are not exchangeable for cash or any other product and/or service including any other Postpaid Service Plan offered by Yes.
14. Early Termination Charges: If the subscriber terminates the Service subscribed under the Promotion before the expiry of the Contract Period or if the Service account is terminated by Yes due to the subscriber's default, the Early Termination Charges as provided in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions shall apply.
15. Device Warranty. Each device provided under the Promotion shall be subject to its respective manufacturer's warranty. The Yes Device shall be subject to the Yes Limited Warranty at www.yes.my/tnc. The Huawei Honor Tablet (WiFi) shall be subject to Huawei's limited Warranty at http://www.vmall.my/index.php/warranty-policy.
16. Exclusion of liability for use of Huawei Honor Tablet (WiFi). Yes shall not be liable for any loss, damages or injury to the subscriber or to any person claiming through the subscriber arising from the use or inability to use of the Huawei Honor Tablet (WiFi) or from any cause whatsoever.
17. Amendments. We reserve the right to change, modify and/or amend the terms of the Promotion at any time, with notice to the affected parties. For the purposes of this provision, a modification, change and/or amendment to these terms will be deemed to be effective upon a notice being placed upon Yes official website. We may, in addition send corresponding notices digitally to the Yes ID accounts of all validly active registered subscribers affected by such change, modification and/or amendment.

1. The Promotion. The Acer Iconia One 7 Super Postpaid Plan Promotion ("the Promotion") is a time-limited offer launched by YTL Communications Sdn Bhd ("Yes") for its Super Postpaid Plans.
2. Applicable Terms & Conditions: Subject only to the variations as expressly set out herein, all other terms and conditions contained in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions (available at www.yes.my/tnc) shall remain and be applicable to the respective Super Postpaid Plans subscribed under the Promotion. Notwithstanding any perceived similarities, the terms and the Promotion offer specified herein do not apply to any Yes devices purchased, or any Yes Service Plan subscribed, outside of the Promotion Period.
3. Interpretations & Definitions: All capitalised words and expressions herein shall, unless otherwise provided, bear the same meanings as defined in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions.
4. Definitions: The following capitalised words or phrases shall have the meanings as assigned:
"All Day Data" means data which is available for use at anytime of the day.
"Upfront Payment" means the sum of money collected for any device provided to the Subscriber under the Promotion bundle at the time of registration and rebatable in accordance with the terms of this Promotion.
"GST" means goods and services tax or similar value added tax imposed on the sale of goods or the provision of services under the Goods and Services Tax 2014.
"Off-Net" means the provisioning of services beyond Yes' network where access to a third party service provider's network will be required in order to provide the services.
"On-Net" means the provisioning of services within Yes' network and access to a third party service provider's network will not be required in order to provide the services.
"Plan Advance Payment" means the relevant Commitment Fee for the first month collected at the time of registration of the Service Plan.
5. Promotion Period. The Promotion is being offered from 3rd November 2014 until further notice ("Promotion Period").
6. The Promotion Bundle. One (1) unit of Acer Iconia One 7 Android tablet ("Acer Tablet") and one (1) unit of Huddle XS 4G Mobile Hotspot ("Yes Device") bundled with the subscription of any Super Postpaid Plan (78/98/128/158) for a Contract Period of 24 months. The Acer Tablet is available in four (4) colours namely white, black red and blue subject to stock availability.
7. Service Offerings & Commitment Fee: The terms of offer for the respective Super Postpaid Plans subscribed under the Promotion are as follows:
  • Super 78 is provided with Data Capacity Allocation of 4.5GB All Day Data, free 1,000 On-Net voice call minutes and 1,000 On-Net SMS at Commitment Fee of RM 78.
  • Super 98 is provided with Data Capacity Allocation of 6GB All Day Data, free 2,000 On-Net voice call minutes and 2,000 On-Net SMS at Commitment Fee of RM 98.
  • Super 128 is provided with Data Capacity Allocation of 8GB All Day Data, free 2,000 On-Net voice call minutes and 2,000 On-Net SMS at Commitment Fee of RM 128.
  • Super 158 is provided with Data Capacity Allocation of 10GB All Day, Data free 2,000 On-Net voice call minutes and 2,000 On-Net SMS at Commitment Fee of RM 158.
The free On-Net voice call minutes and free On-Net SMS provided in Clause 7 above are only applicable to subscribers who subscribed for the Promotion before 28 August 2015 and shall not be applicable to subscribers who subscribe to the Promotion from 28th August 2015 onwards.
8. Payment Upon Registration: Payments required upon registration of the respective Super Postpaid Plans are:
8.1 In respect of Super 78, Super 98, Super 128 and Super 158, a non-refundable sum of RM 100 Activation Fee, Plan Advance Payment and a Upfront Payment of RM200 shall be paid by the subscriber upon registration. The Yes Device price of RM 480.00 will be waived.
8.2 Additionally, if the subscriber is a non-Malaysian, a refundable deposit of RM 100 will be collected which will be refunded free of interest 45 days after the expiry or termination of the Service account subject to any deduction which may be due from the subscriber to Yes.
9. Rebate: Provided that the subscriber's Service account is not suspended or terminated at the time of rebate, the Plan Advance Payment will be rebated to the subscriber's account in the first month bill and the Upfront Payment of RM200 will be rebated to the subscriber's account at RM10 per month commencing from the 5th month until the 24th month of the Contract Period.

The amount of charges and rebates stated in Clause 7, Clause 8 and Clause 9 respectively are exclusive of GST. Such GST, if relevant, shall be added to the charges and/or rebates and be paid accordingly.
10. Addition/Removal of Service Plan: Yes reserves the right to add other types of Service Plan to and/or remove any of the Service Plan as stated herein from the Promotion in accordance with Clause 6 below.
11. Provision of Free On-Net services: Yes may cease to provide the free On-Net voice call minutes and free On-Net SMS or modify or amend the provision thereof at anytime at Yes's sole and absolute discretion by notice in accordance with Clause 16. Subject to the foregoing, the free On-Net voice call minutes and free On-Net SMS will be provided on a monthly basis in accordance with the relevant Billing Cycle of the subscriber's Service account and will only be valid for the duration of the Billing Cycle in which they are provided. Any unutilised free call minutes/SMS will lapse at the expiry of the relevant Billing Cycle.
12. Not exchangeable for cash. For the avoidance of doubt, the Promotion items/services in the Promotion bundle are not exchangeable for cash or any other product and/or service including any other Postpaid Service Plan offered by Yes.
13. Early Termination Charges: If the subscriber terminates the Service subscribed under the Promotion before the expiry of the Contract Period or if the Service account is terminated by Yes due to the subscriber's default, the Early Termination Charges as provided in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions shall apply.
14. Device Warranty. Each device provided under the Promotion shall be subject to its respective manufacturer's warranty. The Yes Device shall be subject to the Yes Limited Warranty at www.yes.my/tnc. The Acer Tablet shall be subject to Acer's limited Warranty at http://www.acer.com/ac/en/MY/content/warranty
15. Exclusion of liability for use of Acer Tablet. Yes shall not be liable for any loss, damages or injury to the Acer Tablet or to the subscriber or to any person claiming through the subscriber arising from the use or inability of use to the Acer Tablet or from any cause whatsoever.
16. Amendments. We reserve the right to change, modify and/or amend the terms of the Promotion at any time, with notice to the affected parties. For the purposes of this provision, a modification, change and/or amendment to these terms will be deemed to be effective upon a notice being placed upon Yes official website. We may, in addition send corresponding notices digitally to the Yes ID accounts of all validly active registered subscribers affected by such change, modification and/or amendment.

2. Applicable Terms & Conditions: Subject only to the variations as expressly set out herein, all other terms and conditions contained in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions (available at www.yes.my/tnc) shall remain and be applicable to the respective Super Postpaid Plans subscribed under the Promotion. Notwithstanding any perceived similarities, the terms and the Promotion offer specified herein do not apply to any Yes devices purchased, or any Yes Service Plan subscribed, outside of the Promotion Period.
3. Interpretations & Definitions: All capitalised words and expressions herein shall, unless otherwise provided, bear the same meanings as defined in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions.
4. Definitions: The following capitalised words or phrases shall have the meanings as assigned:
"All Day Data" means data which is available for use at any time of the day.
"GST" means goods and services tax or similar value added tax imposed on the sale of goods or the provision of services under the Goods and Services Tax 2014.
"Off-Net" means the provisioning of services beyond Yes' network where access to a third party service provider's network will be required in order to provide the services.
"On-Net" means the provisioning of services within Yes' network and access to a third party service provider's network will not be required in order to provide the services.
"Plan Advance Payment" means the relevant Commitment Fee for the first month collected at the time of registration of the Service Plan.
"Upfront Payment" means the reimbursable sum of money collected for any device which is provided to the Subscriber under the Promotion bundle at the time of registration.
5. Promotion Period. The Promotion is being offered from 12 th June 2015 until further notice. ("Promotion Period").
6. The Promotion Bundle. One (1) unit of Xiaomi Mi 4i and one (1) unit of Huddle XS 4G Mobile Hotspot ("Yes Device") bundled with the subscription of any Super Postpaid Plan (78/98) for a Contract Period of 24 months. The Xiaomi Mi 4i is subject to stock availability and available in white colour only.
7. Service Offerings & Commitment Fee: The terms of offer for the respective Super Postpaid Plans subscribed under the Promotion are as follows:

• Super 78 is provided with Data Capacity Allocation of 8GB All Day Data, free 1,000 On-Net voice call minutes and 1,000 On-Net SMS at Commitment Fee of RM 78.

• Super 98 is provided with Data Capacity Allocation of 10GB All Day Data, free 2,000 On-Net voice call minutes and 2,000 On-Net SMS at Commitment Fee of RM 98.

The free On-Net voice call minutes and free On-Net SMS provided in Clause 7 above are only applicable to subscribers who subscribed for the Promotion before 28 August 2015 and shall not be applicable to subscribers who subscribe to the Promotion from 28th August 2015 onwards.
8. Payment Upon Registration: Payments required upon registration of the respective Super Postpaid Plans are:

8.1 In respect of Super 78, a non-refundable Device Price of RM199 and Upfront Payment of RM590 shall be paid by the subscriber upon registration. The Yes Device price of RM 480.00, Plan Advance Payment, and Activation Fee will be waived.

8.2 In respect of Super 98, an Upfront Payment of RM739 shall be paid by the subscriber upon registration. The Yes Device price of RM 480.00, Plan Advance Payment, and Activation Fee will be waived.

8.3 Additionally, if the subscriber is a non-Malaysian, a refundable deposit of RM 100 will be collected which will be refunded free of interest 45 days after the expiry or termination of the Service account subject to any deduction which may be due from the subscriber to Yes.
9. Rebate: Provided that the subscriber's Service account is not suspended or terminated at the time of rebate, the Upfront Payment paid by the subscriber under the Promotion will be rebated to the subscriber's account over the 24 months Contract Period in the respective amount as follows:

a) From 1st month to 23rd month:
i) Super 78 - RM 24 per month
ii) Super 98 - RM 30 per month

b) On the 24th month:
i) Super 78 - RM 38
i) Super 98 - RM 49

The amount of charges and rebates stated in Clause 8 and Clause 9 respectively are exclusive of GST. Such GST, if relevant, shall be added to the charges and/or rebates and be paid accordingly.
10. Addition/Removal of Service Plan: Yes reserves the right to add other types of Service Plan to and/or remove any of the Service Plans as stated herein from the Promotion in accordance with Clause 17 below.
11. Provision of Free On-Net services: In relation to the free voice calls and/or free SMS mentioned in Clause 7 herein, Yes may cease to provide the free On-Net voice call minutes and/or free On-Net SMS or modify or amend the provision thereof at any time at Yes's sole and absolute discretion by notice in accordance with Clause 17. Subject to the foregoing, the free On-Net voice call minutes and free On-Net SMS will be provided on a monthly basis in accordance with the relevant Billing Cycle of the subscriber's Service account and will only be valid for the duration of the Billing Cycle in which they are provided. Any unutilised free call minutes/SMS will lapse at the expiry of the relevant Billing Cycle.
12. Not exchangeable for cash. For the avoidance of doubt, the Promotion items/services in the Promotion bundle are not exchangeable for cash or any other product and/or service including any other Postpaid Service Plan offered by Yes.
13. Early Termination Charges: If the subscriber terminates the Service subscribed under the Promotion before the expiry of the Contract Period or if the Service account is terminated by Yes due to the subscriber's default, the Early Termination Charges as provided in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions shall apply.
14. Device Warranty. Each device provided under the Promotion shall be subject to its respective manufacturer's warranty. The Yes Device shall be subject to the Yes Limited Warranty at www.yes.my/tnc. The Xiaomi Mi 4i shall be subject to Xiaomi's limited Warranty at http://www.mi.com/my/service/.
15. Exclusion of liability for use of Xiaomi Mi 4i. Yes shall not be liable for any loss, damages or injury to the subscriber or to any person claiming through the subscriber arising from the use or inability to use of the Xiaomi Mi 4i or from any cause whatsoever.
16. Amendments. We reserve the right to change, modify and/or amend the terms of the Promotion at any time, with notice to the affected parties. For the purposes of this provision, a modification, change and/or amendment to these terms will be deemed to be effective upon a notice being placed upon Yes official website. We may, in addition send corresponding notices digitally to the Yes ID accounts of all validly active registered subscribers affected by such change, modification and/or amendment.

2. Applicable Terms & Conditions: Subject only to the variations as expressly set out herein, all other terms and conditions contained in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions (available at www.yes.my/tnc) shall remain and be applicable to the respective Super Postpaid Plans subscribed under the Promotion. Notwithstanding any perceived similarities, the terms and the Promotion offer specified herein do not apply to any Yes devices purchased, or any Yes Service Plan subscribed, outside of the Promotion Period. All prices stated are GST exclusive.
3. Interpretations & Definitions: All capitalised words and expressions herein shall, unless otherwise provided, bear the same meanings as defined in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions.
4. Definitions: The following capitalised words or phrases shall have the meanings as assigned:
"All Day Data" means data which is available for use at anytime of the day.
"Upfront Payment" means the reimbursable sum of money collected for any device provided to the Subscriber under the Promotion bundle at the time of registration.
"GST" means goods and services tax or similar value added tax imposed on the sale of goods or the provision of services under the Goods and Services Tax 2014.
"Off-Net" means the provisioning of services beyond Yes' network where access to a third party service provider's network will be required in order to provide the services.
"On-Net" means the provisioning of services within Yes' network and access to a third party service provider's network will not be required in order to provide the services.
"Plan Advance Payment" means the relevant Commitment Fee for the first month collected at the time of registration of the Service Plan.
5. Promotion Period. The Promotion is being offered from 23rd October 2014 until further notice ("Promotion Period").
6. The Promotion Bundle. One (1) unit of Samsung Note 4 Smartphone ("Note 4") and one (1) unit of Huddle XS 4G Mobile Hotspot ("Yes Device") bundled with the subscription of any Super Postpaid Plan (128/158) for a Contract Period of 24 months. The Note 4 is available in two (2) colours namely white and black, subject to stock availability.
7. Service Offerings & Commitment Fee: The terms of offer for the respective Super Postpaid Plans subscribed under the Promotion are as follows:
• Super 128 is provided with Data Capacity Allocation of 8GB All Day Data, free 2,000 On-Net voice call minutes and 2,000 On-Net SMS at Commitment Fee of RM 128.

• Super 158 is provided with Data Capacity Allocation of 10GB All Day, Data free 2,000 On-Net voice call minutes and 2,000 On-Net SMS at Commitment Fee of RM 158.

The free On-Net voice call minutes and free On-Net SMS provided in Clause 7 above are only applicable to subscribers who subscribed for the Promotion before 28 August 2015 and shall not be applicable to subscribers who subscribe to the Promotion from 28th August 2015 onwards.
8. Payment Upon Registration: Payments required upon registration of the respective Super Postpaid Plans are:

8.1 In respect of Super 128, a non-refundable sum of RM 1,399 Device Price, Plan Advance Payment and a Upfront Payment of RM696 shall be paid by the subscriber upon registration. The Yes Device price of RM 480.00 will be waived.

In respect of Super 158, a non-refundable sum of RM 799 Device Price, Plan Advance Payment and a Upfront Payment of RM1,200 shall be paid by the subscriber upon registration. The Yes Device price of RM 480.00 will be waived.

8.2 Additionally, if the subscriber is a non-Malaysian, a refundable deposit of RM 100 will be collected which will be refunded free of interest 45 days after the expiry or termination of the Service account subject to any deduction which may be due from the subscriber to Yes.
9. Rebate: Provided that the subscriber's Service account is not suspended or terminated at the time of rebate, the Plan Advance Payment will be rebated to the subscriber's account in the first month bill and where relevant, the Upfront Payment will be rebated to subscriber's account at equal amounts over the Contract Period.

The amount of charges and rebates stated in Clause 7, Clause 8 and Clause 9 respectively are exclusive of GST. Such GST, if relevant, shall be added to the charges and/or rebates and be paid accordingly.
10. Addition/Removal of Service Plan: Yes reserves the right to add other types of Service Plan to and/or remove any of the Service Plan as stated herein from the Promotion in accordance with Clause 6 below.
11. Provision of Free On-Net services: Yes may cease to provide the free On-Net voice call minutes and free On-Net SMS or modify or amend the provision thereof at anytime at Yes's sole and absolute discretion by notice in accordance with Clause 16. Subject to the foregoing, the free On-Net voice call minutes and free On-Net SMS will be provided on a monthly basis in accordance with the relevant Billing Cycle of the subscriber's Service account and will only be valid for the duration of the Billing Cycle in which they are provided. Any unutilised free call minutes/SMS will lapse at the expiry of the relevant Billing Cycle.
12. Not exchangeable for cash. For the avoidance of doubt, the Promotion items/services in the Promotion bundle are not exchangeable for cash or any other product and/or service including any other Postpaid Service Plan offered by Yes.
13. Early Termination Charges: If the subscriber terminates the Service subscribed under the Promotion before the expiry of the Contract Period or if the Service account is terminated by Yes due to the subscriber's default, the Early Termination Charges as provided in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions shall apply.
14. Device Warranty. Each device provided under the Promotion shall be subject to its respective manufacturer's warranty. The Yes Device shall be subject to the Yes Limited Warranty at www.yes.my/tnc. The Note 4 shall be subject to Samsung™s limited Warranty at http://www.samsung.com/my/support/warranty/.
15. Exclusion of liability for use of Note 4. Yes shall not be liable for any loss, damages or injury to the Note 4 or to the subscriber or to any person claiming through the subscriber arising from the use or inability of use to the Note 4 or from any cause whatsoever.
16. Amendments. We reserve the right to change, modify and/or amend the terms of the Promotion at any time, with notice to the affected parties. For the purposes of this provision, a modification, change and/or amendment to these terms will be deemed to be effective upon a notice being placed upon Yes official website. We may, in addition send corresponding notices digitally to the Yes ID accounts of all validly active registered subscribers affected by such change, modification and/or amendment.

"All Day Data" means data which is available for use at any time of the day.

We may, in addition send corresponding notices digitally to the Yes ID accounts of all validly active registered subscribers affected by such change, modification and/or amendment.

1. The Promotion. The Xiaomi Redmi Note 4G with Huddle XS Super Postpaid Plan Bundle Promotion ("the Promotion") is a time-limited offer launched by YTL Communications Sdn Bhd ("Yes") for its Super Postpaid Plans.
2. Applicable Terms & Conditions: Subject only to the variations as expressly set out herein, all other terms and conditions contained in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions (available at www.yes.my/tnc) shall remain and be applicable to the respective Super Postpaid Plans subscribed under the Promotion. Notwithstanding any perceived similarities, the terms and the Promotion offer specified herein do not apply to any Yes devices purchased, or any Yes Service Plan subscribed, outside of the Promotion Period.
3. Interpretations & Definitions: All capitalised words and expressions herein shall, unless otherwise provided, bear the same meanings as defined in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions.
4. Definitions: The following capitalised words or phrases shall have the meanings as assigned:
"All Day Data" means data which is available for use at anytime of the day.
"Upfront Payment" means the reimbursable sum of money collected for any device provided to the Subscriber under the Promotion bundle at the time of registration.
"GST" means goods and services tax or similar value added tax imposed on the sale of goods or the provision of services under the Goods and Services Tax 2014.
"Off-Net" means the provisioning of services beyond Yes' network where access to a third party service provider's network will be required in order to provide the services.
"On-Net" means the provisioning of services within Yes' network and access to a third party service provider's network will not be required in order to provide the services.
"Plan Advance Payment" means the relevant Commitment Fee for the first month collected at the time of registration of the Service Plan.
5. Promotion Period. The Promotion is being offered from 8 December 2014 until further notice ("Promotion Period").
6. The Promotion Bundle. One (1) unit of Xiaomi Redmi Note 4G Smartphone ("Redmi Note 4G") and one (1) unit of Huddle XS 4G Mobile Hotspot ("Yes Device") bundled with the subscription of any Super Postpaid Plan (78/98/128/158) for a Contract Period of 24 months. The Redmi Note 4G is available in one (1) colour namely white, subject to stock availability.
7. Service Offerings & Commitment Fee: The terms of offer for the respective Super Postpaid Plans subscribed under the Promotion are as follows:
• Super 78 is provided with Data Capacity Allocation of 4.5GB All Day Data, free 1,000 On-Net voice call minutes and 1,000 On-Net SMS at Commitment Fee of RM 78.
• Super 98 is provided with Data Capacity Allocation of 6GB All Day Data, free 2,000 On-Net voice call minutes and 2,000 On-Net SMS at Commitment Fee of RM 98.
• Super 128 is provided with Data Capacity Allocation of 8GB All Day Data, free 2,000 On-Net voice call minutes and 2,000 On-Net SMS at Commitment Fee of RM 128.
• Super 158 is provided with Data Capacity Allocation of 10GB All Day, Data free 2,000 On-Net voice call minutes and 2,000 On-Net SMS at Commitment Fee of RM 158.

The free On-Net voice call minutes and free On-Net SMS provided in Clause 7 above are only applicable to subscribers who subscribed for the Promotion before 28 August 2015 and shall not be applicable to subscribers who subscribe to the Promotion from 28th August 2015 onwards.
8. Payment Upon Registration: Payments required upon registration of the respective Super Postpaid Plans are:
8.1 In respect of Super 78, a non-refundable sum of RM 199 Device Price and a Upfront Payment of RM390 shall be paid by the subscriber upon registration. The Yes Device price of RM 480.00, Plan Advance Payment, and Activation Fee will be waived.

In respect of Super 98/128/158, a Upfront Payment of RM589 shall be paid by the subscriber upon registration. The Yes Device price of RM 480.00, Plan Advance Payment, and Activation Fee will be waived.

8.2 Additionally, if the subscriber is a non-Malaysian, a refundable deposit of RM 100 will be collected which will be refunded free of interest 45 days after the expiry or termination of the Service account subject to any deduction which may be due from the subscriber to Yes.
9. Rebate: Provided that the subscriber's Service account is not suspended or terminated at the time of rebate, and where relevant, the Upfront Payment paid by the subscriber under the Promotion will be rebated to the subscriber's account over the 24 months Contract Period in the respective amount as follows:

a) From 1st month to 23rd month:
i) Super 78 - RM 16 per month
ii) Super 98/128/158 - RM 24 per month

b) On the 24th month:
i) Super 78 - RM 22
ii) Super 98/128/158 - RM 37

The amount of charges and rebates stated in Clause 7, Clause 8 and Clause 9 respectively are exclusive of GST. Such GST, if relevant, shall be added to the charges and/or rebates and be paid accordingly.
10. Addition/Removal of Service Plan: Yes reserves the right to add other types of Service Plan to and/or remove any of the Service Plan as stated herein from the Promotion in accordance with Clause 6 below.
11. Provision of Free On-Net services: In relation to the free voice calls and/or free SMS mentioned in Clause 7 herein, Yes may cease to provide the free On-Net voice call minutes and free On-Net SMS or modify or amend the provision thereof at anytime at Yes's sole and absolute discretion by notice in accordance with Clause 16. Subject to the foregoing, the free On-Net voice call minutes and free On-Net SMS will be provided on a monthly basis in accordance with the relevant Billing Cycle of the subscriber's Service account and will only be valid for the duration of the Billing Cycle in which they are provided. Any unutilised free call minutes/SMS will lapse at the expiry of the relevant Billing Cycle.
12. Not exchangeable for cash. For the avoidance of doubt, the Promotion items/services in the Promotion bundle are not exchangeable for cash or any other product and/or service including any other Postpaid Service Plan offered by Yes.
13. Early Termination Charges: If the subscriber terminates the Service subscribed under the Promotion before the expiry of the Contract Period or if the Service account is terminated by Yes due to the subscriber's default, the Early Termination Charges as provided in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions shall apply.
14. Device Warranty. Each device provided under the Promotion shall be subject to its respective manufacturer's warranty. The Yes Device shall be subject to the Yes Limited Warranty at www.yes.my/tnc. The Redmi Note 4G shall be subject to Xiaomi's limited Warranty at http://www.mi.com/my/service/.
15. Exclusion of liability for use of Redmi Note 4G. Yes shall not be liable for any loss, damages or injury to the Redmi Note 4G or to the subscriber or to any person claiming through the subscriber arising from the use or inability of use to the Redmi Note 4G or from any cause whatsoever.
16. Amendments. We reserve the right to change, modify and/or amend the terms of the Promotion at any time, with notice to the affected parties. For the purposes of this provision, a modification, change and/or amendment to these terms will be deemed to be effective upon a notice being placed upon Yes official website. We may, in addition send corresponding notices digitally to the Yes ID accounts of all validly active registered subscribers affected by such change, modification and/or amendment.

In the event of any inconsistency between the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions and Postpaid Service Plans Terms & Conditions and the Terms and Conditions herein, the Terms and Conditions herein shall prevail, to the extent of any inconsistency. Notwithstanding any perceived similarities, the terms and the Promotion offer specified herein do not apply to any Devices purchased, or any Postpaid Service Plan subscribed, outside of the Promotion Period.
3. Interpretations & Definitions: All capitalised words and expressions herein shall, unless otherwise provided, bear the same meanings as defined in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions and the Postpaid Service Plans Terms & Conditions.
4. Definitions: The following capitalised words or phrases shall have the meanings as assigned:
"Upfront Payment" means the reimbursable sum of money collected for any Device provided to the Subscriber under the Promotion bundle at the time of registration.

The bundled plan of Yes 4G LTE Postpaid 68 will be contracted with a 24 months contract period. The Xiaomi Redmi 3S is available in grey colour only and is subject to stock availability.

• The Device of Xiaomi Redmi 3S bundled with Yes 4G LTE Postpaid 68 will be provided with Data Capacity Allocation of 12GB 4G LTE Data and 4GB 4G Broadband Data, free unlimited On-Net services of voice call minutes and SMS at Commitment Fee of RM68.
8. Payment Upon Registration: Payments required upon registration of the respective bundled Postpaid Service Plans are:
 
8.1 In respect of the bundled plan for Yes 4G LTE Postpaid 68, a non-refundable Device Price of RM282.07 and Upfront Payment of RM283.02 shall be paid by the Yes Subscriber upon registration. The Plan Advance Payment and Activation Fee will be waived.
8.2 Additionally, if the Yes Subscriber is a non-Malaysian, a refundable deposit of RM100 will be collected which will be refunded free of interest 45 days after the expiry or termination of the Service account subject to any deduction which may be due from the Yes Subscriber to Yes.
9. Rebate: Provided that the Yes Subscriber's Service account is not suspended or terminated at the time of rebate and where relevant, the Upfront Payment paid by the Yes Subscriber under the Promotion will be rebated to the Yes Subscriber's account over the 24 months Contract Period in the amount as follows:
a) From 1st Month to 24th Month;
i) In relation to the bundled plan for Yes 4G LTE Postpaid 68 - RM11.79 per month
10. The amount of charges and rebates stated in Clause 7, Clause 8 and Clause 9 respectively are exclusive of GST. Such GST, if relevant, shall be added to the charges and/or rebates and be paid accordingly.
11. Addition/Removal of Service Plan: Yes reserves the right to add other types of Postpaid Service Plan to and/or remove any of the Postpaid Service Plans as stated herein from the Promotion in accordance with Clause 16 below.
12. Not exchangeable for cash. For the avoidance of doubt, the Promotion items/services in the Promotion bundle are not exchangeable for cash or any other product and/or service including any other Postpaid Service Plan offered by Yes.
13. Early Termination Charges: If the Yes Subscriber terminates the Service subscribed under the Promotion before the expiry of the relevant Contract Period or if the Service account is terminated by Yes due to the Yes Subscriber's default, the Early Termination Charges as provided in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions shall apply.
14. Device Warranty. Each Device provided under the Promotion shall be subject to its respective manufacturer's warranty. The Yes Device shall be subject to the Yes Limited Warranty at www.yes.my/tnc.
15. Exclusion of liability for use of Xiaomi Redmi 3S. Yes shall not be liable for any loss, damages or injury for the Xiaomi Redmi 3S or to the Yes Subscriber or to any person claiming through the Yes Subscriber arising from the use or inability to the Xiaomi Redmi 3S or from any cause whatsoever.
16. Right to change. Yes reserves the right to change, modify and/or amend these terms at any time. A modification, change and/or amendment to these terms will be deemed to be effective upon a notice being placed upon Yes official website or sent digitally to all affected Yes Subscribers.

3. Interpretations & Definitions: All capitalised words and expressions herein shall, unless otherwise provided, bear the same meanings as defined in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions.
4. Definitions: The following capitalised words or phrases shall have the meanings as assigned:
"All Day Data" means data which is available for use at any time of the day.
"GST" means goods and services tax or similar value added tax imposed on the sale of goods or the provision of services under the Goods and Services Tax 2014.

"Off-Net" means the provisioning of services beyond Yes' network where access to a third party service provider's network will be required in order to provide the services.
"On-Net" means the provisioning of services within Yes' network and access to a third party service provider's network will not be required in order to provide the services.
"Plan Advance Payment" means the relevant Commitment Fee for the first month collected at the time of registration of the Service Plan.

The Samsung Galaxy S7 edge is subject to stock availability and available in Black, Silver and Gold colour only.

b) On the 24th month:
    ii)Super 168 - RM 163

Any unutilised free call minutes/SMS will lapse at the expiry of the relevant Billing Cycle.
