1. The Promosi Hari Raya Aidilfitri 2016 Postpaid Promotion ("The Promotion") is a time-limited offer launched by YTL Communications Sdn Bhd ("Yes") for its Super Postpaid Plans.
2. Subject only to the variations as expressly set out herein, all other terms and conditions contained in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions (available at www.yes.my/tnc) shall remain and be applicable to the respective Super Postpaid Plans subscribed under the Promotion. Notwithstanding any perceived similarities, the terms and the Promotion offer specified herein do not apply to any Yes Devices purchased, or any Yes Service Plan subscribed, outside of the Promotion Period.
3. All capitalised words and expressions herein shall, unless otherwise provided, bear the same meanings as defined in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions.
Definitions. The following capitalised words or phrases shall have the meanings as assigned:
"All Day Data" means data which is available for use at any time of the day.
"GST" means goods and services tax or similar value added tax imposed on the sale of goods or the provision of services under the Goods and Services Tax 2014.
4. Promotion Period.
The Promotion is being offered from 29th April 2016 until 29th June 2016. ("Promotion Period").
5. The Promotion.
 
5.1 Under the Promotion, the following monthly data and Commitment Fees shall be applicable to the respective Super Postpaid Plans subscribed during the Promotion Period under the special terms in Clause 5.2 below.
• Super 48 is provided with Data Capacity Allocation of 2GB All Day Data at Commitment Fee of RM48.
• Super 68 is provided with Data Capacity Allocation of 10GB All Day Data at Commitment Fee of RM68.
• Super 78 is provided with Data Capacity Allocation of 4.5GB All Day Data at Commitment Fee of RM78.
• Super 88 is provided with Data Capacity Allocation of 6GB All Day Data at Commitment Fee of RM88.
• Super 98 is provided with Data Capacity Allocation of 6GB All Day Data at Commitment Fee of RM98.
• Super 128 is provided with Data Capacity Allocation of 8GB All Day Data at Commitment Fee of RM128.
• Super 158 is provided with Data Capacity Allocation of 10GB All Day Data at Commitment Fee of RM158.
5.2 The Super Postpaid Plans in item 5.1 above are offered bundled with Yes Device or without bundling with Yes Devices on special terms as are as set out below:
 
5.2.1 Yes Device of Go 4G Dongle bundled with Super 48/Super 68 ("Go 4G Dongle Bundle") is offered on the following terms:
 
a. A RM50 Activation Fee and the relevant Commitment Fee (known as "Plan Advance Payment") will be collected upon registration. The Activation Fee will be rebated to the subscriber's account over a period of 12 months. The Plan Advance Payment will be rebated to the subscriber's account in the first month bill. The Go 4G Dongle device price of RM99 is waived and Upfront Payment will not be applicable.
b. The specific bundled Service Plans below will be provided with additional data as follows:
• Yes Device of Go 4G Dongle bundled with Super 48 will be provided with 4GB Data Capacity Allocation instead of 2GB.
• Yes Device of Go 4G Dongle bundled with Super 68 will be provided with 6GB Data Capacity Allocation instead of 4GB.
c. If the subscriber is a non-Malaysian, a refundable deposit of RM100 will be collected which will be refunded free of interest 45 days after the expiry or termination of the Service subject to any deduction which may be due from the subscriber to Yes.
d. The respective Service Plan for Go 4G Dongle Bundle shall be subject to a Contract Period of 12 months.
e. If the Subscriber terminates the Go 4G Dongle Bundle Service account before the expiry of the relevant Contract Period, Subscriber shall be required to return the Go 4G Dongle upon Yes' demand. If the subscriber is not willing or unable to return the Go 4G Dongle as aforementioned, the subscriber shall be liable to pay RM100 to Yes in lieu thereof.
5.2.2 Yes Device of Huddle XS 4G Mobile Hotspot bundled with Super 48/Super 68/Super 78/Super 88/Super 98/Super 128/Super 158 is offered on the following terms:
 
a. A non-refundable RM100 Activation Fee and the relevant Commitment Fee (known as "Plan Advance Payment") will be collected upon registration. The Plan Advance Payment will be rebated to the subscriber's account in the first month bill. Except for Yes Device of Huddle XS 4G Mobile Hotspot bundled with Super 68 and Super 88 which will be subjected to a non-refundable RM50 Activation Fee. Both the Super 68 and Super 88 will be subjected to the relevant Plan Advance Payment which will be collected upon registration and will be rebated back to the subscriber's account in the first month bill.
b. The relevant Yes Device will be provided with the subscribed Service Plan. The Yes Device price of Huddle XS 4G Mobile Hotspot (RM480) is waived and Upfront Payment will not be applicable.
c. The specific bundled Service Plans below will be provided with additional data as follows:
 
• Yes Device of Huddle XS 4G Mobile Hotspot bundled with Super 48 (including together with third party device offered by Yes) will be provided with 4GB Data Capacity Allocation instead of 2GB.
• Yes Device of Huddle XS 4G Mobile Hotspot bundled with Super 68 (including together with third party device offered by Yes) will be provided with 10GB Data Capacity Allocation instead of 4GB.
• Yes Device of Huddle XS 4G Mobile Hotspot bundled with Super 78 (including together with third party device offered by Yes) will be provided with 9.5GB Data Capacity Allocation instead of 4.5GB.
• Yes Device of Huddle XS 4G Mobile Hotspot bundled with Super 88 (including together with third party device offered by Yes) will be provided with 16GB Data Capacity Allocation instead of 6GB.
• Yes Device of Huddle XS 4G Mobile Hotspot bundled with Super 98 (including together with third party device offered by Yes) will be provided with 12GB Data Capacity Allocation instead of 6GB.
• Yes Device of Huddle XS 4G Mobile Hotspot bundled with Super 128 (including together with third party device offered by Yes) will be provided with 15GB Data Capacity Allocation instead of 8GB.
• Yes Device of Huddle XS 4G Mobile Hotspot bundled with Super 158 (including together with third party device offered by Yes) will be provided with 20GB Data Capacity Allocation instead of 10GB.
d. If the subscriber is a non-Malaysian, a refundable deposit of RM100 will be collected which will be refunded free of interest 45 days after the expiry or termination of the Service subject to any deduction which may be due from the subscriber to Yes.
e. The Service Plans for Yes Device of Huddle XS 4G Mobile Hotspot bundle shall be subject to a Contract Period of 24 months, Except for Yes Device of Huddle XS 4G Mobile Hotspot bundled with Super 68 or Super 88 which will be subjected to a Contract Period of 12 months.
5.2.3 Yes Device of Zoom 4G Gateway bundled with Super 68/Super 78/ Super 98/Super 128/Super 158 is offered on the following terms:
 
a. A non-refundable RM100 Activation Fee and the relevant Commitment Fee (known as "Plan Advance Payment") will be collected upon registration. The Plan Advance Payment will be rebated to the subscriber's account in the first month bill.
b. The relevant Yes Device will be provided with the subscribed Service Plan. The Yes Device price of Zoom 4G Gateway (RM499) is waived and Upfront Payment will not be applicable.
c. The specific bundled Service Plans below will be provided with additional data as follows:
 
• Yes Device of Zoom 4G Gateway bundled with Super 78 will be provided with 5.7GB Data Capacity Allocation instead of 4.5GB.
• Yes Device of Zoom 4G Gateway bundled with Super 98 will be provided with 10GB Data Capacity Allocation instead of 6GB.
• Yes Device of Zoom 4G Gateway bundled with Super 128 will be provided with 15GB Data Capacity Allocation instead of 8GB.
• Yes Device of Zoom 4G Gateway bundled with Super 158 will be provided with 20GB Data Capacity Allocation instead of 10GB.
d. If the subscriber is a non-Malaysian, a refundable deposit of RM100 will be collected which will be refunded free of interest 45 days after the expiry or termination of the Service subject to any deduction which may be due from the subscriber to Yes.
e. The Service Plans for Yes Device of Zoom 4G Gateway bundle shall be subject to a Contract Period of 24 months.
f. Plan upgrade.
i. The above terms of offer under Clause 5.2.3.c shall not be applicable to existing subscribers who upgrade to these promotional Super 98/Super 128/Super158. A subscriber who registers for Super 98 or Super 128 under Clause 5.2.3.c and subsequently upgrades his/her existing Super Postpaid Plan to Super 128 or Super 158 during the Promotion Period will not be entitled to the respective Data Capacity Allocation as provided under Clause 5.2.3.c for the Super 128 or Super 158.
ii. However, subscribers who subscribe to the Super Postpaid Plans under Clause 5.2.3.c and subsequently upgrade to a higher Super Postpaid Plan will be eligible for the data as follows:
 
• Initially registered for Super 98 and subsequently upgrade to any of the higher Super Postpaid Plans during the Promotion Period, the Data Capacity Allocation provided is:
Super 128 - 12GB All Day Data
Super 158 - 15GB All Day Data
• Initially registered for Super 128 and subsequently upgrade to Super 158 during the Promotion Period, the Data Capacity Allocation provided is 18GB All Day Data.
• Initially registered for Super 98 under Clause 5.2.3.c and subsequently upgrade to another Super Postpaid Plan (higher Plan) after the Promotion Period will be eligible to an additional 2GB All Day data on top of the Data Capacity Allocation under the relevant upgraded Super Postpaid Plan currently offered at the time when the upgrading was activated by the Customer.
• Initially registered for Super 128 under Clause 5.2.3.c and subsequently upgrade to another Super Postpaid Plan (higher Plan) after the Promotion Period will be eligible to an additional 5GB All Day data on top of the Data Capacity Allocation under the relevant upgraded Super Postpaid Plan currently offered at the time when the upgrading was activated by the Customer.
iii. The data for abovementioned upgraded Service Plans will only be applicable for the Billing Cycles from the date of upgrade until expiry of the 24 months Contract Period in respect of the initial Super Postpaid Plan registered by the subscriber under Clause 5.2.3.c.
iv. Yes may cease to provide the additional data for the upgrading or modify or amend the provision of the Service offerings under Clause 5.2.3.c at any time at Yes's sole and absolute discretion by notice in accordance with Clause 7.
5.2.4 Naked Super 48/Super 68/Super 98/Super 128/Super 158 (without bundling of Yes Device) is offered on the following terms:
a. The relevant Commitment Fee (known as "Plan Advance Payment") will be collected upon registration. The Plan Advance Payment will be rebated to subscriber's account over a period of two (2) months at 50% of the relevant Commitment Fee per month. The Activation Fee of RM100 is waived.
b. If the subscriber is a non-Malaysian, a refundable deposit of RM100 will be collected which will be refunded free of interest 45 days after the expiry or termination of the Service subject to deduction of any amount which may be due from the subscriber.
c. Contract Period will not be applicable to Naked Super 48/Super 68/Super 98/Super 128/Super 158.
5.3 For Service Plans which are bundled with Yes Device, the Yes Device will be provided at discounted price or at no charge as shown in Clause 5.2. YTLC reserves the right to add other types of Service Plan to and/or remove any of the Service Plan as stated in Clause 5.1 and 5.2 from the Promotion in accordance with Clause 7 below.
5.4 The relevant discounted Yes Device price, Activation Fee and Plan Advance Payment shall be paid upon the registration of the Service Plan. Any rebate of the Plan Advance Payment and /or Activation Fee as stipulated in Clause 5.2 will only be rebated to the subscriber's account provided that the subscriber's Service account is not suspended or terminated at the time of rebate.
5.5 Each of the Service Plans shall be provided with the Data Capacity Allocation as set out and detailed in the Terms and conditions herein on a monthly basis in accordance with the relevant Billing Cycle of the subscriber. Any balance of unutilised data, provided for the Billing Cycle period cannot be carried forward to the next Billing Cycle period. Such balance unutilised data will be forfeited without refund or liability to Yes at the expiry of the Billing Cycle period in which the data was allocated. If the Data Capacity Allocation for a given Billing Cycle period is completely used up before the next Billing Cycle period allocation of data quota, the subscriber will still be able to access the Internet but at a reduced bandwidth speed. The actual speed of the data service will vary depending on the access equipment/device used, Yes' network coverage limitation and the number of simultaneous users at the time of access.
5.6 All prices stated for products and services herein are exclusive of GST. Such GST shall be added to the charges accordingly.
6. Each Yes Device provided under the Promotion shall be subject to the Yes Limited Warranty as set out at http://www.yes.my/tnc.
7. Amendments. We reserve the right to change, modify and/or amend the terms of the Promotion at any time, with notice to the affected parties. For the purposes of this provision, a modification, change and/or amendment to these terms will be deemed to be effective upon a notice being placed upon Yes official website. We may, in addition send corresponding notices digitally to the Yes ID accounts of all validly active registered subscribers affected by such change, modification and/or amendment.

Last updated: 29th June 2016

1. The Promosi Hari Raya Aidilfitri 2016 Prepaid Promotion ("The Promotion") is a time-limited offer launched by YTL Communications Sdn Bhd ("Yes") for its Prepaid Service Plans.
2. Subject only to the variations as expressly set out herein, all other terms and conditions contained in the Prepaid Service Terms and Conditions and Starter Pack Terms and Conditions (available at www.yes.my/tnc) shall remain and be applicable to the respective Prepaid Service Plans subscribed under the Promotion. Notwithstanding any perceived similarities, the terms and the Promotion offer specified herein do not apply to any Yes Devices purchased, or any Yes Service Plan subscribed, outside of the Promotion Period.
3. All capitalised words and expressions herein shall, unless otherwise provided, bear the same meanings as defined in the Prepaid Service Terms and Conditions.
Definitions. The following capitalised words or phrases shall have the meanings as assigned:
"All Day Data" means data which is available for use at anytime of the day.
"GST" means goods and services tax or similar value added tax imposed on the sale of goods or the provision of services under the Goods and Services Tax 2014.
"Off-Peak Data" means data which is available for use only for the specific period of time from 2AM to 8AM daily.
"Off-Net" means the provisioning of services beyond Yes' network where access to a third party service provider's network will be required in order to provide the services.
"On-Net" means the provisioning of services within Yes' network and access to a third party service provider's network will not be required in order to provide the services.
"Peak Data" means data which is available for use only for the specific period of time from 8AM to 2AM daily.
4. Promotion Period.
The Promotion is being offered 29th of April 2016 until 29th June 2016. ("Promotion Period").
5. The Promotion.
 
5.1 Under the Promotion, Yes is offering the following Prepaid Starter Packs under these special terms below: All pre-loaded data provided in the Starter Packs shall be valid for 30 days from the date of purchase. Any unused balance of the pre-loaded data after the validity period shall be forfeited.

In addition, unlimited free On-Net services of voice call minutes and SMS will be provided for above Starter Packs as long as remain active.

All prices stated for products and services herein are exclusive of GST. Such GST shall be added to the charges accordingly.
 
• Go 25 Starter Pack comprising one (1) Yes Device of Go 4G Dongle, pre-loaded 3GB All Day Data instead of 1GB, one (1) pre-defined Yes ID and 018 mobile number at retail price of RM99.
• Huddle XS 68 Starter Pack comprising one (1) Yes Device of Huddle XS 4G Mobile Hotspot, pre-loaded 3.5GB All Day Data, one (1) personalised Yes ID and 018 mobile number at retail price of RM399.
• Zoom 68 Starter Pack comprising one (1) Yes Device of Zoom 4G Gateway, pre-loaded 3.5GB All Day Data, one (1) personalised Yes ID and 018 mobile number at discounted retail price of RM399 instead of RM597.
5.2 In addition, Subscribers who purchased Huddle XS 68/Zoom 68 Starter Pack during the Promotion Period shall be eligible to additional free data in their Valuepacks when they purchase any Valuepack during the 12 months period from the activation date of subscriber's Starter Pack purchased under the Promotion. The applicable additional free data ("Additional Free Data") to be provided with the relevant Valuepacks are set out below.
 
i. Additional Free Data of 300MB All Day Data will be applicable to Valuepack 25 (1 Malaysia) with pre-loaded 1GB All Day Data; and
ii. Additional Free Data of 1GB All Day Data will be applicable to the following Valuepacks:
 
• Valuepack 68 with pre-loaded 3.5GB All Day Data
• Valuepack 78 with pre-loaded 3.5GB Peak Data and 3.5GB Off-Peak Data
• Valuepack 98 with pre-loaded 5.5GB Peak Data and 5.5GB Off-Peak Data
• Valuepack 150 with pre-loaded 10GB All Day Data
• Valuepack 180 with pre-loaded 10GB Peak Data and 10GB Off-Peak Data
Each Valuepack purchased by the subscriber during the said 12 months period will be provided with the relevant Additional Free Data.
6. Each Yes Device provided under the Promotion shall be subject to the Yes Limited Warranty as set out at http://www.yes.my/tnc.
7. Amendments. We reserve the right to change, modify and/or amend the terms of the Promotion at any time, with notice to the affected parties. For the purposes of this provision, a modification, change and/or amendment to these terms will be deemed to be effective upon a notice being placed upon Yes official website. We may, in addition send corresponding notices digitally to the Yes ID accounts of all validly active registered subscribers affected by such change, modification and/or amendment.

Last updated: 21 April 2016

1. The Contest.
The Autobill & Win Redmi Note 3 Contest ("Contest") is organised by YTL Communications Sdn Bhd ("YTLC").
2. Terms and Conditions.
By participating in this Contest, the Eligible Participants expressly confirm having read and fully understood all the terms and conditions herein and agree to be bound by these terms and conditions at all times.
3. Definitions.
All capitalised words and expressions herein shall, unless otherwise provided, bear the same meanings as defined in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions.
4. Eligibility.
4.1 EXCEPT for employees of YTLC (including its affiliated and related companies), sponsors, advertising/promotional agencies, and other related agencies, dealers, retailers, suppliers and their immediate family members, the Contest is open to all new and existing subscribers of any of the Yes Postpaid Service Plans (collectively, the "Eligible Participants" and each, an "Eligible Participant").

4.2 To enter this Contest, Eligible Participants must subscribe to Auto Billing during the Contest Period. Auto Billing subscription may be made via Yes selfcare portal at https://www.yes.my/myselfcare/doLogin.do.
5. Contest Period.
The Contest shall commence from 21st April 2016, 12:00:00 a.m. and ends on 20th June 2016, 11:59:59 p.m. both dates inclusive ("Contest Period"). The Contest Period will be divided into two (2) periods, namely 1st Contest Period and 2nd Contest Period as shown in the table below for the purposes of selecting one winner in the respective period.
 
CONTEST PERIOD
Period 1 Period 2
21st April 2016, 12:00:00 a.m.
to
20th May 2016, 11:59:59 p.m. 		21st May 2016, 12:00:00 a.m.
to
20th June 2016, 11:59:59 p.m.
6. Contest Mechanics and Particulars.

6.1 Winning Selection Process

Under this Contest, one (1) Redmi Note 3 will be given away to the 88th Auto Billing subscriber in Period 1 and Period 2 respectively. In the event there are less than 88 Auto Billing subscribers in Period 1 and/or Period 2, the last subscriber in Period 1 and/or Period 2 will be selected to be the winner for the relevant period. An Eligible Participant shall only be eligible to be winner once throughout the Contest Period. If an Eligible Participant has been selected to be winner in Period 1, he/she will be disqualified from selection under Period 2.

6.2 Announcement and Notification of Winners & Conditions for Receiving the Prize

a) Only two winners will be selected under this Contest in accordance with Clause 6.1 above. The winner of the Contest in Period 1 will be announced within 7days from 20th May 2016 and the winner of the Contest in Period 2 will be announced within 7 days from 20th June 2016. The announcements will be published at www.yes.my. Additionally, YTLC will call the winner's phone number within seven (7) working days from the date of announcement to make the necessary arrangement for the collection of the prize. If the winner is not contactable by phone after three (3) attempts have been made, the winner will be disqualified from receiving the prize.

b) In order for the selected winner to remain qualified for the prize, the selected winner must, at the time of the delivery of the prize, fulfill the following conditions:-
i. The winner's Yes Postpaid Service Plan account must remain active;
ii. The winner's Auto Billing subscription must remain active; and
iii.The Auto Billing subscribed by the winner must have already processed at least one (1) successful Auto Billing transaction to his/her Yes Postpaid Service Plan.

c) If the selected winner is disqualified under sub-clause 6.2 a) or b) above, the prize shall be withdrawn.

d) YTLC reserves the right to select an alternative winner at any time, where YTLC has reasonable ground for believing that the initially selected winner has contravened any of the terms of the Contest or tempered with the mechanics of the Contest.

6.3 Prize

The prizes offered under the Contest are (2) units of Redmi Note 3 and shall be given subject to the following conditions:

i) YTLC reserves the right at its sole and absolute discretion to replace the Redmi Note 3 with a smartphone of any other brand.

ii) The Redmi Note 3 smartphone or any replacement smartphone provided will include the basic accessories of battery, charger and USB cable. Save and except for the basic accessories aforementioned, any additional accessory or items shown in any communication, marketing or advertising materials are not included.

iii) The winners may not request for a change of brand, or change in product color or product specification or value with regards to the prizes. YTLC reserves the right to select the brand, color and/or specification of the prizes, where applicable.

iv) The prize provided under the Contest is subject to the relevant manufacturer's warranty and the winner agrees to refer any problems or issues with the prize directly to the manufacturer of the prize.

6.4 Delivery of Prizes

Subject to sub-clause 6.2 b) above, the prize will be delivered to the delivery address provided by the winner within forty (40) days from the date of announcement of the winner. Save and except for any modifications or changes to the terms of delivery herein, the Terms of Delivery as stated at http://www.yes.my/tnc shall apply. For this purpose, the personal details of the winner, in particular the delivery address and contact number provided by the winner must be current, accurate and reachable to enable the successful delivery of the prize otherwise the prize will be forfeited. YTLC reserves the right to deal with such undelivered prize as it deems fit.
7. Exclusions.
All prizes are given and accepted on an 'as is' basis and entirely at the risk of the relevant winners. YTLC makes no warranty, whether express or implied, as to the condition or state of the prizes. Prizes cannot be transferred or redeemed for cash, cash value or any other prize. Acceptance of the prize shall constitute a release and discharge of YTLC by the winner from any and all liability, claims, demands, causes of action, and/or damages, whether known or unknown, which the winner may have, of any nature whatsoever, arising out of or relating to: (i) the Contest, (ii) personal injury and/or property damage, theft or loss suffered by the winner as a result of the use and/or enjoyment of the prize, and/or (iii) any tax liabilities in relation to the Contest, prize and/or use or enjoyment of the same. YTLC shall not be held liable for (i) any delay in performing or partial/total failure to perform any of its obligations to the winners under the Contest if such delay or failure is caused by circumstances beyond the reasonable control of YTLC, its affiliates, authorised dealers/distributors, agents, suppliers of the prize(s), including without limitation delays, changes, disruptions, cancellations, diversions or substitutions howsoever caused including without limitation as a result of war, terrorist action or threatened terrorist action, strikes, hostilities, civil commotions, accidents, fire, flood or natural catastrophes or (ii) from any loss, damage to property, injury, or death resulting from or related to participant's entrance to or inability to participate in the Contest, or the use, misuse or inability to use the prize or any portion thereof.
8. Disclosure Rights and Unconditional Agreement.
By entering this Contest, all participants hereby grant to YTLC express permission as well as a non-exclusive, royalty-free, worldwide license to publish, print, reproduce, disseminate or share their respective entry, likeness and identity (excluding any sensitive personal information as defined by the Personal Data Protection Act 2010) for editorial, advertising, promotional, marketing or other purposes, without further compensation, for an unlimited period of time, in any of YTLC's publications, in any form or any media, whether for public consumption or otherwise, unless prohibited by law. Please refer to YTL Group Privacy Policy at https://www.yes.my/tnc/general-tnc#pp. Acceptance of the prize constitutes the winner's unconditional agreement and permission to YTLC and its agencies to use the winner's name, video footage, voices, photograph and/or likeness for purposes of advertising, editorial, promotional, marketing, trade and/or other purposes without further compensation and notice, unless prohibited by law. YTLC fully reserves its rights to such forms of publicity and publication.
9. Laws.
The Contest shall in all respects be governed by the laws of Malaysia and by entering the Contest, participants submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Malaysia.
10. Modifications.
YTLC reserves the right to at any time, add to, delete, vary or amend the terms and conditions herein or change or modify any aspect of this Contest, in whole or in part at any time and from time to time and at its sole discretion without notice and without liability to the Contest participants or any other party. Without prejudice to the aforesaid, YTLC reserves the right to cancel, terminate or suspend the Contest at any time before or during the Contest Period with due notice but without any liability or compensation whatsoever. In the event of such cancellation, termination or suspension of this Contest, YTLC may at its sole and absolute discretion choose not to award the prizes in respect of the Contest or choose not to select any winner from all the qualified entries received prior to such cancellation, termination or suspension of the Contest.
11. Disruption of Contest.
Without prejudice to Clause 10 above, if for any reason the Contest is not capable of running as planned or is disrupted for reasons due to and including without limitation network failure, infection by computer virus, bugs, tampering, unauthorised intervention, fraud, technical failures or any other causes beyond the control of YTLC or any party responsible for the running of any aspect of the Contest which corrupts or affects the administration or proper conduct of the Contest, YTLC reserves all rights in Clause 10 above and further reserves the right at its sole and absolute discretion to disqualify any individual or party who tampers with the processes of the Contest and take any action (including legal action) against such individual or party. YTLC shall not accept any responsibility for Contest entry (Auto Billing subscription) lost, delayed, misdirected undelivered or damaged. YTLC shall not be responsible for technical errors in telecommunications networks, internet access or otherwise preventing entry to the Auto Billing subscription and/or Contest.
12. Selection Criteria and Selection Process.
YTLC reserves the sole and absolute discretion to determine the winning participants, which will be determined in accordance with the winning process mentioned above. YTLC's decision shall be final and no appeals or disputes will be entertained. Results once announced are deemed to be final.
13. General Indemnification.
Participants shall indemnify YTLC against all and any costs, expenses, damages, liability or injury (whether physical in nature or against the reputation of any party) incurred by YTLC, arising out of or relating to the participant's entrance in the Contest and or participant's acceptance, use or misuse of prizes, including but not limited to any of the participant's acts, omissions, statements, publications whatsoever as may be in breach of any law or legal rights, as the case may be.
14. Survivability of Terms.
Any delay, waiver, non-enforcement, modification, amendment, withdrawal or substitution of any term or condition contained herein shall not affect the operation of the other terms or conditions so affected by such a waiver, non-enforcement, modification, amendment, withdrawal or substitution and which shall remain in full force and effect.
15. Non-compliance.
Failure to comply with the Contest terms & conditions herein will result in disqualification of the relevant participant.
16. Facebook Promotion Policy.
The Contest is in no way sponsored, endorsed or administered by, or associated with Facebook. Each participant acknowledges that the information and contents provided by the respective participant for the Contest are to YTLC and not to Facebook and by participating in the Contest the participants hereby expressly release Facebook from any responsibilities or liabilities in connection with the Contest. Please refer to Facebook Data Use Policy and Statement of Rights and Responsibilities at https://www.facebook.com/page_guidelines.php.

Last updated: 28 August 2015

1. The Promotion. The Redmi 2 with Huddle XS Super Postpaid Plan Bundle Promotion ("the Promotion") is a time-limited offer launched by YTL Communications Sdn Bhd ("Yes") for its Super Postpaid Plans.
2. Applicable Terms & Conditions: Subject only to the variations as expressly set out herein, all other terms and conditions contained in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions (available at www.yes.my/tnc) shall remain and be applicable to the respective Super Postpaid Plans subscribed under the Promotion. Notwithstanding any perceived similarities, the terms and the Promotion offer specified herein do not apply to any Yes devices purchased, or any Yes Service Plan subscribed, outside of the Promotion Period.
3. Interpretations & Definitions: All capitalised words and expressions herein shall, unless otherwise provided, bear the same meanings as defined in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions.
4. Definitions: The following capitalised words or phrases shall have the meanings as assigned:
"All Day Data" means data which is available for use at any time of the day.
"GST" means goods and services tax or similar value added tax imposed on the sale of goods or the provision of services under the Goods and Services Tax 2014.
"Upfront Payment" means the reimbursable sum of money collected for any device provided to the Subscriber under the Promotion bundle at the time of registration.
"Off-Net" means the provisioning of services beyond Yes' network where access to a third party service provider's network will be required in order to provide the services.
"On-Net" means the provisioning of services within Yes' network and access to a third party service provider's network will not be required in order to provide the services.
"Plan Advance Payment" means the relevant Commitment Fee for the first month collected at the time of registration of the Service Plan.
5. Promotion Period. The Promotion is being offered from 27 th March 2015 until further notice ("Promotion Period").
6. The Promotion Bundle. One (1) unit of Xiaomi Redmi 2 and one (1) unit of Huddle XS 4G Mobile Hotspot ("Yes Device") bundled with the subscription of any Super Postpaid Plan (48/78/98) for a Contract Period of 24 months. The Xiaomi Redmi 2 is subject to stock availability and available in white colour only.
7. Service Offerings & Commitment Fee: The terms of offer for the respective Super Postpaid Plans subscribed under the Promotion are as follows:
• Super 48 is provided with Data Capacity Allocation of 2GB All Day Data, free 1,000 On-Net voice call minutes and 1,000 On-Net SMS at Commitment Fee of RM 48.
• Super 78 is provided with Data Capacity Allocation of 5GB All Day Data, free 1,000 On-Net voice call minutes and 1,000 On-Net SMS at Commitment Fee of RM 78.
• Super 98 is provided with Data Capacity Allocation of 7GB All Day Data, free 2,000 On-Net voice call minutes and 2,000 On-Net SMS at Commitment Fee of RM 98.

The free On-Net voice call minutes and free On-Net SMS provided in Clause 7 above are only applicable to subscribers who subscribed for the Promotion before 28 August 2015 and shall not be applicable to subscribers who subscribe to the Promotion from 28th August 2015 onwards.
8. Payment Upon Registration: Payments required upon registration of the respective Super Postpaid Plans are:

8.1 In respect of Super 48, a non-refundable Device Price of RM380 and Upfront Payment of RM289 shall be paid by the subscriber upon registration. The Yes Device price of RM 480.00, Plan Advance Payment, and Activation Fee will be waived.

8.2 In respect of Super 78, a non-refundable Device Price of RM180 and Upfront Payment of RM399 shall be paid by the subscriber upon registration. The Yes Device price of RM 480.00, Plan Advance Payment, and Activation Fee will be waived.

8.3 In respect of Super 98, an Upfront Payment of RM549 shall be paid by the subscriber upon registration. The Yes Device price of RM 480.00, Device Price, Plan Advance Payment, and Activation Fee will be waived.

8.4 Additionally, if the subscriber is a non-Malaysian, a refundable deposit of RM 100 will be collected which will be refunded free of interest 45 days after the expiry or termination of the Service account subject to any deduction which may be due from the subscriber to Yes.
 
9. Rebate: Provided that the subscriber's Service account is not suspended or terminated at the time of rebate, and where relevant, the Upfront Payment paid by the subscriber under the Promotion will be rebated to the subscriber's account over the 24 months Contract Period in the respective amount as follows:

a) From 1st month to 23rd month:
i) Super 48 - RM 12 per month
ii) Super 78 - RM 16 per month
iii) Super 98 - RM 22 per month

b) On the 24th month:
i) Super 48 - RM 13
i) Super 78 - RM 31
ii) Super 98 - RM 43

The amount of charges and rebates stated in Clause 7, Clause 8 and Clause 9 respectively are exclusive of GST. Such GST, if relevant, shall be added to the charges and/or rebates and be paid accordingly.
10. Addition/Removal of Service Plan: Yes reserves the right to add other types of Service Plan to and/or remove any of the Service Plan as stated herein from the Promotion in accordance with Clause 16 below.
11. Provision of Free On-Net services: In relation to the free voice calls and/or free SMS mentioned in Clause 7 herein, Yes may cease to provide the free On-Net voice call minutes and/or free On-Net SMS or modify or amend the provision thereof at any time at Yes's sole and absolute discretion by notice in accordance with Clause 16. Subject to the foregoing, the free On-Net voice call minutes and free On-Net SMS will be provided on a monthly basis in accordance with the relevant Billing Cycle of the subscriber's Service account and will only be valid for the duration of the Billing Cycle in which they are provided. Any unutilised free call minutes/SMS will lapse at the expiry of the relevant Billing Cycle.
12. Not exchangeable for cash. For the avoidance of doubt, the Promotion items/services in the Promotion bundle are not exchangeable for cash or any other product and/or service including any other Postpaid Service Plan offered by Yes.
13. Early Termination Charges: If the subscriber terminates the Service subscribed under the Promotion before the expiry of the Contract Period or if the Service account is terminated by Yes due to the subscriber's default, the Early Termination Charges as provided in the Postpaid Service Terms and Conditions shall apply.
14. Device Warranty. Each device provided under the Promotion shall be subject to its respective manufacturer's warranty. The Yes Device shall be subject to the Yes Limited Warranty at www.yes.my/tnc. The Xiaomi Redmi 2 shall be subject to Xiaomi's limited Warranty at http://www.mi.com/my/service/.
15. Exclusion of liability for use of Xiaomi Redmi 2. Yes shall not be liable for any loss, damages or injury to the Xiaomi Redmi 2 or to the subscriber or to any person claiming through the subscriber arising from the use or inability of use to the Xiaomi Redmi 2 or from any cause whatsoever.
16. Amendments. We reserve the right to change, modify and/or amend the terms of the Promotion at any time, with notice to the affected parties. For the purposes of this provision, a modification, change and/or amendment to these terms will be deemed to be effective upon a notice being placed upon Yes official website. We may, in addition send corresponding notices digitally to the Yes ID accounts of all validly active registered subscribers affected by such change, modification and/or amendment.
